1b1(brgyad stong): // rgyu gar skad du/ Ar+yA ASh+Ta swA hA sri kA prad+hA pU ra mi tA/ 
1b2(brgyad stong): bo'od skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa
1b3(brgyad stong): bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa
1b4(brgyad stong): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
1b5(brgyad stong): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na// 
2a1(brgyad stong): / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril bzhugs te/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i
2a2(brgyad stong): dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dag dang thabs cig go/ rnams cad kyang dgra bcom ste/ 
2a3(brgyad stong): zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol
2a4(brgyad stong): bu/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ 
2a5(brgyad stong): byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs
2a6(brgyad stong): su zad pa/ yang dag par kun shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems
2b1(brgyad stong): thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa thob pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
2b2(brgyad stong): gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te/ 
2b3(brgyad stong): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyod spobs par byos shig/ 
2b4(brgyad stong): cadang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ ci tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di bdag nyid kyi rang gi shes rab kyi spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa dang / rang gi shes rab kyi
2b5(brgyad stong): pa'i stobs byin gyis brlabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar ston par 'gyur ram/ 'on te sangs rgyas kyi
2b6(brgyad stong): mthus yin snyam mo// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i de lta bu'i tshul gyi sems kyi rtog pa de sems kyis shes nas
2b7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni gang ci smra ba dang ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / rjod par/ 
3a1(brgyad stong): gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par gsal bar byed pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu'i mthu yin par rig par
3a2(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da bzhin gshegs pas chos gang bstan pa'i chos bstan pa de la slob pa na de dag gis chos nyid de mngon sum du byas na so 'dzin to// de dag gis chos
3a3(brgyad stong): demangon sum du byas shing bzung nas gang dang gang 'chad pa dang gang dang gang ston pa dang gang dang gang nye bar ston pa dang / gang dang gong rjod par byed pa dang / gang dang gang gA
3a4(brgyad stong): byed pa dang gang dang gang yang dag parla gsal bar byed pa de dag thams cad chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu de dag 'di ltar
3a5(brgyad stong): nyid do nye bar ston pa rnams chos nyid dang mi 'gal bya de yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa'i rgyu mthun pa'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'phyo
3a6(brgyad stong): skye bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to// grang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab
3a7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa las ldartsams te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
3a8(brgyad stong): mas dpa' zhes brjod pa gang lags pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
3b1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma
3b2(brgyad stong): thong ngo // bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de yang bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rab
3b3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang bdag gis ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mya 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma
3b4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lnga gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang yang gal te 'di ltar smras pa dang bstan pa dang nye bar
3b5(brgyad stong): bstan pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems mi 'god kun tu mi zhum bag ma tsha brag 'khums par mi 'gyur/ 'di'i yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid/ bcom ning
3b6(brgyad stong): phyogs par mi 'gyur/ ming dang / kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rjes
3b7(brgyad stong): su bstan par bgyi ba lags so// 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bgyi'o// 'di nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
3b8(brgyad stong): ba lags so// gal te de ltar gnasar de nyid 'di'i gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra
4a1(brgyad stong): / TI pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas/ ci ltar bslabs na/ 'di byang chub kyi sems des kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid pa de ltar
4a2(brgyad stong): bslab par bgyi'o// de rje'i slad du rte na/ 'di ltar sems de ni sems ma mchis pa ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni 'od gsal ba sngags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ro'i bus che dang ldan
4a3(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshad dadu ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci sems gang sems med pa'i sems de yid dam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / rje dang ldan par 'i 'byor kyi sa tshe dang
4a4(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i yul 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang ci sems med pa nyid gang yin pa'i sems med pa nyid de la yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid yod pa'am dmigs pa
4a5(brgyad stong): de'ardzu dri ram/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan bre rab 'byor de ni med do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dngadu ldan pa shA ri'i phu gal te sems med pa de la yod pa'am med pa med
4a6(brgyad stong): cing mi dmigs na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di skad du sems gang sems med pa'i sems de ldong ngam nis skyes bu'i khyod kyis pa rgal bya gang yin pa de ci rigs par 'ju
4a7(brgyad stong): ram/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras sa// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems med pa nyid de yang gang
4a8(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems med pa de ni 'gyur ba med pa rnam par rtog pa med pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la le
4b1(brgyad stong): so zhes bya ba byin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar yang khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa ltar ston pa legs so legs so// de bsan
4b2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par nye bar brtag par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
4b3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar yang rig par bya'o// nyan thos kyi sA la skyob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ gzung bar
4b4(brgyad stong): bcang bar bya klag par bya kun chub par bya rab tu gdon par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// rnal 'byor du bya'o// 
4b5(brgyad stong): bar 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya klag par bya kun chub par bya rab tu gdon par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha
4b6(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// rnal 'byor du bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya gzung ba
4b7(brgyad stong): bya/ bcang bar bya klag par bya kun chub par bya rab tu gdon par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa'i chos ba
4b8(brgyad stong): dathob par bya ba'i phyir rnal 'byor du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la bsrabs shing rnal 'byor du bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i
5a1(brgyad stong): chos thams cad rgyas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las bstan to// blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la skyob par 'dod pas kyang
5a2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya gzung bar bya bcang bar bya klag par bya kun chub par bya rab tu gdon par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la
5a3(brgyad stong): thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir rnal 'byor du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las ni byang
5a4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la bslab par bya ba dang rnal 'byor du bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rgyas par bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 
5a5(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i ming gang lags pa 'di nyid bdag gis mi 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par
5a6(brgyad stong): rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i ming
5a7(brgyad stong): 'di nyid la 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems
5a8(brgyad stong): dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gang bdag gis dngos po ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag
5b1(brgyad stong): bar rjes su ma mthong na/ ming tsam gyis 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes 'du ba dang 'god par bgyid pa ni bdag gi glo ba la gcags lags so// bcom ldan 'das
5b2(brgyad stong): ming de yang gnas pa ma lags shing mi granas pa yang ma lags lnga gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags shing gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa yang ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
5b3(brgyad stong): ped de ma mchis pa'i skad du'o// de ltar ming de gnas pa ma lags shing mi gnas pa yang ma lags la gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags shing gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa yang
5b4(brgyad stong): ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad pa dang bstan pa dang nye bar bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
5b5(brgyad stong): 'i sems mi 'gong sun tu gyi nub bkra mi tshe/ brag la thams par mi 'gyur 'di'i yid phyir phyogs par mi brjed bcom ning phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ mi dang kun tu mi sgrag/ 
5b6(brgyad stong): kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur zhing lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par
5b7(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas pa ste mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis legs par gnas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems
5b8(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bskam pas gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de bzhin du tshor ba la
6a1(brgyad stong): lags 'du shes la ma lags 'du byed rnams la ma lags rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te gzugs la gam
6a2(brgyad stong): na gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa me lcags so// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang gal te rnam bya
6a3(brgyad stong): shes pa la gnas na rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du byed pa la
6a4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa yang ma lags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
6a5(brgyad stong): rdzogs par bgyid pa yang ma lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur na yongs su mi bzung ba yongs su bzung bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
6a6(brgyad stong): par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pA la gzugs yongs su gzung ba ma mchis so// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
6a7(brgyad stong): dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba ma mchis so// gzugs yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs mi lpags/ de
6a8(brgyad stong): du tshor ba gang lags pa dang 'du shes gang lags pa dang 'du byed rnams gang lags pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par
6b1(brgyad stong): shes pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang yongs su gzung ba ma mchis so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
6b2(brgyad stong): pa 'dul spyang bar bgyi'o// 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ yangs pa
6b3(brgyad stong): du bkyis po tshad med par nges pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang yongs su gzung ba ma mchis te/ ma
6b4(brgyad stong): ra gzung ba ma lags so// gal te mtshan mar gzung bar gyu na kun tu rgyu phreng bya can 'di la dad par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ san turgyu phreng bcan thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
6b5(brgyad stong): la mos nas dang pas rjes su 'brang zhing phyogs gcig pa'i ye shes kyis zhugs so// de zhugs nas kyang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin to// de bzhin du tshor ba ma lags/ 'du shes
6b6(brgyad stong): ljags 'du byed rnams ma lags rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to// de la shes pa de dga' ba dang bde bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes pa de nang gi gzugs
6b7(brgyad stong): ldan par yang drag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes pa de phyi rol gyi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de phyi nang gi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rjes
6b8(brgyad stong): mi mthong / shes pa de gzugs pas gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du shes pa de rang gi tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams kyi ma yin/ shes pa
7a1(brgyad stong): gi rnam par shes pa'i yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes par phyi rol gyi rnam par shes pa'i yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de
7a2(brgyad stong): nang gi rnam par shes phyi'i yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshig gi rnam grangs 'dri la kun tu
7a3(brgyad stong): rgyu phreng ba can mos so// de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la thams cad du dad pas rjes su 'brang zhing chos nyid tshad mar bgyis te 'di ltar mos pa zhes bgyi'o// 
7a4(brgyad stong): gang yang yongs su ma bzung ngo // gang gzung ba 'am btang bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma dmigs so// de mya ngan las 'das par yang rlom sems su mi bgyid do// bcom ldan
7a5(brgyad stong): 'das 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bgyi ste/ gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin/ de bzhin du gang tshor ba dang
7a6(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang gang rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs
7a7(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams yongs su ma rdzogs par bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba ste/ de bas na bcom ldan 'das 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'
7a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
7b1(brgyad stong): phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pas 'di ltar nye bar brtag cing 'di ltar nges par bsam par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang yin shes
7b2(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang gi ljin/ ci chos gang med pa dang mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam zhes/ gal te de ltar nye bar brtags de lta nges par bsams ma
7b3(brgyad stong): mi 'gong kun tu mi zhum/ bag mi tsha/ bag labums par mi 'gyur 'di'i yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid/ bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pa
7b4(brgyad stong): dang ldan par mi 'gyur na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bra' tshe dang ldan pa
7b5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di ltar gang gi tshe gzugs nyid gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang bral ba de bzhin du gang gi tshe tshor ba nyid dang 'du shes nyid pa
7b6(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams nyid dang de bzhin du 'di ltar gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang shes rab
7b7(brgyad stong): kyipha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba/ gang gi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
7b8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / 
8a1(brgyad stong): smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu gzugs nyid gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba
8a2(brgyad stong): drang 'du shes nyid dang 'di byed rnams nyid dang de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa / 
8a3(brgyad stong): bai rol tu phyin pa'i bo nyid dang bral ze'o// rje dang ldan pa shA ri'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnams cad
8a4(brgyad stong): 'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang yang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid dang ya
8a5(brgyad stong): bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyi gzhi yang mtshan nyid kyi gni ni ngo bo nyid dang yang bral ba'o// ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang yang bral ba'o// de skad ces skas pa dang
8a6(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci byang chub sems dpan sems dpa' chen po gang 'di la slob
8a7(brgyad stong): par 'gyur pa de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin
8a8(brgyad stong): nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'di la slob par 'gyur ba de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
8b1(brgyad stong): 'igarlos thams da di ba du byung ba sa /  dang ldan pa shA ri 'di ltar stong mas dang ma byar thams cad sa rgyar
8b2(brgyad stong): la nye bar 'gyur ro// wA hU~M wA thabyas cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar byed ba de ste de ltar sems nu mangs pa sbyin pa'i phyir/ lus dang sems yongs tha dag pa dang
8b3(brgyad stong): yongs su dag pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas dang nye bar yang 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
8b4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye ba yin no// gzhan yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
8b5(brgyad stong): las brtsams te 'di skad ces smos so// gal te gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs kyi mtshan ma sa spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs ma
8b6(brgyad stong): ma'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs kyi skyo ba la spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do// gal te gzugs kyi 'gag po la spyod na mtshan mo la spyod do// gal te gsu
8b7(brgyad stong): rje 'jig pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs stong pa'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag spyod do snyam du spyod ni mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag byang chu
8b8(brgyad stong): sems dpa'o sdom du spyod na mtshar po la spyod do// bdag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom na de dmigs pa nyid la stong ngo // de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed nams pa
9a1(brgyad stong): / gas te rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma laspyad do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i mtshan pa sa spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gas te rnam par shes
9a2(brgyad stong): mtshan ma'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa la spyod na mtshan ma
9a3(brgyad stong): spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa la spyod na 'tshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa stong pa'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdog spyod do snyam du
9a4(brgyad stong): dran mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam na de dmigs pa nyid la spyod do// gal te yang de
9a5(brgyad stong): 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed pa yi no snyam du sems do mtshan ma nyid la spyod
9a6(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni thabs me mkhas par rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldar pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang rdzin
9a7(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas spyod pa mi ne/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'gyur
9a8(brgyad stong): kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la mi spyod/ gzugs
9b1(brgyad stong): chen ma la mi spyod/ gzugs mtshan ma'o snyam du mi spyod/ gzugs kyi skye ba la mi spyod/ gzugs kyis lag pa la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi 'jig pa la mi spyod/ gzugs stong pa'o
9b2(brgyad stong): bdag spyod desnyam du mi spyod/ bdag byeng chub sems dpan snyam du mi spyod/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du dmigs pa lnga mi spyod pa dang / de'i zhin du gal te tshor ba la
9b3(brgyad stong): 'du shes la ma ljin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ gal te rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ rnab par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma'o snyam du
9b4(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa la ni spyod/ rnam por shes pa stong pa'o snyam du mi spyod/ 2
9b5(brgyad stong): snyam du mi snyed/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du mi spyod/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du dmigs pa la mi spyod cing / gal te'ang de 'di snyam du gang de ltar smod pa de
9b6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa sgom par byed pa yin no snyam du mi sems pa ste/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems da
9b7(brgyad stong): chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// de spyod kyang snod do snya du te bar mi rtagasaspyod de snyam du nye bar me rtogs/ spyod po pa spyod kyang mi spyod do snyam
9b8(brgyad stong): mi rtogs/ spyod pa yang ma yin la mi srid pa yang ma yin pa'o snyam du nye bar mi rtogs/ spyad par bya'o snyam du yang nye bar mi rtogs/ spyad par mi bya'o snyam du yang nyo bar mi rtog
10a1(brgyad stong): spung bar bya ba yang yin la spyad par mi bya ba yang yin no snyam du ha bar ma rtogs/ spyad par bya ba yang ma yin la spyad par mi bya ba yang ma yin pa nyid do snyam du
10a2(brgyad stong): nye bar mi rtogs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni nye bar ma rtogs shing mazin pas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad
10a3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du blar med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi sazlas gnas
10a4(brgyad stong): ra tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldaran 'das kang ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po drini sngor gying
10a5(brgyad stong): zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstur pa lags so// de ni ting nge 'dzin
10a6(brgyad stong): deyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ting nge 'dzin des kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid/ bdag ni mnyam par gzhag pa ste/ bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go/ bdas
10a7(brgyad stong): ngange 'dzin la snyoms par gzhag pa'o// bdag ting nge 'dzin la stoms par zhugs pa'o snyam pa de lta bu de la thams cad ras thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad ma
10b1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhi de gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
10b2(brgyad stong): dzin du na pa sa la/ dngas kyi du/  kyi su da pa
10b3(brgyad stong): shes yang dag par mi shes so// tshe dang sngon pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa reb 'brur bri shes yang dag par mi shes nes zer dam/ chu dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sna smras pa/ 
10b4(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu me shes yang dag par ba shes zhes zer ro// de ci'i phyi ni/  dzin de med pasu ma shes yang dgu par mi shes po// ting nge dzin de yang po / 
10b5(brgyad stong): dag par me shrIs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byir te/ de ltar yang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthum spobs pa dang de bzhin
10b6(brgyad stong): shegs pa sbyin ces pas sted pa de rab 'gyung men sa migs so// rab rgyu da bya'adi deng de bzhin te/ byachub sems dpa' sems dbu chen pos ni de bzhin du
10b7(brgyad stong): la bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar sre shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa la slab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das mtsho
11a1(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
11a2(brgyad stong): byin pa la slob pa lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu byang chub se
11a3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
11a4(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na chos gang la slob pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcwo
11a5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni chos gang la yang mi slob po// de ci'i
11a6(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu chos de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye blo thos pa dang mi ldan pas ci ltar mngon par chags pa de bzhin du yod pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
11a7(brgyad stong): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na de dag ci ltar mochis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu ci ltar med pa de bzhin du yang dag par yod de de ltar
11a8(brgyad stong): bde'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bya'o// de dag la byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa rnams mngon par chags te/ de dag gis chos thams cad med pa la brtags po// 
11b1(brgyad stong): dedag gis de la brtags nas mtha' gnyis la zhen pas chos de dag mi shes mi mthong ste/ de'i phyir de dag med bzhin du chos thams cad la rtog go/ btags nas mtha' gnya
11b2(brgyad stong): mngon par chags so// mngon par chags pa de'i gnyis dmigs pa la gnas nas 'das pa'i chos la rtog go// ma 'ongs pa'i chos la rtog go// da ltar byung ba'i chos la rtog go/ 
11b3(brgyad stong): de dag gis brtags nas ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen to// de dag gis med pa'i chos thams cad la brtags so// de dag gis med pa'i chos de dag thams cad pa
11b4(brgyad stong): brtags pas lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes mi mthong ngo // lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma shes ma mthong bas khams gsum las nges par mi 'byung / 
11b5(brgyad stong): dag pa'i mtha' khong du mi chud de de'i phyir de dag byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// de dag chos bden pa la yid mi ches so// shA ri'i bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
11b6(brgyad stong): dbanga' chen po rnams ni chos gang la yang mngon par zhen par mi byed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gas
11b7(brgyad stong): to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slab na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
11b8(brgyad stong): rere bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na
12a1(brgyad stong): thams cad sa slob bo// shA rI'i pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sleb pa g+ha
12a2(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar 'gyur thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol
12a3(brgyad stong): com ldan 'das gang zhig 'di skad du 'dri ste ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di thams cad bakhyen pa nyid la slob par 'gyur ram thams cad gakhyen pa nyid sa nye bar 'gyur
12a4(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram zhes de skad du yongs su 'drin bcom ldan 'das de lnga ji ltar bstan par bcoM/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / 
12a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces rab 'byor de bas na 'dir khyod nyid lde dri bar bya yis khyod kyis ci nus pa de bzhin du sngod cig ces bka'
12a6(brgyad stong): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bkra
12a7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'dri dri snyam du sems smra ba de gzhan la gzugs de gzhan na ma de bzhin du sum de gzhan la tshor ba de gzhan dum 'du shes de kunan nam 'du byed rnams deg ni/ 
12a8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems sgo ma de gzhan la rnam par shes pa de gzhan nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags te sgyu ma de gzhan
12b1(brgyad stong): zhugs de gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid sgyu ma lags so snyam nyid gzugs lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du l+h+wa ma de gzhan la tshor ba de ba'
12b2(brgyad stong): du shes de gzhan dang 'du byed rnams de gzhan yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams nyid sgyu ma lags so sgyu ma nyid tshor ba dang 'du shes
12b3(brgyad stong): sa y-i pa de ga rnam pa ga na pa / hUM/  da grus
12b4(brgyad stong): bar shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di rnams la 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa
12b5(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang kun shes pa dang rnam par rig pa dang tha snyad 'di yin nam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gas
12b6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de de bzhin te bde bar gshegs pa de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa des
12b7(brgyad stong): byes bu ltar bla med pa yang dgra par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag nyid sku
12b8(brgyad stong): nga gzung bar bya byer// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ com ldan 'das 'di ltar bam ldan 'das kyi gzugs ni sgyu ma lnga bur gsung / 
13a1(brgyad stong): dang phung po lnga po de dag lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams sgyu ma lta bur gsungs shing bcom
13a2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi garnam par shes pa yang skyes sa par gsangs te/ ma ldan 'das rnam par shes pa gang rdzogs pa de yid dbang po drug dang phung po rje
13a3(brgyad stong): de dag lags so// bcom ldan 'das theg pa la gsar du zhugs po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bstan pa 'di thos na dngang zhing kun tu skrag la kun tu
13a4(brgyad stong): ba dang ldan par mi 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
13a5(brgyad stong): sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song byar// ran ni/ dang shring kun tu skrag la kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gas te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub
13a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba ba shes gnyen gyi lag tu song bar gyur na ni ma dang kun tu maM skrag kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par me 'gyur ro// des du ces pa
13a7(brgyad stong): gnyen gang rnams legs par rig par ba gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang de dge la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams 'doms shing rjes su ston pa rnams dang / gang
13b1(brgyad stong): de dag la bdud rtsi lus rnams nye bar ston pa ste/ bdud kyi nyes pa ni 'di lta bur rig par bya/ 'dud kyi nyes pa ni 'di dag yin/ bdud kyi las na 'dra dag ldan pa d+ya/ 
13b2(brgyad stong): las 'di dag kyad kyis rtog/ cha ras spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po byugos pa theg pa chen po la yang dag pa
13b3(brgyad stong): zhugs pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams su rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab
13b4(brgyad stong): kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa theg pa chen po la yang
13b5(brgyad stong): dag par zhugs pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams su rig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang chub sems dpa'
13b6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po zhes bka' stsal pa de la byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i gzhi'i don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
13b7(brgyad stong): 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi'i don med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
13b8(brgyad stong): chen po na chos thabs cad kyi chags pa med pa la slob po// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad rjes su rtogs pa'i don du chags pa
14a1(brgyad stong): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ rab 'byor byang chu don du gnyer bas na byang chub sems dpa
14a2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po nas bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ga yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes byuka' stsal pa
14a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rgyu ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can gyi phung po chen po dang sems can gyi
14a4(brgyad stong): res chen po'i mchog nyid du bya'o snyam pa ste/ don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus la
14a5(brgyad stong): daces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dag kyang don gang ge slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bar spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
14a6(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bud da'i dus la bab par shes na spobs par gyis shog/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bdag tu lta ba dang sems can du lta ba dang srog tu lta ba dang gre
14a7(brgyad stong): zag tu lta ba dang / 'byung bar lta ba dang 'jig par lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang rtag par lta ba dang / rang gi lus la lta ba chen po 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i lha 'di dag spang ba'i
14a8(brgyad stong): slad du chos bstan to snyam ste don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
14b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bkyi bar slebs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
14b2(brgyad stong): de'i dus la bab par shes na spobs par gyis shig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das
14b3(brgyad stong): byang chub kyi sems thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems zag pa med pa'i sems/ mnyam pa med pa'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams
14b4(brgyad stong): cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems gang lags pa'i sems de la yang ma chags yongs su ma zin to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de ni
14b5(brgyad stong): ba ma mchis pa yongs su ma zin pa'o// de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems zag pa ma mchis shing yongs su ma zin pa gang lags pa'i sems de la yang ma chags shing yongs su ma
14b6(brgyad stong): na te/ don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'dri skad ces smras so// 
14b7(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i rgyus sems de la yang ma chags shing yongs su ma zin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems med pa'i phyir sems de la yang
14b8(brgyad stong): chags shing yongs su ma zin to// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci sems gang sems med pa'i sems de yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 
15a1(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang ci sems med pa de la yod pa 'am med pa yod pa'am dmigs par 'gyur ram/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
15a2(brgyad stong): ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gal te sems med pa de la gang yod pa'am/ med pa med cing mi dmigs na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ji/ 
15a3(brgyad stong): 'di skad du sems gang sems med pa'i sems de yod dam zhes zer/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ltar yang khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs
15a4(brgyad stong): med pa la gnas pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa ltar ston pa legs so legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i dus 'di skad ces gsol
15a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' chen po sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa 'di ni sems dpa' de go cha chen po bgos pa sems dpa' de theg pa chen po la
15a6(brgyad stong): yang dag par zhugs pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa lags te/ de'i slad du sems dpa' chen po sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi'o// 
15a7(brgyad stong): nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos pa go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bgyi ba
15a8(brgyad stong): gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
15b1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dbya' sems dpan chen po 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can gnas du med pa yongs su mya ngan lngas bzla bar bya'o bdag gis sems can grangs
15b2(brgyad stong): med pa yongs su bya ngan las bzla'o snyam la/ gang gis gang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa'i sems can de dag kyang yod pa ma yin no snyam ste/ des sems can de snyed pa de drag
15b3(brgyad stong): yongs su mya ngan las zla bar byed la gang yongs su mya ngan mas bzlas pa dang gang gis yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa'i sems can yang 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
15b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye byar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di sbyin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dper na sgyu ma byed pa mkhas pa 'am skya ma byed pa'i nye gnas kyis lam po che'i
15b5(brgyad stong): ba zhi mdor skye bo'i tshogs chen po mngon par sprul te mngon par sprul nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de mi sdang bar byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de la yang gang gis gang yang bsang
15b6(brgyad stong): pa'am shi ba'am bshig pa 'am mi snang bar byis pa yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
15b7(brgyad stong): debazhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can gzhal du med grangs myed pa rnams yongs su mya ngar las bzlo bar byed de gleng yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa dang grang
15b8(brgyad stong): gis yongs su mya ngan las bzlas par 'gyur ba'i sems can yang 'ga' nig yod pa ma yin no// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bstan pa 'di
16a1(brgyad stong): dpya kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na 'di tsam gyis rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba de go cha chen po bgos
16a2(brgyad stong): reg par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gsungs pa'i don pa
16a3(brgyad stong): gis 'tshal ba de ltar na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni go cha ma mchis pa bgos pa lags par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi
16a4(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni go cha med pa bgos par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor thams cad
16a5(brgyad stong): pa nyid nir byas pa rnam par ma bskur ba mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// sems can gang dag gi don du go cha 'di 'gos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas pa rnam par ma baH/ 
16a6(brgyad stong): mngon par 'dus mi byas pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin du
16a7(brgyad stong): bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin no// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed
16a8(brgyad stong): dang / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid
16b1(brgyad stong): nyid dang / 'dugs kyad bzhin nyid dang / du byed rnams cing bzhin cad dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i di rgan ta kyang ma brjings ma grol la'o// der
16b2(brgyad stong): gang po byams pa'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ram/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes du
16b3(brgyad stong): du byed rnams dang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcangs ma grol ba shes ma
16b4(brgyad stong): raro/ de bzhin du tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings
16b5(brgyad stong): ma grol ba zhes zer ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'on te gzugs gang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i gzugs de gang yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba de gang yin/ 'du shes de
16b6(brgyad stong): yin/ 'du byed rnams de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa gang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i rnam par shes pa de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
16b7(brgyad stong): zugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de gang yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du bye
16b8(brgyad stong): kye de bzhin nyid de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de gang gir
17a1(brgyad stong): de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa gang po byamasnga ma'i bu la 'di skad rjes smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang ni
17a2(brgyad stong): mra'i skyes bu'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i 'du shes gdu yin pa dang / 
17a3(brgyad stong): skyes bu'i 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi tshe sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po sgra
17a4(brgyad stong): skyes bu'i gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / du
17a5(brgyad stong): da rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang len pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyi
17a6(brgyad stong): yang dag pa mA yin pas na mya bcings ma grol bu'o// dben pas ne ma bcings ma grol ba'o// ma skyes pas na ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'as
17a7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po'i go cha chen po bgos pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa theg pa chen po po yang dag par gnas pa'i go cha chen po ga cha med pa'o// de skad ces smras pa
17a8(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de
17b1(brgyad stong): ltalta byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos par gyur pa theg pa chen po lnga yang dag pa bzhugs shing theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas par 'gyur ba'i
17b2(brgyad stong): theg pa chen po de ni gang lags/ reg pa chen po de la de ltar yang dag byar zhugs par rig par bgyi ba 'am/ theg pa chen po des gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ theg pa
17b3(brgyad stong): chen po de la gang gis yang dag par zhugs pa'am/ theg pa chen po des gang du gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ theg pa chen po des gang zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ de skad ce
17b4(brgyad stong): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor theg pa chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhal du med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// 
17b5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gnam du med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tshad med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang yang 'di skad du theg pa chen po de la ji ltar bang dag par zhugs par rig par bgyi ba 'am
17b6(brgyad stong): theg pa chen po des gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ theg pa chen po de la gang gis yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po des gang du gnas par 'gyur
17b7(brgyad stong): ba'am/ reg pa chen po des gang zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes ze rab ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi sgo nas yang dag par zhugs nas// khams gsum nas nges
17b8(brgyad stong): par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mi dmigs pa gang yin pas yang dag par zhugs te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
18a1(brgyad stong): / nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'on kyang gang nas kyang nges par 'byung ba med gung gis kyang yang dag par ma zhugs gang du yang gnas par mi 'gru
18a2(brgyad stong): mod kyi gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur la/ theg pa chen po des gang yang nges par ma phyung nges par 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur nges pa
18a3(brgyad stong): byung ba yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang nges par 'byung ba dang / gang gis nges par 'byung ba'i chos de gnyis ka yang med cing mi dmigs te/ de ltar na chos thams
18a4(brgyad stong): da med cing mi dmyigs pa la chos gang zhig chos gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi
18a5(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsol s+ho// bcom ldan 'das thes pa chen po theg pa rkyen du zhes pagyib 'di ni rtswa dang me dang rtswa paM len du bcas pa'i 'jig rte kyil khyim med na sa nges par
18a6(brgyad stong): 'byung bar 'gyur ba la rjod do// na mamakha' ltar mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir de ni theg pa chen po'o// ji ltar nam mkha' la sems can gnas du ma mchis grangs ma mchis tshad
18a7(brgyad stong): mchis bya'i go skabs mchis pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po la yang sems can gsul du ma mchis grangs ma mchis tshad ma mchis pa'i go skabs ma
18a8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o// 'di la 'ong ba yang ma mthong 'di la 'gro ba yang
18b1(brgyad stong): bzong zhing 'di la gnas pa yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar theg pa chen po 'di la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs dbus kyang mi
18b2(brgyad stong): dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa de ni dus gsum du menyam pa'o// de bas na theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
18b3(brgyad stong): 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor legs so legs so// rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ 
18b4(brgyad stong): kyi theg pa chen po yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'di la bslabs pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par gyur to// rjes su thob pa
18b5(brgyad stong): 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor shes rab
18b6(brgyad stong): rob tu phyin pa'i skad du byin gyis brlabs pa 'di ni theg pa chen po bshad par bya bar sems lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ce
18b7(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po ston par ma gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
18b8(brgyad stong): 'byor de ni ma yin te rab 'byor khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la theg pa chen po rjes su mthuran par ston to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
19a1(brgyad stong): 5/ ldan pa rab 'byor gyib 'di skad ces gsol to// bcod ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthus lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems pa
19a2(brgyad stong): sngon gyi mthar yang nye bar ma rtogs byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar yang nye bar mi rtogs byang chub sems dpa' dbus su yang nye bar ma rtogs so// nye bar ma rtogs pa de
19a3(brgyad stong): slad du zhe na/ gzugs bu ma mchis pas na byang chub sems dpa' yang pu ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par
19a4(brgyad stong): pa bu ma mchis pas na byang chub sems dpa' yang mu ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// gzugs byang chub sems dpa'o zhes nye bar ma rtogs te 'di yang ma mchis mi dmig
19a5(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa'o zhes nye bar ma rtogs te/ 'di yang ma mchis mi dmigs so// bco
19a6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi dmigs pas bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang
19a7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i ming 'di gang la yod pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi dmigs tham
19a8(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos de thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad
19b1(brgyad stong): parang rjes sum pa'o shing ma dkrig na cosagu nigams gung gsu chos pa la ga sa ni rje stan par / ma ldan 'das sangs rgyas sa
19b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes 'artse ba 'di yang ming tsam mo// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa zhes brtse ba 'di yang ming tsam mo// 
19b3(brgyad stong): mngon par ma grub ste/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag bdag ces brjod kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag shin tu mngon par ma grub pa bzhin no// de ltar chos thams cad ngo bo
19b4(brgyad stong): ches pa la gang zhig gzung du mi mchis shing mngon par ma grub pa'i gzugs de gang legs tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams de gang lags/ gang zhig gzung du
19b5(brgyad stong): pa ches shing mngon par ma grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags/ de ltar chos de dag thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni mngon par ma grub pa lags la
19b6(brgyad stong): thos thams cad kyi mngon par ma grub pa gang lags pa de yang chos ma lags te/ desan shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par ma grub pas mngon par ma sgrub pa
19b7(brgyad stong): dmas shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma grub pa las gzhan na chos thams cad du mi sangs rgyas kyi chos sam byang chub sems dpa'i chos
19b8(brgyad stong): nga chub tu spyod pa yang mi dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar bshad cing de ltar bstan te de ltar nye bar bstan pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
20a1(brgyad stong): po'i sems mi 'god kun tu mi zhum bag me che/ bgra du bas par mi 'gyur/ 'dir phyid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid bcom ning phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur
20a2(brgyad stong): me dang san tu gyi thug san du skrag byu dang rdzun par 'i gyur na/ byang chub se byas dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dzini shes rab kyi brtsod tu byin pa la spyod po'o// byang chu
20a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpon chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi pa la sgom pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ra shes rab gi serab tu phyin pa lnga
20a4(brgyad stong): blang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pa rlol tu phyin pa la nges par sems par zhes dester rig par 'ju'o//  na'i bud du de
20a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gang gi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rten po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos 'di dag nye bar rtog pa de'i tshe/ gzugs nye bar mi rtogs
20a6(brgyad stong): bang mi 'dzin/ gzugs skye bar yang dag par de sas mi mthong gzugs 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du tshor rab ma yin 'du shes ma chi
20a7(brgyad stong): tsud rnas mkhyen/ nam par shes ts+tshe/  / rnam pa rdzogs pa duste/ rnam par shes skyeb pa byu ts+tsha k+She hA/ 
20a8(brgyad stong): rjes su mi mthong ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gaH
20b1(brgyad stong): rig pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags te/ des na skye ba ma mchis pa dang / gzugs shes bkru pa 'di ni gnyis sum mchis sheng / gnasas pa #
20b2(brgyad stong): des na 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang gzugs shes brdzi pa 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su babyer ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad du gzugs shes bkye ba 'ad
20b3(brgyad stong): sum mchis pa'i grangs su gtogs so// de bzhin du 'di ltar tshor ba'i gang lags pa dang / 'du shes kyi gang lags pa dang / 'du byed rnams kyi gang lags pa dang / 'ad
20b4(brgyad stong): ma par shes pa'i skye bra ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa ma mchis pa gang legs pa de ni rnam par shes pa
20b5(brgyad stong): des na skye ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di lung gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su 'gyir ma mchis so// des na 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang rnam par
20b6(brgyad stong): sa pa chos brgya pa 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgying ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad du rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis
20b7(brgyad stong): grangs su gtogs so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du nye byar rtog na/ de'i tshe gzugs nye bar mi rtogs
20b8(brgyad stong): gzugs nye bar mi 'dzin gzugs skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gzugs 'gag par yang dge bar rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin 'du shes pa'i
21a1(brgyad stong): / 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa nye bar mi rtogs/ rnam par shes pa nye bar mi 'dzin/ rnam par shes pa skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mdza
21a2(brgyad stong): ma par shes pa 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags/ gzugs
21a3(brgyad stong): 'jig pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags te/ des na skye ba ma mchis pa dang gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir
21a4(brgyad stong): mamachis so// des na 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang / gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad du gzugs
21a5(brgyad stong): shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su gtogs so// de bzhin du 'di ltar tshor ba'i gang lags pa dang / 'du shes kyi gang lags pa dang / 'du byed rnams
21a6(brgyad stong): gang lags pa dang / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa ma mchis pa gang
21a7(brgyad stong): lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ des na spyo ba ma mchis pa dang rnam par shes pa zhes bgye ba 'dre yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis bu 'khyer ma mchis so// 
21a8(brgyad stong): des na 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang rnam par shes pa nas bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad du rnam par shes pa zhes
21b1(brgyad stong): 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su gtogs so// / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po gnyis pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA
21b2(brgyad stong): 'thos med du ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rjes de skad skyem pa'i don bdag gis shes pa deltar dbyu skyeb sems de'i yang
21b3(brgyad stong): med pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med pa ldan ni byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba skyed pa spyod pa'am sems can du
21b4(brgyad stong): don kyi phyir sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag nyams su myong ba'i don du spro ba yang ci zhig yod/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi satshe dang ldan pa
21b5(brgyad stong): yul 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'o bror byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba spyad pa skyod par mi 'dod do// gang dag dka' ba'i 'du
21b6(brgyad stong): skyes spyod pa de ni byang chub sems dpar yang mi 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed nas ni sems can gnal du med grangs ming
21b7(brgyad stong): don bye bar mi nus so// 'on kyang bde ba 'du shes nyid du byas nas de sems can thams cad la mar 'du shes pa dang / por 'du shes pa dang / bur 'du shes bya dang / 
21b8(brgyad stong): ra 'du shes bskyed par byas shing / de bzhin du skyes pa dang / bud med dag la 'du shes de dag byas nas// 
22a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la mar 'du shes pa dang / bar 'du shes pa dang
22a2(brgyad stong): bur 'du shes pa dang / bu mor 'du shes pa dang / bdag nyid kyi bar du yang 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ ji ltar bdag ni thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad
22a3(brgyad stong): sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar bya ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar
22a4(brgyad stong): bya'o zhes de ltar sems can thams cad la yang 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad yongs su mi bting ngo // bdag gis sems can 'di
22a5(brgyad stong): dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po dpag tu med pa las thar bar bya'o// bdag gi lus brgya rab tu byas kyang chung ngu na 'di dag la badrag gis gnod sems kyang me bskyed do// 
22a6(brgyad stong): ma du de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed par bya'o// gal te sems de ltar gnas na dka' ba byed pa'i 'du shes su spyod pa ma yin no// dka
22a7(brgyad stong): dpe'i 'du shes su gnas pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA rI'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci nas kyang bdag ni thams cad nas tham
22a8(brgyad stong): darnam pa thams cad du thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du chos thams cad thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa
22b1(brgyad stong): de ltar sems bskyed par bya zhid de ltar na rang dang phyi'i chos thams cad la 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// gal te sems de ltar spyod na dka' ba'i 'du shes can du spyod pa ma yin dka' ba'i
22b2(brgyad stong): 'du shes rba dra du glanas pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pra shA ri'i bus gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba mod pa yin no zhes smras pa de ni de de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa/ 
22b3(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci byang chub sems dpa' nyid skye ba med dam 'on te byang chub
22b4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chos rnams kyang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med do// shA ri'i bus klas pa/ tshe dang
22b5(brgyad stong): ldan pa rabang 'byor yang ci byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kho skye ba med dme 'on ti thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyi su smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
22b6(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor lang ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kho na skye ba med dam/ ljon te thams cad
22b7(brgyad stong): pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba mod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu thams
22b8(brgyad stong): ldan bla rab 'byor yang ci thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams khon skye ba med dam 'on te so so'i skye bo yang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smos pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu so so'i
23a1(brgyad stong): sa smras pa/ dang rdzun nga ma 'byu nyid rgyu ba shang dus nam tsha rgyamatshas rnams sa
23a2(brgyad stong): ldas / mdang da rlom skye mdzes rnams cad skye med do// na ces smras pa dang / dbardzun pa ro bram che dang rjen pa
23a3(brgyad stong): sa// nga lda gas/ nga na ma sa ma rnams pa skye myed/ sa ngas kyin
23a4(brgyad stong): sa da ma nga da /  ni sa/  rlom pa dzus mas pa da/ 
23a5(brgyad stong): byu rgyusas sus dpa'i sems dpa' chen pa sa thams sa dum da ngas pa ba pa yin nag/ dgrad ces smras pa dang / dang ldan pa rang kya
23a6(brgyad stong): rlob / shA bya smra / da 'du 'i hU~M
23a7(brgyad stong): ma byas bas sa skyes pa khring sa gyu sa pa/ ci dang lda pa tsho chem skyes kyi chos spyo pa'i ngas
23b1(brgyad stong): skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa nyid yin/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci skye ba'i chos nyid mi skye ba yin nam 'on te mi skye ba'i chos mi skye ba yin/ rab 'byor
23b2(brgyad stong): pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skye ba'i chos sam mi skye ba'i chos shes smra bar mi spobs so// shA ri 'ire bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis skye ba med pa yang smra ba
23b3(brgyad stong): sam/ rab 'byor kyis sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skye bu med pa nyid rjod pa yin la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skye ba med pa nyid so sor sdong 'u yin no// tshe dang
23b4(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu skye ba med pa nyid spobs pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de kho na bzhin du shin tu so sor sdang ba nyid do// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
23b5(brgyad stong): zas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos ston pa'i nang na me rtog tu bzhag par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhin/ 'di ltar gnas
23b6(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni gang dang gang nyid la yongs su dri ba byas pa de dang de nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo la chos nyid dang 'gal bar yang
23b7(brgyad stong): drang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyinya
23b8(brgyad stong): gnas pa'i mas can rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'di yin te de dag ni gang dang gang nyid la yongs su dri 'bras pa de dang de nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / chos
24a1(brgyad stong): 'gal bar yang mi byed la chos nyid las kyang mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar yang chos thams cad mi gnas pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces smras pa
24a2(brgyad stong): dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor legs so legs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ 
24a3(brgyad stong): chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
24a4(brgyad stong): theg pa thabs cad pa chos thams cad lnga mi gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
24a5(brgyad stong): na po gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ltar bshad cing 'di ltar bstan pa dang 'di ltar nye bar bstan pa la sems zhum par mi 'gyur ba dang nem nur du mi
24a6(brgyad stong): gyur ba dang rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems grazhan du mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa
24a7(brgyad stong): 'das gnas shing yid la byed pa 'di dang ma bral ba yin no zhes rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'a
24a8(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pas gnas pa gang yin pa de ci ltar yid la byed pa dang
24b1(brgyad stong): la bar 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dbang chen po yid la byed pa dang pa bral ba yin na de kA nA ni de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gan
24b2(brgyad stong): bdang bral bar 'gyur zhing / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang ma bral nA de lta na ni
24b3(brgyad stong): ying la byed pa de dang bral bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang sngon pa rab 'byor gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid la byed pa dang ma bral yang shes dang kyi
24b4(brgyad stong): pa'i gnas pa dang ma bral ba nyid du 'gyur na de lta yin du zin na sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir
24b5(brgyad stong): da/ sems can thams cad kyang yid la byed pa dang ma bral bar gnas so// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA rirI 'u la 'di skad ces
24b6(brgyad stong): smras so// tshe dang ldan pA shA ri'i bu legaswa sde legs so// 'on kyang khyad la yang klan kar 'gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ni don 'di nyid yang dag pa'i tshig tu brjod par
24b7(brgyad stong): yang yongs su bzung ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can ngo bo nyid med pas na yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA
24b8(brgyad stong): ri'i bu sems can dngos po med pas na yid la byed pa dngos po med par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can dben pas na yid la byed pa dben par rig par
25a1(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pas na yid la byed brabasam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sa
25a2(brgyad stong): can mngon par rdzogs par byung me chub pas na yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par byang ma chub par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can yang dge pa ji lta
25a3(brgyad stong): ma yin pa'i don du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas na yid la byed pa yang dag pa ji lta ba ma yin pa'i don du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan
25a4(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i ngo bo'i yid la byed pa 'di dang gnas pa 'dis gnas par 'dod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
25a5(brgyad stong): pa brgyad stong pa las/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi spyod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// // de'i tshe yang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
25a6(brgyad stong): des kyi lha'i bu bzhi khri dang lhan cig tu 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod par gyur to// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang rgyal chen bzhi'i res kyi lha'i bu nyi khrir bcas pa dang / mi mdze
25a7(brgyad stong): kyi bdug po rlangs pa yang tshangs ris kyi wA rI su wi rab tsas pa dang / gnas gtsang ba'i ris kyi lho'i bu lnga stong yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus te la bde par gyur te/ s+thAnA ma sA N+Di
25a8(brgyad stong): rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i 'od gang yin pa de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjod dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zil
25b1(brgyad stong): mnan to// de nas zla rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor lha'i bu stong phrag bang po la rdzo
25b2(brgyad stong): deng 'dus te 'khod pa 'di rnams 'phags pa rab 'byor las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nye bar bstan pa dang gdums
25b3(brgyad stong): pa dang rjes su bstan pa nyan par 'dod na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya/ ji ltar bslab par bya/ 
25b4(brgyad stong): la 'byor du bya/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi la'u dang sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjod dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis nye bar bstan
25b5(brgyad stong): ra bya ste/ lha'i bu gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mA bskyed pa de dag gis sems bskyed par bya'o// gang dag yang dag pa nyid du
25b6(brgyad stong): ba la zhugs pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i skal ba med do// de ci'i phyir na na/ de dag gis 'khor ba'i hun lngas mtshams
25b7(brgyad stong): bcad pas de dag yang dang yang du 'khor zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems daskrad pa'i skal ba med do// 'on kyang gal te de dag gis kyang bla
25b8(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na de dag la yang rjes su yi rang bar bya'o// khe bo ni de dag gi dge ba la bar chad mi byed de khyad par du 'ab gas
26a1(brgyad stong): pa'i chos rnams las ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams la lhag par dmigs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
26a2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor legs so legs so// khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la sgo bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni rab 'byor yang
26a3(brgyad stong): khyod legs so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis
26a4(brgyad stong): ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin gtso bar bgyi ste bka' drin mi gzo bar mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
26a5(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs bya'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa nyid kyis bdag cag rnams kyi don du byang
26a6(brgyad stong): ciphyir tshangs par spyad pa skyed pa na nyan thos gang dag gis pa rol tu phyin pa rnam sa la gdags shing rjes su bstan te de la bcom ldan 'das kyis spyad pas bla na med
26a7(brgyad stong): pa'i ye shes bskyed pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rjes su yongs su bzung por bgyi zhing rjes
26a8(brgyad stong): su yongs su bstang bar bgyi'o// yang dag par yongs su bzung bar bgyi zhing yang dag par yongs su bskor bar yang bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
26b1(brgyad stong): 'dam bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rjes su yongs su bzung ning rjes su yongs su bskor ba dang yang dag par yangs su bzung nang yang dag
26b2(brgyad stong): ra yongs su bskor bas myur du bla na myed pa yang dgra par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams
26b3(brgyad stong): kyidabang po brgya byin la smras pa/ kau shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
26b4(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ba ngas khyod lnga bshad par bya'o// kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid la gnas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
26b5(brgyad stong): phyin pa la gnas par bya ste/ kr-i shi ka de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po blagos par shAgyur bar bya'o// gzugs la gnas par mi
26b6(brgyad stong): tsher rab snga ma yin 'du shes pa ma yin 'du byed snangs pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bya'o// mi gro la gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs la gnas
26b7(brgyad stong): par mi bya'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa dri mi bya'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gna' bar mi bya'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa las bang ba'i tshor ba la
26b8(brgyad stong): gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus dang yid la gnas par mi bya'o// sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos rnams dang rna ba'i rnam par
27a1(brgyad stong): // ba nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar la gnas par mi bya'o// 
27a2(brgyad stong): sa'i khams la gnas par mi bya'o// chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi
27a3(brgyad stong): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas par mi bya'o// yang dag par spong ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang lam
27a4(brgyad stong): la gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par mi bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid
27a5(brgyad stong): la gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na gzugs so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// 
27a6(brgyad stong): ltar na tshor ba'o zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes so zhes bya ba dang 'du byed rnams so zhes bya ba dang / de ltar na rnam par shes pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na mig
27a7(brgyad stong): gaM zhes bya ba nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na sa'i khams so zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa'i
27a8(brgyad stong): so zhes bya ba'i bar du gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang dbang / 
27b1(brgyad stong): dang byab sa dang / byang chub kya yan lag rnams sa nas bya ba dang de sbyar na lam kyu yar ldag gogs gnas par mi bya'o// dkyu blun thugs pa'i 'bras bu ra nas
27b2(brgyad stong): gda' par mi bya'o// de ltar na lan cig pir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba dang de ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba dang / de ltar na dgra bcom pa'o zhes gnas
27b3(brgyad stong): par mi bya'o// de sbyar na rang sangs rgyas sa zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na sangs rgyas so nas gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'o zhes gnas par
27b4(brgyad stong): bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba
27b5(brgyad stong): nas gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa bde ba dang sdug bsngal bya'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs
27b6(brgyad stong): ba dang mi stong pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa stong pa dang mi stong pa'o zhes gnas par mi
27b7(brgyad stong): gzugs badrag dang bdag med pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa bdag dang bdag med pa'o
27b8(brgyad stong): gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs sdug pa dang pi sdug pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnab par shes pa sdug pa
28a1(brgyad stong): dang mi sdug pa'o zhes gnas par ma bya'o// gzugs steng ba na nye bar dmags ngas gnas par mi bya'o// 
28a2(brgyad stong): bya'o// de bzhin du lhan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgya
28a3(brgyad stong): nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa sbyin pa'i gnas
28a4(brgyad stong): nas bya bar gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa'o nas gnas par mi bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong basbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi
28a5(brgyad stong): lhan cig phyir 'ong ba yongs su mthar ma phyin pa'i phyir 'jig rten 'dir lan cig phyir 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro nas gnas par mi bya'o// phyir mi re
28a6(brgyad stong): sbyin pa'i gnas so nas gnas par mi bya'o// phyir mi 'ong ba 'jig rten 'di dpyir mi 'ong bar de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 'dra'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// dgra bcom pa nye
28a7(brgyad stong): pi'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// dgra bcom pa 'di nyid du phung po'i phyag ma ma lus par mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur
28b1(brgyad stong): zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas ni nyan thos kyi sa las 'das nas sangs rgyas kyis ma thob par yongs su mya ngan las/ 
28b2(brgyad stong): 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas ni sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas ni so so'i skye bo'i sa las 'das pa dang nyan thos kyis las 'das pa da
28b3(brgyad stong): ngan las bzlas/ gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su nges par mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyis
28b4(brgyad stong): la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das bya'i dbyings su sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan
28b5(brgyad stong): las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes des 'di ltar yang gnas par mi bya'o// de nas yang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te sangs rgyas ni so so'i skye bo'i sa las 'das/ 
28b6(brgyad stong): ba dang / nyan thos kyis las 'das pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de/ gzhal du med grangs med
28b7(brgyad stong): pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su mya ngan las bzlas/ gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang yang dag par rdzogs
29a1(brgyad stong): ba'i sangs rgyas su nges par mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyi sa la bzhugs te sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su sangs
29a2(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi bya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes des 'di ltar yang gnas par mi bya na des yang ji ltar 'di la gnas par bya ci ltar bslab
29a3(brgyad stong): snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di
29a4(brgyad stong): ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgra par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci nig pa ga nas/ 
29a5(brgyad stong): shA rI'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yadu dag bur rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rje la yang gnas bla ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
29a6(brgyad stong): debazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni shin tu mi gnas pa ste de ni 'dus byas kyi khams pa srang mi gnasu gang dus ma byas
29a7(brgyad stong): khams la ldang mi gnas te de las bzhengs pa yang ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khwa 'dri skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa
29a8(brgyad stong): 'ibu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di lta bu nyid du gnas par bya deng 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ re ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
29b1(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'ga' zhig la gnas pa ma yin ning mi gnas pa yang ma len la mi mthun par gnas pa ma yin zhing mi mthun par mi gnas pa yang ba
