29b2(brgyad stong): de bzhin du gnas par bya'o snyam pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa ci ltaT de bzhin du gnas par bya'o snyam zhing de bzhin du bslab par bya'o snyam pa dang / 
29b3(brgyad stong): shegs pa'i gnas pa ci lta ba de bzhin du gnas na mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis legs par gnas pa yin no snyam du 'dis de ltar bslab par bya'o// 'di la byang chub sems dpa
29b4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen pos de ltar gnas par bya zhing de bzhin du bslab par bya ste/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab sde pha rol tu phyin
29b5(brgyad stong): 'i gnas pa 'dis gnas shing yid la byed pa 'di dang ma bral ba yin no// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha'i bu kha cig 'di skad du sems par gyur te/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod
29b6(brgyad stong): skyed gyi skad dang gnod sbyin gyi sgra dang / gnod sbyin gyi tshig dang danod sbyin gyi gtam du byas pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi rab tu brjod pa gang yin pa de dag klas pa ni shos par rung
29b7(brgyad stong): gnas pa rab ra gang 'tshod pa dang N+DI rjod bu dang rnyi di nye ra ston pa 'di ni shes par ming po rung sa nga dang lda 'i mgyur gyis sangs rgyas
29b8(brgyad stong): mthus lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid de lta bu sems kyis yongs su shes nas lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/ lha'i bu dag shes par mi rung shes par mi rung zhes bya
30a1(brgyad stong): / de ni 'di ltar 'di la cung zad kyang smos pa med de/ 'di la cung zad kyang thos bzed do// de nas lha'i bu de dag yang 'di snyam du sengs par gyur te/ 
30a2(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'byor 'dis ni gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro// e ma'o 'phags pa rab 'byor 'dis ni gsal bar byed par 'gyur te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor ra ring 'angs
30a3(brgyad stong): kyang ches ring du 'jug pa 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di ni phra ba bas kyang ches phra ba zab pa bas kyang ches zab par 'jug pas ston cing 'chad do snyam mo// de nas yang sang
30a4(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag de lta bas
30a5(brgyad stong): nanagang rgyun tu zhugasu pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa des bzod pa 'di la ma rten par mi 'grub po// de bzhin du
30a6(brgyad stong): sbyar te gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang phyir mi 'ong phyi'i 'bras bu
30a7(brgyad stong): por 'dod pa dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa dang / grang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'dod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa dang / 
30a8(brgyad stong): radangabyang chub thob par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la gnas par 'dod pa des bzod pa 'di la ma rten par mi 'grub bo// gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
30b1(brgyad stong): bar 'dod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'dod pa des bzod pa 'di la martan par mi 'grub pa// de nas yang lhari bu de dag 'di snyam du sems
30b2(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di la chos nyan pa rang bzhin ci lta bu zhig btsal bar bya snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems
30b3(brgyad stong): pa sems kyis shes nas lha'i 'ad dag la smras pa/ lha'i bu dag kho ma chos nyan pa ni sgyu ma dang sprul pa lta bu dag btsal bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni nyan pa
30b4(brgyad stong): 'gyur mngon du byed par mi 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor yang ci sems can de dag sgyu ma lta bu
30b5(brgyad stong): de dag sgyu ma ni ma yin nam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag sems can de dag ni snum lta'u lha'i du
30b6(brgyad stong): sems can de dag ni mi lam lta bu ste/ lha'i bu dag de ltar na sgyu ma dang sems can dag ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// de ltar na rmi lam dang sems can de dag ni gnyis su med
30b7(brgyad stong): gnyis su byar med do// lha'i bu drag chos thams cad kyang sgyu me lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa yang ska ma g+ha bu rmi lam lta bu'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras pa yang snga ma lta ba
30b8(brgyad stong): bam lta bu'o// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang na cig byar 'ang ba'i 'bras bu dang phyi ma 'di ba dang phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa yang sa ma lta bu rmigs du/ 
31a1(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lha bu rmi lam lta bu'o// rang sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lAm lta bu'o// rang sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// 
31a2(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang snga mya sti bu rmi lam lta bu'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang snyam lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// dri nas lha'i bu de dag gis rtse
31a3(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa rab 'byor pa 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sgra mo lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes zer ram yang dge par rdzogs
31a4(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes zer ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag mya ngan las 'das pa lung sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bur sman chos gzham
31a5(brgyad stong): smos/ lce'i bu de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor mya ngan las 'das pa ying sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes zer ram/ tshe dadi ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i
31a6(brgyad stong): dag bdag ni gal te mya ngan la sa 'das pa las khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos gzhan zhig yod kyang de yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes smra'o// 
31a7(brgyad stong): mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// de ltar na rmi lam dang mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// de na'i tshe dang / 
31a8(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams pa'i bu dang tshe dang ldan pa lto rings chen po dang tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA yan chen po dang tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang nya/ 
31b1(brgyad stong): chen po gzhan dag gis byang chub sems dpa' stong drag du ba dang thabs cig tu tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes pa
31b2(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bstan du 'di la su dgra yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gnas brtan de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang rdza
31b3(brgyad stong): padag phyir mo ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sam/ lta ba phun sum tshogs pa'i gang zag rnams sam/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa gang phyin pa de dag
31b4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa 'dil yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe drang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gnas brtan de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// 
31b5(brgyad stong): ngag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bshad pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin pa su yang mi 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di la chos gang yang ma smos chos gang yang
31b6(brgyad stong): yongs su spang bar ma byas/ chos gang yang ma bzhag go// de bsran ci ltar 'di la chos gang yang ma smos chos gang yang yongs su snang bar ma byas chos gang yang ma bzhag pa de
31b7(brgyad stong): bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin pa gang yang mr-i 'byung ngo // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te
31b8(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'byor gyis de ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa la bdag gis kyang mchod pa'i don du 'di ltar me tog dag mngon par sprul te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor
32a1(brgyad stong): / mngon par gtor to snyam mo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de'i tshe me tog dag mngon par sgrub nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la mngon par
32a2(brgyad stong): //  na sa snanA pas me bang pa ngas su sa sa ma cir
32a3(brgyad stong): rkyen gyis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'dri dag ni bdagra gas sngon chad sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lce'i gnas na yang yod par mA mthong ste/ me tog 'di dag ni skal pa'o// 'di ltar
32a4(brgyad stong): mas sde dbang pos mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni shing dang gel ba dang 'khri shing las skyes pa ma yin gyi yid las byung ba'i me tog go snyam pa dang / de nas
32a5(brgyad stong): pas kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'brags
32a6(brgyad stong): 'byor me tog 'di dag ni ma skyes pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid las skyes pa'i me tog ni gang yang med de shing dang gel ba dang 'bri shing las skyes pa yang ma yin no// 
32a7(brgyad stong): de nasuts+li dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi hU~M rtswa rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skrod ces smras s+ho// ko shi kra gang khyod 'di skad du me tog 'di drag ni mo skyes pa ste/ me tog
32a8(brgyad stong): ga ni yid las skyes pa ma yin gyi/ shid dang gel ba dang 'bre shing las skyes pa yang ma yin no zhes zer na/ kau shi ka gang ma skyes pa de ni me tog ma yin no// 
32b1(brgyad stong): rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ e ma'o 'phags pa rab 'byor ni shes rab zab ste ming dang chag tu btags pa de yang ston lnga de dang 'gal bar yang mi byed/ de
32b2(brgyad stong): gsapa 'ar byed cing de nyid kyang nye bar ston to snyam mo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags par
32b3(brgyad stong): de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor ci skad du nye bar ston pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'di la bslab par bya'o// 
32b4(brgyad stong): sa smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po dU n+ya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko ru shi ka de de bzhin no de de bzhin te de ltar byang chub sems dang
32b5(brgyad stong): mas dpa' chen pos 'di le bslab par bya'o// kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems drapa'i chen po de ltar slob na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mi slob po// ldan
32b6(brgyad stong): ra'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi slob phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la me slob dgra bcom pa nyid la mi slob po// rang sangs rgyas nyid la ma slob/ sangs rgyas nyid la mi slong ste/ 
32b7(brgyad stong): 'di dag la mi slob pa de ni sangs rgyas nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob po// gang sangs rgyas nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa de ni sangs
32b8(brgyad stong): nab du med grangs med pa la slob po// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhal du med grangs med pa la slob pa de ni gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob po/ 
33a1(brgyad stong): de bzhin du de tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes lngam yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin de rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ 
33a2(brgyad stong): gang gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa dang gang tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin gang rnam par shes pa 'phel
33a3(brgyad stong): bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi skyob pa de ni gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang dor bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob po// de bzhin du de tshur ba la ma yin 'du shes lam yin 'du byed/ 
33a4(brgyad stong): rnams la ma yin de rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang dor bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob po// chos 'ga' zhig yongs su gzung ba'i phyir yang mi slob
33a5(brgyad stong): rub ba'i phyir mi slob po// gang chos 'ga' zhig yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi sleb pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su
33a6(brgyad stong): rung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob ste/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob
33a7(brgyad stong): mas cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA rI'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang
33a8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos 'ga' zhig yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slobo nub pa'i phyir mi slo'i pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang / 
33b1(brgyad stong): sa su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir 'i slob rub pa'i phyir ba slob na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da ltar slob par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na thams cad
33b2(brgyad stong): nye la slo'i cing thams cad mkhyen po nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin de de de bzhin te/ tshe da
33b3(brgyad stong): ra'i bu byang chub sems dbar sems dpa' chen po gang chos 'da' zhig yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob pa de ni thangs cad ma
33b4(brgyad stong): kyang yongs su gu rung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob rub pa
33b5(brgyad stong): ngami slob ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing thams cad mkhyed pa nyid la nges pa
33b6(brgyad stong): dbar 'gyur ro// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems da
33b7(brgyad stong): ye shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang las btsal bar bya/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che rwa bos shes rab kyi phyi rol du phyin pa ri
33b8(brgyad stong): kyilazhums btsal bar bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / klu rnams kyi dbang po brgya byed gyis tshedang ldan pa shA ra'i bul 'di skad ces smras so// 'a
34a1(brgyad stong): 'di ltar 'bugs pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di mu'i mthur rig par bya 'di su'i byin gyi rlabs su rin par bya/ 
34a2(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ kau shI ka tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chang ba gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthur rig par bya/ 'di ni
34a3(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kau shi kA gang 'di skad du
34a4(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'byor gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bu 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di su'i mA 'ur rig par bya 'dri su'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya zhes zer ba ni kau shi ka bdag
34a5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa yang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthur rig par bya'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya'o// 
34a6(brgyad stong): sheka gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang las btsal bar bya zhes zer ba ni/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems
34a7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzugs las btsal bar mi bya/ gzugs las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba las ma
34a8(brgyad stong): na 'du shes las ma yin/ 'du byed rnams las ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las btsal bar mi bya rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o// de
34b1(brgyad stong): sde zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar gzugs ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs las gzhan na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin 'du shes
34b2(brgyad stong): yin 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin rnam par shes pa las gzhan na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// de skad ces dus
34b3(brgyad stong): dang lharnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyi
34b4(brgyad stong): bya chen po'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chud ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab
34b5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'phags pa ba'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha yas pa'i pha rol tu sbyin pa'o// 
34b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ de de bzhin no kr-i shi kA de de bzhin te/ kau shi kA 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// kau shI ka 'di lta ste shes
34b7(brgyad stong): sde pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chud ma me pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shri ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi ba ra loN+Di hrIdra pa 'di ni chud med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka 'di
34b8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs che ba'i phyo kau shi ka 'di sa ste shes rab byes rol tu phyi pa
35a1(brgyad stong): ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa rje ba'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi
35a2(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di ni pha rol du phyin pa chen po'o// gzugs chad ma med pa'i shri kA 'dis sa shes pa rol tu phyin pa 'di mi tshad mu med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
35a3(brgyad stong): ngar ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa tshad ma med pa'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
35a4(brgyad stong): thugs tshad med pa'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams da
35a5(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa chad med pa'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyi ro kau shi ka 'dri
35a6(brgyad stong): s+ya rab kye pha rol tu sbyir po 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin du rje rab dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes bya mtha' yas pa
35a7(brgyad stong): phyir kau shi ka 'dri lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma bo'i lus pa'i pha rob tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa chen po zhes bya bar ma
35a8(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshad ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du chad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du
35b1(brgyad stong): mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya bar mngon par chags par mi byed do// kau shi ka de lta bas na 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po
35b2(brgyad stong): ri sbed ma med pa'i phar ma sbyin ma// 'di ni da med pa'i pha ro tu sbyin / nI sh+leka'adi ma na'ams pa'i 'a la tu can pa'o// kro shA ka dmigs pa skye bya
35b3(brgyad stong): bu'i phyir/ 'dis ste shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ka sha ka sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'dri lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
35b4(brgyad stong): snyi po 'di ni mapa m+b+ha pa'i bla rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka yang ci ltar na dmig suM ma mtha' mas pa'i phyir 'dre/ ste shes rab kyi ba ba tu phyin pa di mtha' yas pa ba
35b5(brgyad stong): byin pa sbyin nan/ kau sh+mi kA 'di/ gyis thams cad kyi sogs dang dbus dang thus mi du lags te de bas na shi kaM di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sman sa
35b6(brgyad stong): pa rob tu phyin pA s+t+waM/ kau shi ka rnam grangs 'dis dmigs pa mthar yas pa'i phyir 'di sa ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi ba rjod na ldana' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
35b7(brgyad stong): na ma drog gi sre di sa sa shA las sa ma / de rnas pa zug pa yang byas sa mtshas yong mi dpags te/ de bgan ga shig sa
35b8(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyid pa'o// de ci'i'aphyi zhe na/ kau shi ka gzugs kyi thog ma'am dbus sam pa ma yang mi dmigs so// kau shi ka de ba'i
36a1(brgyad stong): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i thog ma 'am dbus snam tha ma yang mi dmigs te/ kau shi ka rnam grangs 'dis kyang
36a2(brgyad stong): dmigs pa mthar yas de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rab tu phyin pa 'dri ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka gzhan yang sems can mtha' las mya med
36a3(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can la thog ma 'am dbus sam tha ma yang mi dmigs so// kau shi ka de bas na sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu
36a4(brgyad stong): byin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor ji ltar
36a5(brgyad stong): na sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka bgrang
36a6(brgyad stong): bdang mi ldan pa'am/ bgrang ba mang bas sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// brgya byin
36a7(brgyad stong): gyigyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor 'o na ci ltar sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mthar las pa'i pha rol tu phyi
36a8(brgyad stong): rami brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ brgya byin gyis smras pa
36b1(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni chos kyi tshig bla dwags kyang mA yin chos med pa'i tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin te ming du btags pa 'din
36b2(brgyad stong): khur du byung ba'o// ming du btags pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'o// ming du btags pa 'di ni ba dag gi ba med pa'o// 'di lta ste/ sems can sems can zhes ming du ba
36b3(brgyad stong): 'di ni dmigs su med pa'o// gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis skas paM/ kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems 'di la sems can du yongs su bstan par byas pa gang yang
36b4(brgyad stong): yod dam/ btu byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gang la sems can du yongs su bstan par bya
36b5(brgyad stong): pa 'ga' zhig madra ba de lnga sems can mtha' yas pa yod dam/ kau shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs bla dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
36b6(brgyad stong): bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang bzhugs te/ mtha' las 'das pa rnam par rig par byed pa'i dbyangs dang gsung dbyangs za'i mos sems can sem
36b7(brgyad stong): can zhes tshig tu brjod du zin kyang da la sems can gang yang skyes pa 'am skye bar 'gyur ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ba 'am 'gag pa yod dam
36b8(brgyad stong): brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de ni masor no// rdo ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thog ma nas dag pa'i phyir dang thog ma nas yongs su dag pa'i phye
37a1(brgyad stong): pa 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka dam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i
37a2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa'o// kashi ka stong pa sems can mtha' las pa'i kyi/ g-isarab kyi ros tu sbyin pa mama'ayas pa ri gyi'o// de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i/ rnams dang
37a3(brgyad stong): tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / skye dku'i 'dag po dang bcas pa dang / drang
37a4(brgyad stong): brjod pa med du brjod de/ yema'i rgyatsho pom tsha sa ma'o chos rnams kyi chos nyid de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba gang med pa de ni 'phags pa gnas brtan rab 'byod kyis legs
37a5(brgyad stong): bar sres pas brjod cing bstan te bshad la rab tu bzhag go/ bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad bdag cig ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab
37a6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas pa 'di ni de bzhin gshes
37a7(brgyad stong): b.lags par 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang po dang bcas pa rnams dang tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa dang drang srong dang pa
37a8(brgyad stong): dang / skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin nod de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag gang gi cha rgyal ba'i pho brang 'khor na mar me can zhes bya
37b1(brgyad stong): snod dus kyi dbus sum me ma du de bzhin gshegs pa thab tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas m+b+ha rlung nang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral bar gyur pas/ 
37b2(brgyad stong): de'i tshe mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa na shA
37b3(brgyad stong): thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten rig pa skyes bu gdu
37b4(brgyad stong): bya'i lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i'abyung chub tu lung
37b5(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la rtswa'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
37b6(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgrub par byed pa dang rjes su yongs su 'dzin par byed pa de mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa shin tu ngo mtshar to zhes gsol to// 'phag
37b7(brgyad stong): da stong pa las brgya byin gyi le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam pa
37b8(brgyad stong): gsum pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor der lnga'i bu gang dag 'dus te 'khod par ltung ba dang dge slong dang dge slong sa dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen pa'i 'khor gang
38a1(brgyad stong): dag 'dus te 'khod par gyur pa dang / lha'i bud rnams 'dus te 'khod par gyur bar mkhyen cing 'khor bzhi po thams cad 'dus shing 'khod par yang mkhyen nas/ 
38a2(brgyad stong): 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang 'od gsapa dang dge chung dang 'og min ci lha'i bu rnams dbang du bzhag ste/ lha rnams kyi dpa
38a3(brgyad stong): po brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang tshangs pa chen po la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag
38a4(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang lel shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin tam 'cha dang ma klog gam kun chub par byed dam rab tu 'don na/ de la bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha
38a5(brgyad stong): thags lnga pa dang grags tshol ba dag gis thugs rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu me la mi rim mi ma yin pa glags lta ba dang glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags ched
38a6(brgyad stong): par yang mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dgang yang ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dag gzhan yang lha'i bu gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par
38a7(brgyad stong): dongogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang lha'i bu gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dam bzung ba dang ma bcangs pa dang sa klags pa dang kun chub par ma
38a8(brgyad stong): byas pa dang / ra'adu mi 'dod pa'i lha'i bu de dag rigs kyi bu da'i drung du 'ong 'dod par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chung
38b1(brgyad stong): par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de la nyan par 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur klag par 'gyur kun chub par byed par 'gyur rab tu 'don par 'gyur ro// 
38b2(brgyad stong): lha'i bu dag gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa de dgon par song yang
38b3(brgyad stong): nga shing drung du sang yang rung khyim stong du song yang rung bla gab med par song yang rung lam du song yang rung lam gol bar song yang rung 'brog dgon par song yang rung rgya mtsho chen por song
38b4(brgyad stong): yang rung de dang der 'gro ba'am 'chag pa'am/ 'dug pa'am nyal ba na yang rung ste/ 'jigs par 'gyur ba'am rengs par 'gyur ba nyid mi 'byud mi skye'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
38b5(brgyad stong): rgyal pa chen po ba nis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun
38b6(brgyad stong): chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'dod par 'gyur ba de ni dge pa gsum gyis sems can rnams 'dul bar bgyid cing sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi skyed pa ni ngo mtshar to// 
38b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol dudapyad pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klag pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang
38b8(brgyad stong): rab tu 'dod par 'gyur bde la bsrung ba dang 'askyab pa dang phra bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom sa dpal nyi dmas kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
39a1(brgyad stong): sa// 'das bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bum gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'od 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub bar bci dang

39a7(brgyad stong): bzung na pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad bzung bar 'gyur ram/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces byukral
39a8(brgyad stong): lus // kau sh-i ki da bzhin ni da pazhin te/ kau ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa zang bas ro rol tu phyid ba drug po thams cad gzung ba 'thung / no/ 
39b1(brgyad stong): gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'den pa dang 'chang ba dang klag pa dang / kun chubya bar byed pa dang rab tu 'don par byed na kau shi ka dgas kyi bu'am rags kyi

39b3(brgyad stong): gyis legs so zhes gastsol nas/ lce rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka
39b4(brgyad stong): kau shi ka de la gang zhig chos 'di la rtsod par 'dod pa dang rgol bar 'dod pa dang 'gal bar byed 'dod na/ rtsod par 'dod pa dang rgol bar 'dod pa dang 'gal bar

39b7(brgyad stong): dpa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'ang
39b8(brgyad stong): pa na 'i skyes ba da ma sa ma // cad par 'ad pa mas 'dzi pa
40a1(brgyad stong): 'dod pa de dag gi bsam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// kau shi ka rags kyi bu'am \u0f89\u0fa4 gyi bum gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
40a2(brgyad stong): dzin pa dang 'chang da srog pa dang sa rgyu 'i byung byud bu dang rnye du 'dor pa dang skyon nye bar smon pa dang / smang 'jigs pa drug/ 
40a3(brgyad stong): dug pa bkres shing zas 'dod de zas tshol bzhig gis srog chags su gyur pa 'aka' ni kwa mthong ste skye bo sbrul gdug pa des dus kyi phyir bza' bar 'dod nanus so
40a4(brgyad stong): chags su gyur pa de'i dri'i phyogs su 'brang zhing bsnyags pa dang de nas srog chags su gyur ba de ci ma b+hi gad na yod pa der song nas phyir te 'dug pa dang de nas sbrul de rtsi da'i

40a6(brgyad stong): shes kyi bu'am rigs kyi ba kod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'den pa dang 'chang ba dang klog par dkun chub par 'ad pa dong rab tu 'dod pa dang spyod pa dang nye bar smon pa dang
40a7(brgyad stong): phung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pad la de kau shika rtsod pa dang rgol ba dang 'gal bar byed pa reg ni skyes shing skyes pa gang yin pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzi brjod da
40b1(brgyad stong): skabs dang mthu dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs bskyed pas myur du de nyid nas med par 'gyur nye bar ni ning 'phel bar mi 'gyur te de gang dang ga nas byung ba de dang de nyid na
40b2(brgyad stong): nung par 'gyur la gnas par mi 'gyur ro// de Sh+Tib+hir nin/ shes ra kyi pha rol tu byed pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa nyid kyi bar du 'dzin padag nye
40b3(brgyad stong): ra byed de rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// kau shi ka rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad
40b4(brgyad stong): ras dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang rig gye bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pad
40b5(brgyad stong): don pa dang snyan pa dang nye bar ston pa dang yud 'bogs pa dang kha ton du byed pa de la srung ba dang bskyab pa dang sra bar byed de des tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag yongs su gzung bar 'gyur // 
40b6(brgyad stong): ka gzhan yang rigs kyi du'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba drang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang btu 'don pa dang stor pa
40b7(brgyad stong): ra lhod pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dag bton du byed pa rdo'i tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur tshig 'jam par 'gyur tshig ran par 'gyur tshig 'tshal ba med par 'gyur ro// 
40b8(brgyad stong): sanon par mi 'gyur/ dargyal gyis zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su dul bar byed shes rab kyi pha rolatu
41a1(brgyad stong): phyin pas yongs su 'dud par byed kho ba 'jam par ma byed/ brgyal 'bal bar mi byed khon du 'arjod 'ayongs su mi 'chang gnod sems yongs su mi
41a2(brgyad stong): bag sa nyal mi 'dzin to// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo ltar spyod pa de la dran pa dang byams paskye bar 'gyur zhing de 'ad snyam du sams te gal te 'dag gis gnod sems
41a3(brgyad stong): bskyed du zin na bdag gi dbang po rnams 'khrugs shing bzhin gyi mdog kyang 'gyur bas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs shing
41a4(brgyad stong): la slob par 'dod pa khro ba'i dbang du 'phro 'di ni mi rigs so snyam nas de myur du dran pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
41a5(brgyad stong): dra 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs bya dang kha tor du byed par 'gyur ba des
41a6(brgyad stong): 'di pa yon tan 'di dag kyang yongs su 'dzid par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces ga
41a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su dul ba dang khengs pa ma mchis pa'i slad
41a8(brgyad stong): gnas pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau she ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pang
41b1(brgyad stong): 'grar 'chang bar 'aslar klog 'ang 'gyur kun chub par byed par 'grar rab tu 'dran bur 'gyur snyan par 'byung nya bar sdud par 'gyur lung 'bagos par 'gyur kha tan brid par 'a
41b2(brgyad stong): dul te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu ra shes rab kyi la tu phyin pa'i de 'dor pa dang ching bded phrag pa da kun rtsub par byed pa dang ra' gyu dir 'ding snyan pad
41b3(brgyad stong): ba dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pas g.yul 'gyed pa'i tshi ga yul du thog mar zhugs par gyur na dag yul du 'dug gam ga yul du zhugs sam gdul les 'das
41b4(brgyad stong): yul gyi nang du 'gro'am 'greng ngam 'dug kyang rung ste/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di srid pa 'dzin pa 'am 'chang ba 'am
41b5(brgyad stong): ram kun chub par byed pa'am/ rab tu 'don pa 'am snyan pa'am nye bar ston pa 'am/ lung 'bigs pa'am kha ton byed po de srog gyi bar chad du 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/ 
41b6(brgyad stong): gnas ma la ne zhing go skabs med do// gzhan gyi gnod pa byed pas de srog gle bar chad du 'gyur ba 'di brang gnas ma yin no// kau shi ka y+yad gal te 'ga' zhig gis
41b7(brgyad stong): pa dbyug pa'am mtshon+da nam bod pa'am gzhan gyang yang rung bas 'phangs na de'i lus la phog par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rang
41b8(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni reg sngags chen mo'o// kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i rig sngags so// kau shi ka 'di lta ste she
42a1(brgyad stong): / kyi pha rol tu byed pa 'di ni chad med pa'i rig sngags so// ka shA ka 'di ga ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa di ni blan med pa'i rig sngags so// 
42a2(brgyad stong): shrI kA 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa med bye'i rlig sngags so// kau shre ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha ro tu phyin pa'i dri ni mi mnyam pa dang
42a3(brgyad stong): pa'i rigasogs so// de ci'i phyir de ra/ kau shi ka rig sngags 'di la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo na bdag la gnod pa bya bar yang mi sems gzhan lag
42a4(brgyad stong): bya bar yang mi sems gnyis ka la gnod pa bya bar 'a pa sems so// kau shi ka rig sngags 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thun

47a7(brgyad stong): rab dman pa rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o// kau shi ka de bas na de ltar rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang myur du bde bar tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
47a8(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas rgyun mi 'chad par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyen par bya'o// gzung bar bya'o bcad par bya'o klag par bya'o// 
47b1(brgyad stong): chub par bya'o rag tu gdon par bya'o bstan par bya'o/ nye bar bstan par bya'o// lung 'bogs par bya'o// kha ton du bya'o yongs su dri bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau
47b2(brgyad stong): 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu ma de dag 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyad bskyed pa'i tshu
47b3(brgyad stong): shes rab rje pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs pas/ bdag cag gis kyang 'di la bslab par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag cag gi ston pa'i zhes shes te/ 
47b4(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs kyang rung yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
47b5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya'o// kau shi ka debs nad ltar ri rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu po gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang nga
47b6(brgyad stong): ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mchod pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can skye/ 
47b7(brgyad stong): ma byed du bcug ste/ byas nas kyang des de pa ram 'tsho ba'i bar du lha'i me tog dang / lha'i 'dug pa dang lha'i dri dang rtswa'i phreng ba dang lha'i klag pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na bza' dang
47b8(brgyad stong): gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan dag dang khar yug tu lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag deng lha'i mtshad pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de pa
48a1(brgyad stong): rdzu da pa mar sh+nu da pa da pa byung rnam la ma ka sha~M ka \u0f7f snyam dumams/ ci dregs kyi bu lam rig sa bu ma pa
48a2(brgyad stong): las bsod nams mang du byed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegapa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de zas kyang / 
48a3(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di bsod nams ches mang du skyed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub tu sems
48a4(brgyad stong): skyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa
48a5(brgyad stong): dang kha tor byed pa dang gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang 'di'i dor rnam par 'grel pa dang yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang ci lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'a
48a6(brgyad stong): yongs su dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul tshun chad par ma gyur cig dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos lun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / 
48a7(brgyad stong): dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs bam du chud par byas te 'chang
48a8(brgyad stong): gas shes rab kyi pharol tu phyin pa la me tog dang badrug pa dang rje dang phreng ba dang phyug pa dang byem ngan paza' dag gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang bral ba dang bdun
48b1(brgyad stong): dang khyor lkug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa dam pa 'ang po dag gis mchod par byed nga/ bkur stir byed tha mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri myor byung bsnyen bkur byung
48b2(brgyad stong): kaushi ga ri sa rje klu ma rigs kyi rnam tshad nyid de blas mas pased rnams kyi phung pa meng du myed do// kau shi ka ran po ni ste bdun gyi rang bzhin gyis michod rternyed pa ni rag kyi
48b3(brgyad stong): 'i ring ba grol gyi snying po nar bye ba du ma nog+sa/ kau shi ka yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs rgya bra ma gang la las 'dam bu'i gling 'od kun tu rin po che sna bdud gyi rang bzhin gyim
48b4(brgyad stong): na bzhin / sa pa'i nga bam ma ma pab gyis yangs su gang shAr byang du bcug / byas nas cang dang myur pa'i tsha ba'i ba du sa me ti ga dang lha'i 'dug pa du
48b5(brgyad stong): dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i bag pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lnga'i na bza' dang wa'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i 'dan dag dang ShAr yug tu lnga'i bur me'i the
48b6(brgyad stong): ba dag dang ma'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de 'ag ster byeng tha bar byed rjed par byed mchod par byeng rimi dbyed bsnyer 'gar byed no/ kau shi ka ci snum
48b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi kad pas kyang rigs kyi ma rigs kyi ma 'dam pa med dmas chas mang du myed de/ gang sa rab kyi pha rim tu phyin pa 'di lams
49a1(brgyad stong): par dad de rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub tu sems paskyed nas lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa drang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun
49a2(brgyad stong): chud par byed pa dang rab tu 'dod pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang gzhan dag pa yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang 'di'i don rnam

49a8(brgyad stong): danams mang du spyod do// kau shi ka 'ang m+bu'i glang 'dir rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can rnams

54a4(brgyad stong): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis yongs su mkhyen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa
54a5(brgyad stong): mas la shin tu bkur stir bgyis pa dang bla mar bgyis pa dang rjed par bgyis pa dang mchod par bgyis pa dang ri mar bgyis pa dang bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro// 
54a6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khrims kyi sems can thams cad lta zhog/ bcom ldan 'das yang stong gsum gyi sto
54a7(brgyad stong): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can gang ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang sems can re res rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin
54a8(brgyad stong): sa pa'i ring bsrel gyi sring po can re re bgyid du stsal la/ bgyid du stsal nas kyang sems can de dag re res mchod rteni de dag thams cad
54b1(brgyad stong): bzhag ste/ bskal pa'am bskal pa bas lhag par sil snyan thams cad dang glu dpyad thams cad dang kar thams cad dang rol mo dang pheg rdob pa thams cad dang wa'i me tog thas
54b2(brgyad stong): da dang / lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha 'bye ma dang lha'i na baba' dang lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang rtswa'i bdad
54b3(brgyad stong): da dang khor yug tu lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag thams cad kyis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir bgyid bla mar bkying rjed par bgyid mchod
54b4(brgyad stong): byed ri mor bgyid bsnyen bkur bgyid pa bas/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'dis bsod rams che sa mang du byed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
54b5(brgyad stong): ngor par dang de rtag cing mis la sems dang bras byang chub du sems bskyed nas/ lhakA pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang 'dzid pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang gar chub par
54b6(brgyad stong): padang rab du 'dod pa dang ston pa dang nye bar stod pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton bgyid pa dang gzhar dag la yang rgya cherwa yang dag par stor pa dang 'di'i don rnam par 'gre
54b7(brgyad stong): yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang ci lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongs su dpyod par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul tshun chad par ma gyur cig dam pa'i chos du
54b8(brgyad stong): ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bkye ba dang / tshul dang mi bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems
55a1(brgyad stong): pa bgyis par 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs bam du chud par bgyis te 'chang ngam bzhag ma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug
55a2(brgyad stong): padang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dag dang khar yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang / 
55a3(brgyad stong): po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir bgyid bla mar bgyid rjed par bgying mchod par bgyid ri mor bgyid bsnyen bkur bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu
55a4(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid de bas bsod nams ches mang du spyad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
55a5(brgyad stong): de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu ma de ni de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang po skyed do// kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
55a6(brgyad stong): gzhi las bsod nams gzhal du med pa skyed do// kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams grangs med bskyed do// kau shi ka rigs
55a7(brgyad stong): ma rigs kyi bu med de'i gzhi las bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab bskyed do// kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mod de'i gzhi las bsod nams mnyam pa med pa skyed do// 
55a8(brgyad stong): shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams tshad med pa skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe ra/ kau shi ga na bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzob
55b1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skul mchod pa yang thams cad mkhyer pa nyid las skyes so// 
55b2(brgyad stong): yig de bas na de ltar rigs kyi bung po rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i di la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la sems dang pas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lhags
55b3(brgyad stong): bsapa pas nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar stor ba dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang gzhan dag la
55b4(brgyad stong): pang rgya char yang dag par ston pa dang 'di'i don rnam par 'grel 'ding yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang ji lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongs su dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
55b5(brgyad stong): chad par ma gyur cig dam pa'i chos rub par mgyur cig ces dam pa'i chos kun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
55b6(brgyad stong): pha gdags pa bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs bam du chud par byas te 'chang ngam bzhag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba
55b7(brgyad stong): dang byug pa dang bye ma de na bapa' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang bdan dag dang b+h+yor drug tu myur ma'i phreng ba dag dang mtshad pa rnam pa mang po dag gis kyang mchod par byed
55b8(brgyad stong): chod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de la/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten de ba
56a1(brgyad stong): gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can la bkur stir byas pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byas pa snga mdas brgya'i char yang nye bar ma 'gro/ stong gi cha
56a2(brgyad stong): yang brgya stong gi char yang bye'i 'char yang bye ba bcu 'char yang bye ba snying giser yang bya ba brgya stong gi char yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// grangs
56a3(brgyad stong): su yang nye bar mi 'gro'ochar yang bgrang bar yang dper yang dpes bstan par bya bar yang rten du yang chur yang mi bzod do// de nas lha'i bu bzhi khri gang dag lha rnams kyi dbang po
56a4(brgyad stong): brgya byin dang bcas pa la khor der 'dus te 'khod par gyur pa de dag gis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces sras so// grags po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bzung
56a5(brgyad stong): ka pags po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung bar bya ba yin no// bregs zo shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa bcang bar bya ba yin no// grogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
56a6(brgyad stong): zag par bya ba yin no// thogs zo shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gan chub par bya ba yin na// grogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu gdon par bya ba yin mo/ 
56a7(brgyad stong): klog pa po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par bya ba yin no// grags po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar bstan par bya ba yin no// grogs po shes rab kyi pa ro/ 
56a8(brgyad stong): nepa lung 'bogs par bya yin no// grags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa kha ton du bya ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lharna mas kyi dbang po btu phyin
56b1(brgyad stong): deskad ces bka' bral to// kau shrI ka b+h+yod kyi sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdung zhig/ kau shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chongs shig/ kau shwe ka khyad kyi
56b2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol ka phyin pa lhags shig/ kau shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun chub par gyis shig/ kau shu ka spyod kyis shes rab kyi yo tu phyin pa rab tu
56b3(brgyad stong): khyor shes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cig/ kau shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyirol tu phyin pa nye bar ston cig/ kau shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
56b4(brgyad stong): gcig/ kau shig kyad gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tan du byas shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka gang gi cha lta ma yin rnams 'di lta bur sems b+h+rUM rgya ba 'byung
56b5(brgyad stong): 'di snyam du sum cu \u0f7fgsum pa'i sa rnams dang 'ba' bar bya'o// ma na rtsa gsum pa'i sa rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed par bya'o snyamar/ de'i tshe kau shis
56b6(brgyad stong): sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dar yang byos shig khaton du byos shig dang lha ma yin de dag gi sems kyi rgyu ba de lta bu de dag kyang nub par 'gyur ro// de skad ces pa
56b7(brgyad stong): byam pa dang bcom ldan 'das la lhan mas mya dbang po \u0f7fsbyin sa'i slad tsam gsal te/ com ldan 'das 'dis ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid de dag gas
56b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'da' 'di lta se shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ding chad ma meng pa'i rig sngags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste shes rab kyi
57a1(brgyad stong): 'di ni tshad med pa'i rig sngags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gong na med pa'i rag sngags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di la skye
57a2(brgyad stong): shes rababye ma gyi sbyin pa sprin tan med ji rig smras sa nA~M dA ste ge slo kyi la phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa med pa'i raglu stegs sa
57a3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so// de skad ces gsalnga pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang
57a4(brgyad stong): brgya byen la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kau shI ka de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o// kau shi ka la
57a5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i rig sngags so// kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i rig sngags so// kau sheg 'di lta ste shes ra
57a6(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang na med pa'i rig sngags so// kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu smin pa 'di ni blan med pa'i rig sngag so// kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes bya/ kye pha rol tu phyin pa 'a
57a7(brgyad stong): mnyam pa med pa'i reg sngags so// kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi
57a8(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa'i rig sngags 'di la brten nas sngon kyang bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
57b1(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// kau shi ka ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bla na
57b2(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ci snyed pa de snyed kyang kau shi kya 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rig sngags 'di nyid
57b3(brgyad stong): tan nas blar med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka da ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
57b4(brgyad stong): gzhal du med grangs med pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngan par rdzogs par sangs rgya ba de dag kyang kau shi ka
57b5(brgyad stong): ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rig sngags 'di nyid la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya'o// kau shi ka

57b7(brgyad stong): rig sngags 'di nyid la brten nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyang 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan bzhi'
57b8(brgyad stong): nadu rab tu 'gyod do// byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten du rab 'byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag deng ldan pa'i gzugs med
58a1(brgyad stong): sgoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i mngon par shes pa drug rnams 'jig rten du
58a2(brgyad stong): 'byung ngo ro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sam cu cu bdun yad 'jig rten du rab tu 'byung du// mdoran na rgyas kyi phreng po brgyad khri bzhi stong yid 'jig rten du ra

58a4(brgyad stong): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ byam po bzhi pa/ kau shi ka gang gi tshe yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten
58a5(brgyad stong): mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba de'i cha yang kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rig sngags 'di nyid la brten nas kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

58a7(brgyad stong): pade dag kyang rjes su brtse ba'i phyir 'jig rten 'di la brten te dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag dang mi ldan pa'i bsam gtu
58a8(brgyad stong): shi 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag dang ma ldan pa'i chad med pa pa ni 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag dang ma ldan pa'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms
58b1(brgyad stong): bar 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag dang mi ldan pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga rnams 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper mazla
58b2(brgyad stong): 'khor la bdUr nas ldan dang skar ma thams cad skabs celta ba dang mdzachis par bar tu snang bar byed/ rgya mer rnams kyang sa sa kyis po dang mthucil 'bazhin du snang bar byed pa/ 
58b3(brgyad stong): shi ka de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'das nas dam pa'i chos 'jig par gyur pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
58b4(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du ma byung ba na/ lal chos spyod pa dang mtshungs par spyod pa dang zhi bar spyad pa dang dge bar spyod pa gang dag 'jig rten na rab tu

58b6(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes par rig par bya'o// kau sha~M ka gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

58b8(brgyad stong): yide la byed pa dang dran par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams de'i gzhi las tshe 'di la yan tar mang po rnams re bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang
59a1(brgyad stong): lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gastsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag
59a2(brgyad stong): tshwa 'di'i yon tan gang dag dang ldan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi kA rik+sha kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni yang ba ma spangs smras
59a3(brgyad stong): 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ dug gis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ mtshan gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ mes 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi

59a5(brgyad stong): la cal po 'am N+Dal po'i bu'am rgyal po'i blon po chen po 'am rgyal po'i blon po dag gis gnod pa byung zhing skyes na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dran zhing / 
59a6(brgyad stong): na du byed pa dag la phyir mi snang bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dang yang dran zhing kha ton byed pa de dag la rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i bu 'am
59a7(brgyad stong): 'byor blo chen po'im rgyal po'i thon pa dang glug sa b+hA ba dang / thugs tshol ba gang dag nye bar 'ongs par gyur na de dag gis klags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar la
59a8(brgyad stong): sa rab kyi phar ladu phyin pa yongs su 'azung ba'i phyir ro// der rgyal po'am rgyal po'i bu'am rgyal ba'i gyod pa chen po'am rgyal po'i blon po dag nye bar 'ongs na
59b1(brgyad stong): yang de dag smra bar 'dod cing gtam zer bar 'dod de yang dag par dga' bar bya'o snyam du sams par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
59b2(brgyad stong): 'dedi de sems n+dan thams cad kyi drung dbyams pa'i sems kyis byams pa nye bar bsgrub pa dang snying rje'i sems kyis snying rje nye bar bsgrub pas nye bar gnas bAr
59b3(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// kau shi ka de nyid kyi phyir na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang yang gdug pa deng sdig sbrul meng po'i dgon pa'i nang du song ba de dag la mi 'am mi ma yin pa
59b4(brgyad stong): thags lta ba dang grags tshal bod dag gis kyang kau shi ka de dag la sngon gyi las kyi rnam par sbyin pa mgau togs par grags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// de nas mu stegs can
59b5(brgyad stong): gzhan kun tu rtsa ba rgya klan ka tshol ba'i bsam pas de'i chu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'dres par gyur to// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mu stegs
59b6(brgyad stong): zhan kun tu rgyu de dag kyang nas 'ong ba mthong nas de dag gi sems la kun tu btags te/ 'di snyam du mu stegs can gzhan kun tu rgyu 'di dag kun ka tshol ba'i bsam
59b7(brgyad stong): sa ma ldan 'das gal ba de 'ongs kyis/ dag gis sems kyad mu stegs can gzhan kun tu tshu dgra bcom ldan 'das kyi rjod du nye bar ma'ang bar zla ba'i
59b8(brgyad stong): bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zad nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i phyogs cha ji snyed cig bzung ba de tsam zhig bdag gis drad pas bsam par bya kha ton du
60a1(brgyad stong): rab tu gdon par bya ste/ de ltar byas pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa lnga bar chad du mi 'gyur ro zhes bsams so// de nas lha rnams
60a2(brgyad stong): dbang po 'argya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zad naso shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i phyogs tshang snyed cig des bzung ba de skad tsam zhig dran pas bsams te/ 
60a3(brgyad stong): na du byas shing rab tu gdon par gyur to// de nas mu stegs can gzhan kun tu rgyu de dag rkyang ring ba bas kyang ches ring ba nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te sgo de
60a4(brgyad stong): nyid dang lam de nyid nas phyir log ste dong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te 'dir ci'i phyir 'di ltar mu stegs can gzhan kun du rgyu de dag chung ring ba bas kyang
60a5(brgyad stong): ches ring ba nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te stong nyid dang lam de nyid nas slar dong snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i de lta bu'i sems
60a6(brgyad stong): rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bul 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mu stegs can gzhan kun ta n+ya klan ka chos
60a7(brgyad stong): 'i bsam pa can de dag gi sems dag mthong nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa la bar chad byed par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam zhing ci nas shes rab tu
60a8(brgyad stong): bar byaskyegs ca gnan na du spyang dga' bar ma gyur cigasas pas/ khusngags can ga'ar kun tu mtshud bar 'dod pa dang rgal bar 'dod pa dang 'gal bar byed par 'ad pa
60b1(brgyad stong): mas bzlog pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dran pas yid la bsams te kha ton du byas shing rab tu btoran te lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi ltar ngas kyang gnang ngo // de ci
60b2(brgyad stong): she ra/ shA ri'i bu mu stegs can gzhan kun tu chu de dag gcig la yang chos dkar po yod par dngas ma mazang ste/ shA ri'i bu de dag thams cad ni klan ka tshol ba'i bsam pa dag ni
60b3(brgyad stong): 'gras pa'i sems kyis 'ang 'dod par gyur to// de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor bzhi po'i
60b4(brgyad stong): tshogs shing labang de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon du gyur cing 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spod pa'i ma'i bu 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur pa lags na 'dir ni ngas par byang chub sems
60b5(brgyad stong): mas dpa' chen po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur gyis mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i phyir bdag nye bar 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas bdud sdig can
60b6(brgyad stong): sa yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der nye bar 'ongs so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te kye ma'o 'di dag
60b7(brgyad stong): 'dud sdig can yin te yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das ka la ba der 'ongs pa yin gyi yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs kyi bkod pa gang yi
60b8(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i yan lag bzhi pa'i daphung gi tshogs kyi bkod pa yang ma yin/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs kyi bkod pa la
61a1(brgyad stong): ma yin no// shAg rnams kyi yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs kyi bkod pa yang ma yin no// lits+tsha nI rnams kyi yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi chags
61a2(brgyad stong): bkod pa yang ma yin gyi/ 'di ni bdud sdig can gyis mngon par sprul pa yin te/ bdud sdig can ni yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la glags lta ba dang grags tshol bar
61a3(brgyad stong): sems can rnams la gnang pa' bsam pa dang rdzas su 'brel ba yin no// de bdag zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dran pas bsam par bya kha tan du byu ba tu 'an pa
61a4(brgyad stong): snyam mo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rab tu phyin pa 'di nyid dran pas bsams shing kha ton du byas te rab tu bton par gyur to// lha rna mas
61a5(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin gyis ci lta ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dran pas bsams shing kha ton du byas te rab tu bton pa de wa de ltar bdud sdig can spro de nyid dang lam de nyid
61a6(brgyad stong): swar+ya log ste song bar gyur to// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i me tog man dA rab dag mngon par sel te bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'dag ma
61a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lha'i me tog man dA ra ba de dag mngon par rab tu gtor te/ 'di skad du kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yun ring mo zhig na 'dzam bu'i
61a8(brgyad stong): phreng ge mi rnams kyi nang du klang ra zhas ched du badzad pa ched du brjod nas/ yang skya'i me tog rnams bzung nas bcom ldan 'das gal 'dangar mngon por gtor mngon par rab tu
61b1(brgyad stong): gtor te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa dang slob pa dang shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa de dag la ni bad+mad
61b2(brgyad stong): pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i di gang dag gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la bgyi
61b3(brgyad stong): gyis pa lags na/ gang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang thog pa dang kun chub 'ar bskyed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'jigs pa dang kha ton bgying / 
61b4(brgyad stong): pa dang de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang / de nin nyid du rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lta ni smos te/ com ldan 'das sems can de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs
61b5(brgyad stong): ba la bsnyen bkur bgyes pa lags so// de ci'i srad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rab tun byed cing 'di las thams
61b6(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid brtsab par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste dper na rin po che dang rin pa che chen po gang yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni rgya mtsho chen pos rab tu
62a1(brgyad stong): lags/ de dag thams cad ni rgya mtsho chen po las btsal bar bgyi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin
62a2(brgyad stong): chen po na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phying+ga pa'i rgya mtsho chen po las btsal bar bgyi'o/ 
62a3(brgyad stong): da skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po bcu kun la 'dik+Sha ces bka' skal to// kau shi ka de de bzhin no de bzhin te/ de zhin ga
62a4(brgyad stong): pa dgra ba tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che chen po ni 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgya mtsho chen
62a5(brgyad stong): 'di las skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo sa 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyir pa'i bsngags pa ma
62a6(brgyad stong): gsung zhing ming yongs su mi spogs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mi lags/ con 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mal
62a7(brgyad stong): com ldan 'das ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thasngags pa mi gsung zhing bad longs la mi sngags kyi 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das ni shes rab kyi pha rol du
62a8(brgyad stong): pa gcig pu nyid kyi bsngags pa yongs su gsung ba dang ming yongs su sgrogs par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin na kun dga' ra
62b1(brgyad stong): bzhin te/ kun dga' bor ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na'i bsngags pa sla ba dang ming yongs su sgrogs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan gyi ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun
62b2(brgyad stong): dka' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po rnams kyi sngod du 'gro ba ste des na pha ral tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo// kun dga' ba de ci snyam du sems thams
62b3(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob par 'gyur ram/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
62b4(brgyad stong): so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/ kun dga' bo de ci snyam du sems/ de bzhin du yongs su ma bsdus pa'i tshul khrims dang yongs su ma bsdus pa'i bzod pa dang
62b5(brgyad stong): yongs su ma bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus dang / yongs su ma bsngos pa'i bsam gtan rnams dang / kun dga' bo 'di ci snyam du sems/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma
62b6(brgyad stong): bsngos pa'i shes rab kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes bya ba'i ming 'thob par 'gyur ram/ kun dka' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
62b7(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ci snyam du sems dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pas yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i shes rab gang yin
62b8(brgyad stong): de bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
63a1(brgyad stong): su yongs su bsngobs yongs su tho bar byed par shes rab gang lags pa da ni bsam gyis mi khya pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dri ni mchog tu bsam gyis mi kya
63a2(brgyad stong): go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/ kun dge 'thod lta bas na de ltar dam pa yin pa'i phyir de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob par 'gyur te/ nga
63a3(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyer pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa rnams pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob po// kun dga' bo de lta bas na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su
63a4(brgyad stong): bsngos pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i sngon du 'gro zhing 'dren pa yongs su 'dren pa'o// tshul 'das pha rol tu phyin pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na'i nang du 'dus
63a5(brgyad stong): kun dga' ba 'di sa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshig bla dgas so// kun dga' zed lta bas shes rab kyi pha rol
63a6(brgyad stong): yongs su bsgrags na pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su bsgrags par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper nas chen po la sa bon btab pa tshogs pa dang phrad na skye ba
63a7(brgyad stong): te/ sa chen po ni sa bon de dag gi gzhi yin pas sa chen po la brten nas sa bon de dag skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
63a8(brgyad stong): yang dag par bzung bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten pa yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bton nas pha rol tu phyin pa lnga skye bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
63b1(brgyad stong): sa yongs su parung ba byed pa ros tu gyu pan rgya'i sa pa kung pa/ da ldan pad nyid pa ros tu byed pa lnga rjod gron chen pa
63b2(brgyad stong): pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la sgo rnams kyi dbang po bcu byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das re shig shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bzung zhing bcangs pa dang
63b3(brgyad stong): padang kun chub par bgyis pa dang / rab tu bton pa dang bstan pa dang nye bar bstan pa dang lung phog pa dang kha ton du bgyis pas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos yon tan gang dag
63b4(brgyad stong): su 'dzin par 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan 'di dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bsgrags
63b5(brgyad stong): rem lags te/ 'on kyang gang zhig bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i phyogs gcig bzung zhing rab tu bton pa lags so// bcom ldan
63b6(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka legs sa legs so// kau shi ka yang gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang klan chub par byed pa dang
63b7(brgyad stong): rab dang spyod pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa de dag nyid 'bya' zhig la yon tan 'di dag 'byung ba 'bya' zhig tu ni ma zang rtsi
63b8(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo gang gis yang sangs rgyas kyi tshul tshun chad par ma gyur cig dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang
64a1(brgyad stong): bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phar gdags pa bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas
64a2(brgyad stong): glegs pas brgud par byas te 'amad dum bzhag lags rub rtsi par sa tu yin pa de la ma hag dang bdug pa dang dri dang byed pa dang byug pa dang phye ma dang rabara' dang / gdugs pa
64a3(brgyad stong): dril bu dang ba dan dag dang khor yug tu myur me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par
64a4(brgyad stong): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad pa
64a5(brgyad stong): mgyur cig dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par brdzi pa dang / chal dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
64a6(brgyad stong): masal phan gdags pa bsgrub pa 'byas par 'gyur bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dabris nas grags bam du chud par bgyis te 'chang dam bzhag la/ shes rab
64a7(brgyad stong): la me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phyed ba dang byus pa dang bye ma dang na ba' dang gdugs nang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang 'a dan dag dang khor yug tu mar
64b1(brgyad stong): phreng 'dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par bgyid de/ bkur snying bgyid tha mar 'gyid rjed par bskyed mchod par 'gyed ri mor bgyid bsnyer bkur bgyid pa'i rig
64b2(brgyad stong): kye bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sra ba bgyid par 'gyur na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun du ba
64b3(brgyad stong): par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'dod pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'phrogs pa dang kha tor du bgyid pa dang me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng bdang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bze'i dang
64b4(brgyad stong): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dag dang khar yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis kyang mchod par bgyid do/ bkur stir bgyid bla mar bkying
64b5(brgyad stong): dper bgyid mchod par bgyid ri mor bgyid bsnyen bcur bgyid pa tsa spos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rko ni ka legs so legs so// kau shaM ka yang rigs kyi bu 'am
64b6(brgyad stong): gas kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du byed pa na de nyid du lha'i bu brgya phrag mang po 'ong bar 'gyur/ lha'i bu stong phrag mang po dang lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po rnam
64b7(brgyad stong): chos nyan pa'i phyir nye bar 'ong bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu de dag chos nyan pa na chos sra ba de'i sobs pa nye bar sgrub pa snyam du sems par 'gyur// yang gi tshe lang chos sra ba de mi sra bar
64b8(brgyad stong): 'dod par gar pa de'i tsha lang lnga'i bu de dag gis chos la gus pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi phra mo de ji ltar srab nyid du 'dun pa de ltar spobs pa nye bar bslab par sems
65a1(brgyad stong): kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang ra
65a2(brgyad stong): 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed par 'gyur ba de dag tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// kA shi ka gzhan
65a3(brgyad stong): yang rigs kyi budam rigs kyi bu mo dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa nang la klar ka tshol ba'i bsam pas 'ga' nig rgol na mi rung ngo snyam du 'khor gyi mdur
65a4(brgyad stong): sems zhum par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'asrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sra ba byed de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa
65a5(brgyad stong): des ni klar ka tshol ba yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pas ni klad ka tshol bar byed pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // gang
65a6(brgyad stong): sa na ka btsal bar bya ba de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin byas
65a7(brgyad stong): yongs su bzung ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mol rnam grangs 'dis rgol ba gang yang mi 'byung ngo // de yang me dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu thug pa dang ldan par mi byed do// kau shi ka
65a8(brgyad stong): shes kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang
65b1(brgyad stong): kyang 'phyogs pa dang kha ton byed par 'gyur ba des tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag pa ma dang mang
65b2(brgyad stong): dang thor po dong gnyen bshas dang sdug gi gnyen mtshams rnams dang dge slong dang bram ze dag la yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de la pa rlo rgol 'byung zhing sbas pa dag chos dang ldan pas/ 
65b3(brgyad stong): dgacod pa la spobs yod cing nus pa med par 'gyur te/ pha rol gyis pargal ba na yang 'argal ba la lung ljon nus par 'gyur ro// rga sheg rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu ma gang shes
65b4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klag pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / ra/ 'angan pa dang ston pa dang nye bar sdud pa dang lung 'phrogs pa dang kha tor byed par 'gyur
65b5(brgyad stong): degs sde'u'am rigs kyi bu sgo des tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// kau sha~M ka yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs rje bu mo des phyogs gang du shes ra / 
65b6(brgyad stong): ba ro sha ldan pa 'di bris nas glegs pam du chud par byas te/ mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas bzhag par gyur pa der// kau shi ka rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dag ka nang na lI'i
65b7(brgyad stong): su dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang der 'ong bar sems te/ de dag kyang der 'ongs nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
65b8(brgyad stong): thegs pam du chud pa la lta bar 'phyar phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur/ 'dud pa byed par 'gyung 'dzin par 'gyur 'chang bar 'gyur klag par 'gyur kun chub par byed par 'gyur rab tu dong
66a1(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ston par 'gyur nye bar ston par 'gyur rur 'dogs par 'gyur kha ton byed par 'gyur te/ bltas shing phyag byas nas 'dud pa bya
66a2(brgyad stong): rung ba byas bcang ba byas klag pa byas kun chub par byas rab tu 'don par byas ston par byas nye bar ston par byas lung phog cing kha ton byas te yang phyir 'gro bar sems
66a3(brgyad stong): she ka sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha drag gi nang na lha'i bu grang su dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang der 'ong bar sems
66a4(brgyad stong): dedag kyang der 'das nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grags bam du chud pa la smra bar bkur phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur 'dud pa byed par 'gyur 'dzin par 'gyur 'chang
66a5(brgyad stong): ra'agyur klog par 'gyur kun chub par byed par 'gyur rab tu 'don par 'gyur ston par 'gyur nye bar ston par 'gyur lung 'bogs par 'gyur kha ton byed par 'gyur
66a6(brgyad stong): bsdus ying phyug byas nas 'dud pa byas bya rung ba byas bcang ba mamag pa kyus kun chub pa dbas rab tu 'don par byas sbyin par byas nye bar ston par shes lung bag cing
66a7(brgyad stong): b+h+yaswA te yang phyir 'gro ba sems so// kau shi ka 'thab bral gyi sgra dag gan du na lce'i buklung sa dag dz+nyAn med pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag pa
66a8(brgyad stong): 'ong bar sems te/ de dag kyang der 'ongs nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ad glegs bam du chud pa la lta bar 'gyur phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur
66b1(brgyad stong): 'dud bskyed pa gar 'dzin par 'am nga chung bar 'gyung ga pagazhu kun chub par byed pa klung rab tu 'don par 'gyur gan par 'gyur lta ba smon par 'a rtsags
66b2(brgyad stong): ma nyi byed pa shA smyeg khru dus pa skye dgas pa cing bzlas sag sa chub par byas dab tu 'don par byas kyi por byas kyi
66b3(brgyad stong): par byas lung phog tse tsun byas te yang phyir 'gro ba du sems so// kau sho ka dag 'a lngar gyi sgra dag gi na nu m+b+hi'i du gangs dag zan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
66b4(brgyad stong): btu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang derang 'ong bar sems te/ de dag kyang der 'ongs nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de glegs bam du chud pa la lta bar 'gyur byeg 'tshal bang
66b5(brgyad stong): slar 'dud pa byed par 'gyur 'dzin par 'gyur 'chang bar 'gyur grag par 'gyur kun chub par byed par 'gyur rab tu 'don par 'gyur smin par 'gyur nye bar ston par 'gyu ba zung
66b6(brgyad stong): gas par 'gyur ba ton byed par bskur to// bltas shing phyag byas nas 'dud pa byas bzung ba byas bcang ba byas klag pa byas kun chub par byas rab tu 'dzin par byas sten par
66b7(brgyad stong): sa nye bar ston par byas yung phog cing kha tan byas te yang phyir 'gro bar sems so// kau shi ka 'phrul dga'i lha dag gi nang na lha'i bu gang su dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
66b8(brgyad stong): du yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang dang 'ang bar sems te/ de dge kyang dang 'ongs nas shes rab kyi pha ral du byed pa 'di glegs bam du chud pa la sa bar 'akar phyag 'tshal bar
