123a1(brgyad stong): pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de snyed kyang rnal gyis gnon pa po mtshar to// dadas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsar ma'i ras kyi mam bu ma sogs
123a2(brgyad stong): du dag thams cad ma bka' stsal pa/  bu dag song gsum gyi srong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gar+b+ha klung ni bye ma skyed dag gi sems can rnams cang tha med pa yang
123a3(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i don du sbyin pa byin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'a
123a4(brgyad stong): palta nog/ lha'i bu dag rnam grangs 'dis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gzhan dang gzhan dag na sems can gang dag yod pa de dang

123a6(brgyad stong): gi bye ma snyed gzhan dang gzhan dag gi sems can thams cad la tshis gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang na pa'i gsos sman dang lo brad dang bde bar sna ba thams cad dang bde
123a7(brgyad stong): par gnas pa thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang bskal pa kang+ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug ste sbyin pa byin zhing / de bzhin du dmigs pa'i 'du shes can de dag thams
123a8(brgyad stong): sbyin pa byin pa'i bar dang / rnam grangs 'das sems can de rnams thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad re re nas yongs su brtags nas/ 
123b1(brgyad stong): re nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad kyi bar gyi bskam pa gad+hA krung sa byam skad du 'dug ste/ sems can de dag thams cad la chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang
123b2(brgyad stong): na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad dang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad dang bde ba la rig par gnas pa thams cad kyis rim gror byed cing / sbyin pa de yang dmilas pa'i 'du shes kyis byin la/ byang

129b5(brgyad stong): ga brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// zangs su yang bgrang bar yang dper yang dpes bstan par bya bar yang gzhir yang rgyung yang mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
129b6(brgyad stong): ngarnab sems dpa' de dag thams cad ni dmigs pa'i 'du shes can byes brtson 'grus yang dag par blangs te gnas pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'ang
129b7(brgyad stong): khams garda'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
129b8(brgyad stong): btu yang dag par zhugs nas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug cing 'chag pas mngon par gnas te/ bskal pa gang+gA 'bung dgi bye ma snyed du mi mi 'amad cing dregs pa dang
130a1(brgyad stong): gnyid kyis zil gyis mnon par dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis brtson 'grus yang dag par byangs te gnas pa la nog/ rab 'byor yang dag stong gsu
130a2(brgyad stong): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams g+hAm+bu'i'aM klung gi khyims kyi sems can dag thams cad blar med pa yang dag 'ang rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag pabazugs te dag
130a3(brgyad stong): cad bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas bskal pa gtA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du dmigs pa'i 'du shes can dag gis bsam gtan 'ani
130a4(brgyad stong): mnyam par gzhag la/ yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa gang zhig 'das pa dang ma bya

130a8(brgyad stong): sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang skar byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsgrug shing bsgoms te ga' mar
130b1(brgyad stong): mA lus par byas shing ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ste/ dam par dra gtso bo rang rab dang / mchog rab du mnom pa dang bla ma dang bla na med pa dang gong
130b2(brgyad stong): med pa dang gong ma'i yang gong ma dang mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang shin tu mnyam pa med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su yi dang bras rjes su yi
130b3(brgyad stong): ngal/ rjes su yi rang nas rjes su yi rung ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngon rab 'byor rjes su yi
130b4(brgyad stong): ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa can gyi bsam ka tran pa ni las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga ma des ni/ 
130b5(brgyad stong): r+ya'i char lcang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi char yang brgya stong gi char yang bye ba'i char yang bye ba largya'i char la dbye ba stong gi char la dbye ba byargya stong gi tshur+ya yang byi ba

131a1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad 'byed pa'i shes yongasu brda'ang sngags so// bcom ldan rang ba shes rab kyi pha rol kyi

131a4(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nye bar gas pa med pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab
131a5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten thams cad kyis nye bar mi gos pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snang bar bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan

131a8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bya

132b8(brgyad stong): shi ka yang 'ong bar pha rol tu phyin palnga po rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam du 'jug pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid sngon du 'gro ba yin ro// kau shi ka 'di la
133a1(brgyad stong): n+ya dbus mong brgya 'am song ngam brgya klong yang su yongs su 'dren pa med na lam du 'jug pa'i skam pa med cing gro dang ma grong khyer ram/ grong rdul du 'gro

135a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te de ltar 'tshal na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma mags na/ bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i

135a8(brgyad stong): sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bgyi'o// sems can mi 'jig pa chos

136a1(brgyad stong): shA pa'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' kul te// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems da' mam da de ni bcom ldan 'das rnams
136a2(brgyad stong): lnga bsnyen bkur byas shing yongs su dris nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes yang dag par // de ci'i phyir de na/ shA ri'i bu byang chud/ 
136a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sdems dpa' chen po gdul las ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen btung byas shing / yongs su dris nas 'jin rten gyi khams can dpo nas
136a4(brgyad stong): 'phos te 'dir skyes par gyur pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa dang smon pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'dogs pa nyan te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
136a5(brgyad stong): 'di thos nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la smyon par 'du shes skyed do// bdag gi smon pa mngom sum du bar te bdag pa mngo snyam du sems pa ngar
136a6(brgyad stong): bkyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'argyad pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'phrogs pas na brtags ma nateg char byed / 
136a7(brgyad stong): mas dpa' sems dpa' chen pa de ni yun ring por spyad cing tshul bsus 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin du rig par bya'o//  kyang chub sems pa sa dpa
136a8(brgyad stong): na po de ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkud bas pa de lta bu'i tshul du rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'dab pa ched ldan pa rab 'a
136b1(brgyad stong): to// bcom phan grangs yang shes rab kyi b.rom tu sbyin pa 'di mnyan pa'am rtogs pa ma byasan pa dang bskyed pa ma nye pa bzung bar nus sam/ shes rab
136b2(brgyad stong): kyepha rol tu phyin pa de ni 'di'o zhe'am shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de 'di la'o ni 'am shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni gu gi mo nog na'o zhes sam/ rnam pa dang rtagras dang
136b3(brgyad stong): ma 'das so zhes cang bstan pa'am mnyan par nab sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba stsal po rab ra de mi te byor shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa 'dra
136b4(brgyad stong): ni phung po'am khams sam skye mched du bstan pa'am mnyan pa 'am rtogs pa'am bsam pa'am bskrad pa'am nye bar gzung bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
136b5(brgyad stong): chos thams cad dben pa nyid dang chos thams cad shin tu dben pa ting yin+da pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bstan pa'am mnyan pa 'ogs pa'am bras
136b6(brgyad stong): pra'am bskyed pa'am nye bar gzung bar mi nus so// shrI sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phung po dang khams dang mched las smin na na yang med par rig par bya ste/ 
136b7(brgyad stong): byed zhe na/ rab 'byor phung po dang khams dang skye mched nyid stong pa dben pa zhi bas so// de ltar na shes de'i kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang phung po dang khams dang skye mched 'a
136b8(brgyad stong): gnyis su med de gcos su byang zed do// snang ba dang dben pa dang ni ze'i ra dmigs ma med de/ chos thamasakye me migs pa gang yin pa ma shes pa
137a1(brgyad stong): phyin pa zhes brjod do// gang gi tshe 'du shes pa dang kun shes pa dang btags pa dang tha snyad mi 'byung ba de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes
137a2(brgyad stong): bya'o// gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnal
137a3(brgyad stong): 'byor du bgyed pa de yun ring po ji srid cig spyad cing tshul bsrungs par rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
137a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dbang po dri rim pa yod pas 'di ni rnam par phye ste lung bstan par bya ba yin no// rab 'byor yang rnam grangs gang gis byang chub sems
137a5(brgyad stong): dpa' rnams sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dag mthong nas de dag gi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang
137a6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'del ma dang ma mos par 'gyur bya'i rnam grangs kyang yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thang
137a7(brgyad stong): nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa la mgus so// myu gus pas legs par mi nyan to// legs pa myi nyan pas
137a8(brgyad stong): bsnyen bkur mi byed do// bsnyen bkur mi byed pas yongs su mi 'dri'o// yongs sum dris pas mngon par mi dad do// mngon par ma dad pas 'khor de nas 'byol te/ 
137b1(brgyad stong): dag gni de las chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba dang / mthun pa'i las byas shing bsags la kun nas bsags shing nye bar bstsags pas daltar ldang shes rab kyi pha
137b2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dri'achad pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa nu ma gus pas 'byol ning ma drang la mos bur mi byed pas lus dang sems kyi tshogs pa sru pA par mi byed do// chogs
137b3(brgyad stong): bslab par mi byed pas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi shes mi mtho ba bong du mi chud rig par myi byed de/ de dag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyini pa sa ma dad par 'gyur ro// 
137b4(brgyad stong): mdad pa ni mi nyan to// mi nyan pa ni mi shes so// ma shes pas ni mi mthong ngo // ma mthong bas ni khong du mi chud do// khong du ma chud pa ni chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba dang mthur
137b5(brgyad stong): pa'i las byed yang dag par sogs par byed kun tu sogs par byed nye bar sogs par byed do// de dag chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i las byas pa dang bsags pa
137b6(brgyad stong): rang ban nus pas skyes pa kyi 'ab tshal bar brgyang ba na mngon bu 'a byed pa la // da skyes rab tshus byar 'byur ba dang
137b7(brgyad stong): mthun pa'i las mngon par 'dus byas pa dang bsags pa dang kun nas bsags pa dang nye bar bsags pa des shes rab kyi pha rol
137b8(brgyad stong): nye bar son pa na spong bar 'byur srung ba 'thur mi snyan par brjod par 'gyur te skur nas kyang 'grol bar 'gyur ro// rab byo yang shes rab kyi pha rol dbyer pa 'di song bab
138a1(brgyad stong): srur ba dang mi snyan par brjod pas ni 'das pa dang ma byor pa dang daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid spangs pa
138a2(brgyad stong): 'brur srur bar 'gyur mo sbyin par brjod par 'gyur te/ de dag rang gi rgyud bcom dad bsgrags napa blo chung ba shes rab chung ba bsod nams chung ba dge ba'i rtsa brkyang ba'i gang
138a3(brgyad stong): zag dad pa tsam dang ldan pa dga' ba tsam dang ldan pa/ dang pa tsam dang ldan pa 'dun pa tsam dang ldan pa las dang po bskal pa med pa'i rang bzhin can gnar rnams kyi yang dad pa
138a4(brgyad stong): tsam dang dka' ba tsam dang dang ba tsam dang 'dun pa tsam de lang phyir zlog cing 'brel par byed ldog par byed de/ 'di la bslab par mi bya'o zhes smra zhing 'din sangs rgyas kyi gsung
138a5(brgyad stong): pa yin no zhes tshig tu brjod par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag bdag gi rgyud bcom ning phral te dezhan gyi hud kyang bcom zhing phral nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gyur ba
138a6(brgyad stong): 'debs par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skur bya btab na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la skur ba btab bar 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gyur ba
138a7(brgyad stong): btab na 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skur pa btab par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
138a8(brgyad stong): drung nas 'byol bar 'gyur/ chos kyis yongs su btang bar 'gyur dge 'dun las yongs su phyi rol tu 'gyur ro// de ltar de rnams thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams
138b1(brgyad stong): cad du thams cad dkon mchog gsum las phyi rol tu 'gyur te/ de dag sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba nye bar gcod par byed pas sems can dmyal ba chen po
138b2(brgyad stong): rnam par smin par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i las nye bar sogs par 'gyur ro// de dag de lta bu'i lus mngon par 'du byed pa dang nye bar ba nag pa dang kun nas bsrung ba
138b3(brgyad stong): sa phongs par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa dang / shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i rang bani na de nyid kyis po brgya phrag mang po dang lo stong phrag mang po dang lo btu
138b4(brgyad stong): phung po dang lo bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang lo bye ba stong phrag mang po dang / lo bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang lo bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal
138b5(brgyad stong): chen po rnams su ltung bar 'gyur ro// de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po nus sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de dag de ltar yun ring por se
138b6(brgyad stong): dang bral ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho bya na mes 'jig pa'i bskal pa 'thung bar 'gyur ro// mes 'jig pa'i bskal pa nyung ba na 'jig
138b7(brgyad stong): khams gzhan dag na sems can dmyal ba chen po gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'dor bar 'gyur te de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu sbyang bar 'gyur ro// 
138b8(brgyad stong): 'or te sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu ltung bar gyur pa de dag deng yang sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho ba na / 
139a1(brgyad stong): de dag der yang sems can dmyal ba chen po nus sems can dmyal bu chen por 'bob na de yang slar de kho na bzhin du mes 'jig pa'i bas
139a2(brgyad stong): pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de dag mes 'jig pa'i bskar ba byung ba nas shi 'phos ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na sems can dmyal ba chen po yod pa der 'dor
139a3(brgyad stong): te de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// der yang de kho na bzhin du sems can dmyam pa chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho bar 'gyur
139a4(brgyad stong): de dgra der yang yun ring por sems can dmyal ba chen po de nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho ba na der yang mes 'jig pa'i bskal pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de da
139a5(brgyad stong): tu mes 'jig pa'i bskal pa byung ba na yang de dag de nas shi 'phos te/ las ma zad cing lhag ma dang bcas pa'i las de nyid kyis slar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'dor bar
139a6(brgyad stong): 'gyur zhing bor bar gyur pa na yang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de dag slar sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su sems can dmyal ba'i
139a7(brgyad stong): sdug bsngal chen po de dag myong bar 'gyur te ji srid du mes 'jig pa 'byung bar 'bur ba de srid du myong bar 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag sdug bsngal mang po myong ba dang mthur
139a8(brgyad stong): 'i las nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de lta bu'i tshig gi nyes pa smras pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'din
139b1(brgyad stong): ces 'asol to// bcom ldan 'das mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i khab bcis shing nye bar bsags pa rnams ni/ yid kyis nongs par spyad pa dang dug gis nongs par/ 
139b2(brgyad stong): spang pa 'di'i gzugs brtan nam rjes su mthun pa'am tshul mthun pa tsam yang ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsab pa/ de de bzhin no shA ri'i bu de de
139b3(brgyad stong): bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu mtshoms med pa lnga'i las byas shing nye bar bsags pa rnams ni yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ngag gi sa nyes par spyad pa'i las byas shing bsags te
139b4(brgyad stong): kun nas bla sags pa dang nye bur bsaklas pa 'di gzugs brnyan nam rjes su ma thun pa'am/ tshul mthun bcom lar ma yin no// gang cu dag shes rab sde pha rol
139b5(brgyad stong): pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston phra la phyir gzhil bar sems shing skur bar 'gyur mi snyan par zer bar 'gyur te/ 'di ma bslab par mi bya'o zhes smra bar
139b6(brgyad stong): lala'adi ni de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa ma yin no zhes tshig smra bar 'gyur shing sems can gzhan dag kyang de dang bral bar byed pa de dag ni rang gi hud bcom nas gzhan
139b7(brgyad stong): da kyang 'joms par 'thur/ rlung gi rgyud dug can du byas nas kurnyan gyi rgyud kyang dag can du byed par 'gyur/ rang nyid brlag nas gzhan yang brlag par byed pa
139b8(brgyad stong): bdag nyid kyang shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa zab mo mo shes ma rtogs la gzhan dag kyar 'dos bslab par ma byan zhes 'dzin du 'jug pa ni// shA ri'i rdzo ga bkang
140a1(brgyad stong): lta bu'i rang bzhin n+dan ni blta bar yang ngas mi gnang na de dag dang 'grogs pa lta ci smos rnyed pa dang bkur sna lta ci spos gnas nga lnga ni smos/ 
140a2(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi gang zag de dag ni chos la sun 'byin par rig par bya ba yin no// shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu'i rang bzhin can de dag na
140a3(brgyad stong): 'dab rul pa lta bur gyur par rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu de dag ni nag po'i rang bzhin can nag po nye bar snyed par rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bu ga
140a4(brgyad stong): zag de lta bu de dag las gang dag mnyan pa dang dad par bya bar sems pa de dag thams cad kyang tshul ma yin pas brlag par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gang dag shes ra
140a5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa la sun 'byin pa de dag ni shA ri'i bu ches la sun 'byin pa'i gang zag tu rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag
140a6(brgyad stong): skyes shing sems can dmyal ba chen po na mchis pa de'i lus kyi tshad mi ston to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gang zag sems can dmyal ba che
140a7(brgyad stong): dad skyes pa de'i lus kyi tshad lta zhog cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zag de lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi lus kyi tshad thos nas khrag dran po kha nas skrag cing 'chi bar 'arlang ba'am
140a8(brgyad stong): tsho ba tsam ma ma sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dang nad kyis reg cing tshig pa 'am de la mya ngan gyi zug rngu zhugs pa 'am g.yangs chen por ltung ba 'am skam pa 'am rnyed par gyu
140b1(brgyad stong): nami rung bas na gang la nyes pa de dag yod pa'i lus de'i tshad 'jigs pa chen po can de lta bu 'os par mnur cig ces/ bcom ldan 'das nis sus de'i tshad 'di tsam bur gyur ro zhes/ 
140b2(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bul go skyabs ma phye'o// len gnyis lan gsum du ya bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// gang zag de
140b3(brgyad stong): lus kyi tshad kyis phyi ma'i skye bo la snang bar bgyis par 'gyur bas ngag dang yid cims byas shing bsags pa dang kun tu bsags pa dang nye bar bsags pa 'dis sems
140b4(brgyad stong): can dmyal ba chen po'i lus 'di lta bu chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
140b5(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gang dag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pa mngon par 'dus byas pa bsags shing kun nas bsags pa nye bar bsabla/ 
140b6(brgyad stong): pa 'dis yun rang po 'di tsam du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyis phye ma'i skye bo la snang ba byas par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sdug bsngam de nyid la gnal du
140b7(brgyad stong): padang sdug bsngal mang por bshad pa gang yin pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag dkar po'i skal ba can rnams skyo bar 'gyur zhing de nas de chos kyis
140b8(brgyad stong): byang 'jur ba de mthun pa 'ims de dag las rnam par ldog cing bsad nams mngon par 'du byed pa 'a byed do// bdag cad de dang 'dra ba'i sdug bas pa dang phrad par ma
141a1(brgyad stong): 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos spong bar myi byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
141a2(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos lus kyi las dang ngag gi yo sa dang yid kyi las shin tu bsdam par bci'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
141a3(brgyad stong): 'das de ltar ngag gis nongs par smras pa de lta bu'i ngo bos bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po chen po 'di skyes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das yang las gang gis bsod nams
141a4(brgyad stong): ma lags pa'i phung po chen po 'di skyis par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dag gis nyes par spras pa de lta bu'i ngo bos bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung
141a5(brgyad stong): po chen po 'di tsam skyes so// rab 'byor gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di sun dbyung bar sems par 'gyur skur par sems par 'gyur phyir gzhis par sems par
141a6(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba'i skyes bu gti mug can de dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di nyid du rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di phyir bcil na sangs rgyas bcom
141a7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub sdung phyir bcil bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub phyir bci ldan 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/ 
141a8(brgyad stong): kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir bcil bar 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen po nyid phyir bci la na dam pa'i chos phyir bcil bar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos phyir bcil/ 
141b1(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phyir bcil bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phyir brtsi ba bde stan ni dgon cog ga ltas thams cad nas
141b2(brgyad stong): thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad phyi rol du gyur pa yin pas ches gnas du med cing grangs med pa'i mi dge ba'i las chen po mngon par 'du byed pa yongs su 'dzin par
141b3(brgyad stong): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor cis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bum
141b4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la phyir gzhil par sems pa de'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang 'gos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'amar
141b5(brgyad stong): bu mo de bdud rtsikyis byin gyis brlabs pa'am/ shes rab 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i ngag gi las kyis 'di chos zab mo dal pa'i dad cing rab tu dad par mi 'gyur te/ 
141b6(brgyad stong): byar sdig pa'i chos 'di gnyis dang ldan pas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la phyir 'jig ba 'dur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes
141b7(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa na phyir gzhil bar sems par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni rnama' bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rigs
141b8(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo smin pa'i thugs pa'i lag tu son par 'byung ba'am/ mngon par mi brtson par 'gyur ba 'am/ phreng po ma mngon par zin par 'byur
142a1(brgyad stong): phyin pa brgyad stong pa las dmyal ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bdun pa'o// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po dgu pa/ 
142a2(brgyad stong): do nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par mi brtson pa dang
142a3(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bral ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song bas myos par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no rab 'byor de de
142a4(brgyad stong): zhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par mi brtson pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba chung pa dang blo ldan pa dang don du mi gnyer ba dang thos pa nyung ba
142a5(brgyad stong): shes rab zhan pa dang sdig pa'i grogs pos nye bar brtan pa dang legs par mi nyan pa dang / mi 'dre ba'i rang bzhin can dang dge ba'i chos la mi brtson pas mos
142a6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das e mra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mos par dka' ba'i slad du 'di ci tsam du zab pa ldags/ 
142a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ rab 'byor gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyi
142b1(brgyad stong): gzugs ma bcings ma gyo pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams pa rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir ne na/ ra
142b2(brgyad stong): 'byor rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol bya'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' ma brjing ba ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
142b3(brgyad stong): 'byor gzugs la sngon gyi mtha'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzugs kyi phyi ma'i mtha' ma bcid sngam grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs la phyi mra'i
142b4(brgyad stong): mtho' ba nyid med pa'i phyir ro// rab byeng gzugs kyi daltar byung ba ma bcings ma tham pa'o// rdotso phyir nan/ rab 'byor gzugs la du ltar byed ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i

149a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gang gi phyir de ltar ci srid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chags pa dang bcas pa nyid dang chags pa ma mchis pa nyid bshad pa
149a4(brgyad stong): ngomatshar te// bcom ldan 'das byis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa
149a5(brgyad stong): ma du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed nams dang gal te rnam par shes pa la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa
149a6(brgyad stong): med pa'o snyam du bsod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mid la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med
149a7(brgyad stong): snyam du mi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yod do// de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi
149a8(brgyad stong): don shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// sa'i khams la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam par
149b1(brgyad stong): shes pa'i khams kyi bar la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa ngo snyam du rje spyod shes rab kyi par lasu phyin pa la spyod do// sbyin byang pha rol tu dran pa la chags pa dang bcas par
149b2(brgyad stong): ma pa med pa'i skye ba ma su na shes dab che pa rdo tu phyin pal gyud/ de bzhin du rdul khrims da ro phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi phyi rol tu
149b3(brgyad stong): phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'osnyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ban
149b4(brgyad stong): tub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dngas so yang dag par rig pa dang sangangs rgyas kyi chos mo 'dres pa bco brgyad la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chag
149b5(brgyad stong): da pa 'os pa du mi smod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi phar
149b6(brgyad stong): dpal smad do// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngag bcom pa nyid la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod
149b7(brgyad stong): pa da do//  sa sa gas pa rgyas padu chags skyed ra sa rgyun la spyod de/ 
149b8(brgyad stong): pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor ga mo te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang tshogs pa dang bcas pa dang
150a1(brgyad stong): pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed do// rab 'byor bya chu sad pa dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ltar spyod pa ni gzugs la chags pa/ 
150a2(brgyad stong): ma skyed do de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes lam yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin rnam par shes pa la chags pa mi skyed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por
150a3(brgyad stong): ltar skyed na mig la chags pa mi skyed pa nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar la chags pa mi skyed/ sa'i khams la chags pa mi skyed pa nas rnam par shes pa'i kham
150a4(brgyad stong): kyi bar la chags pa mi skyed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa mi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma yin bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma yin brtson 'grus kyi la
150a5(brgyad stong): phyin pa la ma yin bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma yin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa mi skyed/ byang chub kyi phyogs rnams la ma yin stobs rnams la ma yin
150a6(brgyad stong): pa 'jigs pa rnams la ba yin so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la ma yin sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa btso ba khyod rnams la chags pa mi byed do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
150a7(brgyad stong): bu la chags pa mi skyed lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma yin phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma len dgra bcom pa nyid la chags pa mi skyed/ rang sangs rgyas nyid la chags pam/ 
150a8(brgyad stong): skyed/ sangs rgyas nyid la chags pa mi skyed/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang chags pa ma snyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma chags pa ma
150b1(brgyad stong): bcings pa mgrel ba yang dag par ma 'das pa'o// rab 'byor da ltar chags pa thams cad las rab tu brnab ni byar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
150b2(brgyad stong): phyin pa la smad par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos 'di ni zab ste/ de ni bstan kyang mi 'grib ma bstan
150b3(brgyad stong): kyang ma 'grib bstan kyang mi 'phel ma bstan kyang mi 'phel ba ni ngo mtshar to// de skad ces gsol ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ 
150b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor legs so legs so// rab 'byor de de bzhin ne de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci srid
150b5(brgyad stong): che ba'i bar du bzhugs shing nam mkha'i bsngags pa brjod kyang nam mkha' yongs su 'phel bar mi 'gyur bsngags pa mi brjod kyang nam mkha' yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro// rab
150b6(brgyad stong): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na snga ma'i skyes bul bsngags pa brjod kyang rjes su chags par yang mi 'gyur kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ bsngags pam brjod kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyur kur
150b7(brgyad stong): / mangs par pa 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du chas rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de yang bsnyen kyang nga snyed du zad dom bstan kyang de snyed du zad do// gnas brtan rab 'khor gyis
150b8(brgyad stong): pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ma 'di la spyod cing shes rab kyi ro rol tu phyin pa sgom pa gang zhig zhul
151a1(brgyad stong): bar mi bgyid la l+ya por mi 'gyur te 'di la rnal 'byor du yang bgyid la zhing mi ldog pa na dka' ba brgyad pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di la ste shes rab kyi pharol
151a2(brgyad stong): snro bu dzi papa 'thos pa gsaso / bcom ldan 'as nga na ba skyem sa sems pag gshes sa da gapa nasapa
151a3(brgyad stong): lpags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'go bar 'tshal ba de ni nam mkha' dang lhan cig go cha bgo bar 'tshal ba lags so// gang
151a4(brgyad stong): zhig nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems can chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sems can rnams kyi slad du go chu bgo bar 'tshal ba ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems da
151a5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa lags te bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bo lags so// blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs
151a6(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal 'di ni bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' yongs su thar bar 'tshal ba lags so// de ni bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' 'deg
151a7(brgyad stong): par 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sems can rna
151a8(brgyad stong): du cha 'tshal ba de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha chen po thob pa lags so// de nas dge slong gnon zhig gis bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su rnal
151b1(brgyad stong): postong pa btad nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyis
151b2(brgyad stong): ral tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang me skyed chos gang yang 'gog par mi bgyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la lha rnams kyi dbang po badz+ra b+hin b+his 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa
151b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la de ltar rnal 'byor du byed pa de nI la rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
151b4(brgyad stong): 'di la rnal 'byor du byed pa de ni nam mkha' la rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa 'di la slob cing rnal 'byor du byed pa sems pa de ni bla gab med pa
151b5(brgyad stong): pharnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po 'argya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes
151b6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba ci zhig bgyi ba bka' stsal bar gsol// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lharnams kyi dbang po ba
151b7(brgyad stong): la'adi skad ces smras so// kau shi ka chos gang la bsrung ba dang bslab pa dang sba bar bya ba'i chos de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor dan
151b8(brgyad stong): ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ zho sheg gal te de ltang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chem tsha shes rab kyi pha rol phyi pa ni sngar bshang ba 'di la gnas pa nyid nge la 'thung ba
152a1(brgyad stong): skyob pa dang sbed par 'gyur ro// de ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na ni mi dang mi ma yin pa de la glags la ba dang glags tshol ba dag gis glags rnyed
152a2(brgyad stong): do// kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la 'azung ba dang bsgrub pa dang sba bar bya bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' lang srung
152a3(brgyad stong): da sgrub pa dang sra par bya 'a sems so// kau she ka 'di ci snyam du sems khyod kyis brag cha la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar byed par nus sam/ brgya sbyin gyis smras pa/ 'phags par nga/ 
152a4(brgyad stong): bya de ni pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod cing gnas pas ni chos thams
152a5(brgyad stong): cad kyang brag cha lta bur yongs su shes so// de bas na de la rlom sems su mi byed yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi shes yang dag par ye shes chos de dag kyang med cing yang dag par mi snang la
152a6(brgyad stong): yang dag pa 'ad ci me dmyigs songo/ sa gnas te gal te de ltar gnas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
152a7(brgyad stong): khams na rgyal po chen po bzhi po dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin thams cad dang tshangs pa chen po thams cad dang mi mjed kyi bdag pa tshangs pa chen po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad
152a8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gal 'der 'ongs te lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskur ba byas nas phyogs
152b1(brgyad stong): la dang // phyogs gcig tu 'khong ba btul ba chen po dadag dang / mas kyi dbang 'bargya gyu thams cad dang tshangs pa chen pa thams cad dang tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi 'dag byas
152b2(brgyad stong): su tsam ngas sargyas ng+ge d+han rlabs kyis meng pa sa nga dag gis mnga'adidag nyid dang tshig 'di dag tad dang lag 'di dag nyid dang rab 'byor ces bya ba'i dge slong
152b3(brgyad stong): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid nye bar bstad cing // der yang lharnams kyi dbang po brgya byen rams nyid kyis yongs su
152b4(brgyad stong): yongs su zhus te sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bshad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas kyang bla na meng 'a yang dag pa
152b5(brgyad stong): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur ba shes par gyur to// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pa
152b6(brgyad stong): phyin pa brkyang stong pa las rnamya par dag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u skye brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
152b7(brgyad stong): 'angs shes rab sde pha rol tu phyin pa nas brtse ba 'drin ming rnam yi// ming de yang 'diro zhes med migs te drug gi dngos pa 'di nyid meng zhes bgyi'o// she rab kyi pha rol tu tu
152b8(brgyad stong): ma mchis mi dmigs te/ ming ci rtsa ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ci lta bar ming yang de bzhin te/ chos 'dig
153a1(brgyad stong): ma mchis shing mi dmigasan/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pabla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
153a2(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs pangs su rgyas nas/ myi 'didag nyid da pa ga 'di dag nyid deng myig 'di dag nyid kyis sa phyogs khyod nyid du ste rlob kyi pha rol tu ldan pa 'di nyid 'tshod par
153a3(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
153a4(brgyad stong): chen po byams pa ni gzugs rtag pa mu yin mi rtag pa ma yin/ gzugs bcings pa ma yin grol ba ma yin pas mtha' las 'das shing rnam par dag pa'o zhes mngon par rdzogs
153a5(brgyad stong): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes lam yin 'du byed rnams lam yin/ rnam par shes pa rtag pa ma yin mi rtag pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa
153a6(brgyad stong): bcings pa ma yin grol ba ma yin pas mtha' las 'das shing rnam par dag pa'o zhes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems
153a7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ming 'di dag nyid dang tshig 'di dag nyid dang yi ge 'dri
153a8(brgyad stong): dag nyid kyis sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chang bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
153b1(brgyad stong): 'di skad ga gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ma ba'o shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yongs su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs rnam par
153b2(brgyad stong): pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu

153b6(brgyad stong): 'byor ga rags gos pa myed cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang
153b7(brgyad stong): shes pa gos pa med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor nam mkha' dang brag cha slar med cing brjod du med la/ dmyigs su
153b8(brgyad stong): med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor nye bar gos pa dang gos pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyis gos pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
154a1(brgyad stong): yongs su dag pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs
154a2(brgyad stong): me 'am rigs kyi bum gang dag gan lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zag par gyur pa de dag byed rnyed pa lags par rnyed pa lags na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang chang ba nga
154a3(brgyad stong): klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton bgyid par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de dag la ni mig gi nad 'byung bar
154a4(brgyad stong): 'gyur na ba'i nad ma yin sna'i nad ma yin skye'i nad ma yin lus kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rmongs pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro// de dag ni nyam nga ba mi spong bas 'chi ba'i dus mi bgyid
154a5(brgyad stong): do// de dag la lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po dag de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro// chos brgyad dang bcu pa ni dang bco lnga ma ches smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag
154a6(brgyad stong): dang gang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang der bsod nams ches ma dang skyed par 'gyur ro// da skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang

154a8(brgyad stong): rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// lha brgya stong phrag sa po dag der 'ong bar 'gyur ro// chas ston pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad par byed pa'i chos nyan par 'dod pa ded
154b1(brgyad stong): mas rang bsung ba dang bsgrub pa dang sgru ba byed par 'gyu // Shan+dan b+hUM shu na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rolatu phyin pa ni dang ma dang rnam pan du brngas pa'i 'jig rten
154b2(brgyad stong): che bra na med pa'o// rab 'byor de'i phyir yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo ring 'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor don kyang shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa
154b3(brgyad stong): zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar snyan pa dang lung 'chags pa dang brtson byed pa la ba

154b5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che chen po 'di ni 'jig rten na bla na med pa'i rin po che ste 'jig rten la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa/ chos thams cad mi skye ba dang mi 'ag
154b6(brgyad stong): par bya ba'i phyir dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med par bya ba'i phyir mi 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na chos gang lo lang mi gnas
154b7(brgyad stong): gang pa yang mi sbyor chos gang la yang yongs su mi 'jig to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di sngar chos de dag thams cad ni mdo cir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i phyir shes rab
154b8(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa nom gos pa'o// rab 'byor mgos pa zhes bya ba 'do ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs mgos pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa mgos
155a1(brgyad stong): pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byud rnams da rnam par shes pa mgos pas na rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mgos pa'o// rab
155a2(brgyad stong): 'byor gal te de ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par mi shes na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod do// rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
155a3(brgyad stong): 'di ni chos gang la yang 'jug par byed pa'am nges par 'jug par byed pa 'am/ yang dag par ston par byed pa 'am/ nges par ston par byed pa 'am/ yongs su thob par byed pa 'am nges
155a4(brgyad stong): thob par byed pa med do// de nis lha'i bu stong phrag mang po dag par snang la ca co dang gan dag byed de gos dag 'dzab ning 'di skad du e ma 'dzam bu'i gling nga chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba lan ga
155a5(brgyad stong): su byung bar snang ngo zhes kyang zer ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo la nag
155a6(brgyad stong): su bskor ba ma yin te/ chos gang la yang rab tu bskor ba'am ldog pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
155a7(brgyad stong): yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das 'don gang zhig chos thams cad la chag
155a8(brgyad stong): pa ma mchis pa dang / gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal yang chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba dang / 
155b1(brgyad stong): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor yang chos gang yang yang dag par mi ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rgyang bde'i pha rol tu phyin pa lden po lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
155b2(brgyad stong): gang dag dmigs par bya ba'am chos gang zhig bstan par bya ba de ni med la 'ag zhag gis 'ga' nag bskor bar bya ba yang mang ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos
155b3(brgyad stong): ni shin tu mngon par ma grub pa ste/ chos gang yang ldog par mi 'gyur rab tu bskor bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i skad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni chog ma nas mngon pa
155b4(brgyad stong): grub pa ste/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces gsol la dang / bcom ldan 'das byas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab
155b5(brgyad stong): bzhin na de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid ni rab tu 'jug pa'am ldog pa med do// rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa yang 'jug pa 'am ldog pa med do// rab 'byor smon pa med pa yang 'a
155b6(brgyad stong): 'am ldog pa med do// rab 'byor gang 'di ltar bstan pa 'di ni chos thams cad bstan pa yin te/ sus kyang bstan pa med la sus kyang thos pa yang med sus kyang ma ngos pa yang med su
155b7(brgyad stong): kyang mngon sum du byas pa yang meng sus kyang mngon sum du byed pa yang ma yin/ sus kyang mngon sum du byed par yang mi 'gyur ro// chos bstan pa 'dis ni sa yang yongs su mya ngan las pa
155b8(brgyad stong): yongasas mya ngan las 'da' bar ma 'gyur yongs su mya ngan las ma 'da' ste/ chos bstan pa 'dis ni sa yang sbyin pa'i gnas su byas pa yang meng ngo //  ces bka' stsal pa
156a1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni ma mchis pa'i nga
156a2(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dmigs su ma mchis par mnyam pa'i slad du 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang su nyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shin tu
156a3(brgyad stong): dpe'i slad du 'di ni dben pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'ang
156a4(brgyad stong): chis shing lus ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba dang 'ong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i
156a5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad tortog pa ma ma chis pa'i slad du 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ba m+bu ldan 'das phung po lnga dam kyi
156a6(brgyad stong): su ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni mer ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'dri ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol
156a7(brgyad stong): phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das me bas pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i ska
156a8(brgyad stong): 'di ni mi bas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma grub pa'i slad du 'di ni chos thams cad mi skye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
156b1(brgyad stong): 'ad byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni shes pa bem mchi
156b2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dag mi skye ba'i slad du 'di ri mi 'pho ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar
156b3(brgyad stong): pa'i dus me dmigs pa'i sred du 'di ni 'dul ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa rnam par shes par bgyid pa'i slad du 'di ni rmi lam dang / sgra brgyan dang
156b4(brgyad stong): phyege yor dang / smig rgyu dang sgyu ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma ches pa'i
156b5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rten mo dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' gros pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'dra
156b6(brgyad stong): dgos bram mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rlob sems thams cad las 'das pa'i slad du 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
156b7(brgyad stong): bam mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi slad du 'di ni mi g.yo ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
156b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad phyin cim log pa de bzhin nyid kyi srid du 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pharol tu byed pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rnas par myo
157a1(brgyad stong): nying kyisang du 'din ldang bam mchis pa'i bar la tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mtshan mam dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni zhi ba'i pha la na
157a2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i srad du 'don skyon ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yongs su rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni nyon mongs pas
157a3(brgyad stong): bachis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'i slad du 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ldang ba ma
157a4(brgyad stong): pa'i srad du 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma zhen pa'i slad du 'di ni mtha' gnyis mi rtogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
157a5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni ta myi dad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad la 'dod pa ma mchis
157a6(brgyad stong): du 'di ni mchog tu mi 'dzin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam par rtog bzhi pa nyid kyi slad du 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'a
157a7(brgyad stong): nyid tshad ma mchis pa nyid kyi slad du 'di ni gzhal du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'dre na

157b2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams ni dri mngon par ma chags pa'i slad du 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma

157b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs de rnams dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
157b5(brgyad stong): pa maldan 'dis rlom par bar ba'i sgrogasum ma dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni sbyi sbyi dang mtshan ma mad pa dang smo pa med pa'i rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rlon pas
157b6(brgyad stong): dmigs sem mchis pa'i slad du 'dini rnam par bang ba brgyad ni phyi rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'asam gtan dang po la sogs pa mi dmigs pa'i sted du 'din

158a1(brgyad stong): 'das shin tu mthum pa'i slang du 'di ni mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams cad chags pa ma mchis pa dang / legs pas mchis/

158a6(brgyad stong): / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po brgya pa/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ shes rab kyi pha
158a7(brgyad stong): na pa 'di rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag glen lam du snang bar 'gyur ba yang sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas par 'gyur ba dang sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa

159a7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon du ma thos shing yongs su ma dris pa'i rang bzhin can du gyur pa dang sngon spyad pa dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis

159b2(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i slad du sngon gyi mthor ma spyad pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ci ltar yang pos par mi nus so// gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po 'di 'char

159b6(brgyad stong): byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon
159b7(brgyad stong): ma spyad pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la mos par mi 'gyur ba de la ngo mtshar tse zhig yod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya sbyin
159b8(brgyad stong): kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba den/ 
160a1(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa'i la shes pa phyag 'tsham pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ke de de bzhin no dngade bzhin te/ kau shi ka gang she

160a4(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas par bya/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du bya'o// de nas bcom ldan

160a6(brgyad stong): la smod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na shes rab rje pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du ba byed/

160b1(brgyad stong): khyod kyi spobs pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi malus skyes pa yin no// ka sha ka byang chub seras dpa' dems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa na/ gzugs pa
160b2(brgyad stong): gnas gzugs sa nas mi gnas te ka sha ka 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la mi gnas gzugs so shes mi gnas 'di ltaran

160b7(brgyad stong): ltar nan mngar shes pa'o zhes ma gnas bya yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyir bya ra de ltang dran pa shing de mar rnal 'byong du byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'ad da
160b8(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i dus 'di skad ces dasol to// na 'das ngo byed pa de zed pa'o//  daso shes rab phyin pa dpag
161a1(brgyad stong): / @##// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha ros tu phyin pa ni gzung ba dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis pa'o// bco
161a2(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de de bzhin nod de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu gzugs rab po snyam du mi gnas te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs zab po snyam du mi gnas pa de ltar nag
161a3(brgyad stong): la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa zab po snyam du mi gnas te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam par shes pa
161a4(brgyad stong): zab po snyam du mi gnas pa de ltar na rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// shA ri'i bu gzugs zab bo snyam du rnal 'byor du mi byed de/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta de gzugs pa
161a5(brgyad stong): po snyam du rnal 'byor du mi byed pa de ltar na gzugs zab po sgom du mi gnas pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa zab pa
161a6(brgyad stong): snyam du rnal 'byor du mi byed de/ sA ro ri bu 'di ltar rnam par shes pa zab po snyam du rnal 'byor dumi byed pa de ltar na rnam par shes pa zab po snyam du mi gnas pa yin no// de skad ces
161a7(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab ste/ byang chub sems dpa
161a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog par lung bstad pa rnams kyi mduran du bshad par bgyi ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de
161b1(brgyad stong): par mi ba byang mongs pa pal/  pa pe 'gyu ro// de nas cheng ldan pa shA phrul rnarnams ca dbang pa 'am byin ces 'dug ces smras so// 'bugs pa shA ro'i kyang dgas
161b2(brgyad stong): dpa' mas pa dzin pa brnyan na shes myed byen pa du sa na nyes pa thar/ desnyid su thos pa dang /  rdzun pa shA/ ri'i zas ston pas myed 'a
161b3(brgyad stong): byin la 'ang skad ces smras so// kau shig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bstan pa gang shes rab pha rol tu phyin pan bu po 'di lta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsan pa
161b4(brgyad stong): dang mnyan pa thob par gyur la/ thos nas kyi nga bar mi 'gyur kun tu skrag par mi 'gyu dku skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni ka sheka
161b5(brgyad stong): sa 'ongs par rig par bya ste/ yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dge pa'i nubapa yongs du smin pa yin par rig par bya'o// 'dun de ring po ma sogs par thad med pa yang
161b6(brgyad stong): bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/ de ni lung bstan pa la bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de cing bzhin gshe
161b7(brgyad stong): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig gam gnyis sam gsum las mi 'da' ste/ de nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par
161b8(brgyad stong): A ngo // 'on kyang dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams mnyes par byed par gyur te/ mnyes par byas nas kyang thugs byung bar bye
162a1(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba la bzung bstan pas 'bras bu yod par byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs par rung ba de las kyang bla na med pa/ 
162a2(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// ji srid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa zab par 'gyur ba de srid du de bzhin gshes
162a3(brgyad stong): pa blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang rim gro bya ba nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyis 'bras bu yod par byed
162a4(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ro// dranas bcom ldan 'das 'i ched bldan pa shA ri'i bus 'disad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha
162a5(brgyad stong): pa zang po 'di bal ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang mnyan pa thob par byur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mchis/ 
162a6(brgyad stong): pa lags te yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su srid pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi na/ gang 'di bos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / 
162a7(brgyad stong): na chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'phags pa dang / kha ton byed par 'gyur ba rnams lta smos kyang ni 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
162a8(brgyad stong): da ldan pa shA ri'i bul 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
162b1(brgyad stong): ba mo 'di blta 'a dang phyag bya ba dang 'asnyen pa tu dbya ba dang mnyan pa thob par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ma da ni shA ri'i bu rgyar ring pon ma 'ongs pa yin te/ yun ring po nas
162b2(brgyad stong): theg pa la yang dag pa zhugs pa dge ba'i rtsab yongs su sbyin pa yin par rig par byur/ gang 'di thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang 'chang bu dang klog pa dang dran chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa
162b3(brgyad stong): dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol
162b4(brgyad stong): ma ldan 'das dper gsol bar bdag spobs so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub
162b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa'i theg pa can gang zhig gi rmi lam du yang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa min/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mngon par rdzogs par
162b6(brgyad stong): byang chub par bgyi ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsnyen pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab
162b7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bsdu ba dang / phyag dgye ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang mnyan pa thob par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de ni rgya
162b8(brgyad stong): pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag pa'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa legs na/ thos nas kyang bzung ba dang bcang ba dang klag pa dang
163a1(brgyad stong): chub par bgyir pa dang rab tu 'angon pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dpa 'a ton du bgying ba la smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa'i byeg/ 
163a2(brgyad stong): pa ba'i gang zag de ni lung bstan pa dang bsten pa lags shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
163a3(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bgyi ba'i slad du lung bstan par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi'o// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di tha na mnyan pa yang rnyed
163a4(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags par rig par bgyin/ bcom
163a5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bkyang pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar
163a6(brgyad stong): ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang ba ton du la'i dpar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i
163a7(brgyad stong): las bsags pa dang phal cher ma bral ba de dag gi sems phal cher ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mi mthun par 'gyur zhing sems ldog par 'gyur ro// sems
163a8(brgyad stong): can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa ni phal cher yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di la rab tu mi 'jug cing rab tu dad par mi 'gyur te/ gang dag yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di la rab tu 'jug cing
163b1(brgyad stong): rab tu dad par 'akur ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'asags pa lags te bcom ldan 'das de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags par rig par bgyi// 
163b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu zhig 'brog dgon pa dpa gra tshad brgya pa 'am dpag tshad nyis brgya ba 'am dpag tshad sum brgya pa 'am dpag tshad bzhi brgya pa 'am dpag
163b3(brgyad stong): ralnga brgya ba 'am dpag tshad brgya phrag bcu pa'i 'brog dgon pa nas byung ste des byung ba dang mtshan ma gang gis gleng ngam gro khyer ram greng rdal mchis par mngon pa'i mtshan ma sngar gdar
163b4(brgyad stong): ba ba 'ang rdzi 'am phyugs rdzi'am mtshams sam kun dga' rab phun sum tshogs pa 'am tshal phun bum tshogs pa 'am de ma lags pa'i mtshan ma gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ des sngar
163b5(brgyad stong): mtshan ma de dag mthong ba dang / 'di snyam du 'di ltar sngar gyi mtshan ma 'di dag snang bas/ de ltar grong ngam gro khyer ram grong rdal du nye bar gyur to snyam nas de ni dbugs phyin pa rnyed pa lags
163b6(brgyad stong): te/ de la slan chad chom po yid la bgyid pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
163b7(brgyad stong): zab mo 'di la nye bar gnas na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsten pa lags te/ kyang
163b8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni ring po ma thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par rig par bgyi'o// de yang nyan thob kyis
164a1(brgyad stong): so dang sangs rgyas kyis la skrag par mi la 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slang du 'an/ 'di ltar des sngar gyi mtshan ma 'di dag mthong ste/ 'di lta ste
164a2(brgyad stong): shes rab rje pha rol tu phyin pa zang po 'di blta ba dang byak+shag+sa kyi bu dang bsnyen bkur ba kyi 'dang mnyan pa 'ob pa'i slad du'o// daMp+tad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis chod
164a3(brgyad stong): ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu de de 'azhin nod de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu ci ltar 'di sangs rgyas kyi mthus smra ba dang sra bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du yang granas
164a4(brgyad stong): 'di la khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dbyer na
164a5(brgyad stong): naskyes bul la zhig rgya mtsho chen po lta 'tshal bar gyur te/ de rgya mtsho chen po ltar mchis pa dang tsa rtswa ci ltar de rgya mtsho chen po lta bar mchis pa de lta de ltar gal te des sdong po 'am snga
164a6(brgyad stong): mtshan ma 'am ri'am ri'i mtshan ma mthong na des 'di snyam du 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po ni dadung ri dang snyam nga 'tshal bar gyi'o// gal te phyis sdong po'am sdong po'i mtshan pa
164a7(brgyad stong): ri'am ri'i mtshan ma ma mthong na des 'di snyam du 'di nas ni rgya mtsho chen po dang nye'o snyam du 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni rim gyis dma' ba lags
164a8(brgyad stong): pas rgya mtsho chen po'i nad na sdong po'am sdong po'i mtshan ma 'am ri 'am ri'i mtshan ma gang yang ma mchis te/ 'di ltar yang phye mtsho chen po de mig gis mngon sum du ma thong bde
164b1(brgyad stong): na yang rgya mtsho chen po ni bdag gis bsnyen te 'di phan chad rgya mtsho chen po mi dring ngo snyam mo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
164b2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa na 'di snyam du rig par rabagyi ste/ 'di ltar yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bdag mngon sum du
164b3(brgyad stong): lung ma bstan pa de lta na yang 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bdag lung ston pa dang bsnyen par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes ra

164b5(brgyad stong): sna tshogs kyi yal ga'i lo ma rnying pa rnams lhags pa las lo ma sna tshogs byung ste/ lo ma rnams byung ba dang 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams nags tshal dag la sngar tshe mtshan

164b7(brgyad stong): lta bu dag sngar gda' ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lta ba dang phyag
164b8(brgyad stong): snyen bkur bgyi ba dang mnyan pa med pa'i slad du nye bar gnas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba yod

165a5(brgyad stong): baspyod na cher sdom par 'gyur te nge 'chag pa la dad cher mi 'gyur kha zas chung ngu 'tshal bar 'gyur rmugs pa dang gnyid chung bar 'gyur sme ba nyung bar 'gyur snabs chung bar 'gyur sngas
165a6(brgyad stong): bsngal mang bar 'gyur skye bzhin du mang du gnas par 'gyur/ 'grogs pa la dang che bar mi 'gyur sngon gyi tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa sten cing nges par bsten la bsgos

165a8(brgyad stong): bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa de/ gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi

165b8(brgyad stong): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bla na med

166a2(brgyad stong): spyod pa na ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
166a3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzugs kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba'i ma

166a6(brgyad stong): dag par rjes su mi mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// chos ma yin pa yang dag par rje
166a7(brgyad stong): su mi mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ltar na 'di'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ 
166a8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das bstan pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de bzhin du tshor ba
166b1(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rab 'byor rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar yang mi shes na shes rab kyi pha rol

166b5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyad par gyur pa lags/

166b7(brgyad stong): cher pos pas rnams la mi dkyi 'jigs pa rnams lam to/ sangs rgyam mtshas rnams lnga yang me rtog thams pa mthun pa nyid la yang martog go//  ci'i phyi zhen/ ri'i sgo/ 
166b8(brgyad stong): rnams bsam gyis mi khyab mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khya
167a1(brgyad stong): chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ shA ri'i bud ltar snad par gyur pa'i bduchub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gangs yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi bya
167a2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ de ltar smad par gyur pa zhes bya zhing spyad par gyur pa / sa bya ba'i ming 'thob pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das la cha dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol
167a3(brgyad stong): to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rin po ci'i phung po'o// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' dag pa'i slad
167a4(brgyad stong): du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dag pa'i phung po'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shA rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang
167a5(brgyad stong): kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton bgyid pa dang yi ger 'dri ba la bar chad bgyid pa mang po 'byung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar
167a6(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
167a7(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed ba dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs
167a8(brgyad stong): pa dag la ton byed pa dang yi ger 'dibs bar chad byed pa mang du 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
167b1(brgyad stong): 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang bu dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'phrogs pa dab ton byed pa dang yi gar 'dra ba dag la bdud sdig can dag
167b2(brgyad stong): chang bya bar brtson par byed do// der myur du zi ste gal te zla ba 'am rlu ba gnyis sam zla ba gsum gyis 'dzin yang bri bar ba bya yin no// gal te lo gcig gis sam de phan cheng 'dri bar
167b3(brgyad stong): 'gyur na de lta na yang rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dedadag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar yin te rin po

167b5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton bgyid pa

167b7(brgyad stong): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed

168a1(brgyad stong): chang byed mi nus so// de ras bcom ldan 'das 'tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bum 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi
