173a5(brgyad stong): bgyid pa da nga yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dubabya sems dpa' chen po byang chub 'dod pa rnams dang lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams pa
173a6(brgyad stong): brtson 'grus bsdams pa rnams kyi yang spyod pa gang du mkhyen pa zhes bya ba de ni ngo mtshar to// glang de'i tsher pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi slad du sems can thams cad kyi don du
173a7(brgyad stong): brtson pa bskyed de/ tshol ba dang phongs su tshol ba dang tshol bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag las btsal ba dang yongs su btsal ba dang btsal bar 'gyur ba'i bya
173a8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' kha cig gis ni btsal ba na rnyed par 'gyur shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bab mo 'di kha cig gis btsal yang mi rnyed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za
173b1(brgyad stong): kha cig gis mya bcal yang rnyed par bkur ba bcom ldan 'das 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces
173b2(brgyad stong): bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang daltar byung ba'i chos rnams ma ma gzigs pa 'am ma gsan pa 'am ma
173b3(brgyad stong): pa'am rnam par mi mkhyen pa ni gang yang med do// shA ri'i bu yang de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri btsal zhing rjes su btsal la yo
173b4(brgyad stong): su btsal yang mi rnyed pa/ byang chub sems dbul kha cig gis ni ma btsal rjes sum btsam yongs sum btsal yang rnyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems
173b5(brgyad stong): de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sngon gyi mthar yang brtson pa mthor bar btsal ba dang yongs su btsal bas na de dag gis sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'dun pa de nyid kyis shes
173b6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma btsal rjes su ma btsal yongs su ma btsam yang rnyed par 'gyur ro// de las gzhan pa'i 'do sde shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mngon par brjodapa
173b7(brgyad stong): de dag kyang de dag la rang tid nye bar 'ong bar 'gyur nye bar gzhol ba dang nye bar phyogs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de ni 'di ltar yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sabs pa
173b8(brgyad stong): po ga zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di brtson pa ma bor bar tshol ba dang yongs su tshal ba des ni skye ba 'phos shing tshe rabs rjes kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed pa
174a1(brgyad stong): 'gyu zhing de las gzhan pa'i mdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dag kyang de'i drung du dang nyid nye bar 'ong ba dang nye bar gsol ba dang nye bar phyog pa par gyur
174a2(brgyad stong): rmo/ de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di snyed ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i mdo 'di dag
174a3(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu po de dag lanye bar 'ong ba dang nye bar gzhol ba dang nye bar phyogs par 'gyur gyi gnan dag ni ma legs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
174a4(brgyad stong): ri'i bu mdo sde zab mo zab pa gzhan ci snyed yod pa de dag kyang / bdag nyid rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la rang nyid nye bar 'ong ba dang nye bar gzhol ba dang nye bar phyogs para'
174a5(brgyad stong): ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de ni 'di ltar yin te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu
174a6(brgyad stong): 'jog pa dang yang dag par ston pa dang yang dag par 'god pa dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa dang yang dag par rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ba
174a7(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par byed par 'gyur ba dang phyir mi ldog par byed par 'gyur zhing bdag nyid kyang de la slob par 'gyur na/ shA ro'i bu skye ba 'phos nas
174a8(brgyad stong): de dag la mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa dang stong pa nyid dang ldan pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i mdo sde rab mo zab pa dag rang nyid nye bar 'ong bar 'gyur rang nyid nye bar gzhol
174b1(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur pa nyid nye bar phyogs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ 'dzin pa yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// 
174b2(brgyad stong): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
174b3(brgyad stong): sdad 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi yon tan 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su brjod na/ bcom ldan 'das yang de dag la bar du gcod pa ci tsam dag bcu dbyar
174b4(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor bar chad byed pa'i bdud kyi lus mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
174b5(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das par du gcod par 'gyid pa'i bdud kyi las mang po tshul ci skye bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal ba/ rab 'byor bya bya
174b6(brgyad stong): mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chang po de dag gi spobs payun ring mi zhig na'i zlang ba bya gyur te rab 'byor 'di ni bdud kyi las dang por rig par
174b7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor spobs pa de skyes na yang yid g.yengs pa nyid du 'gyur te 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de dag glal ba dang rgod pa dang steg cing yi ger 'dri bar gyur
174b8(brgyad stong): de yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor sems rnam par g.yong bas kun chub par byed na 'di yang 'dud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor rnam pa she
175a1(brgyad stong): ban tshu dang ldan pas yaM geng 'dren 'di yang bdud rtsi lasas rig par bya'o// rab 'byor dran pa me 'thob na 'dri yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab
175a2(brgyad stong): phan tshun bzhad gang byed ni de yi ger 'drin 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor pa na tshun tso 'dri zhing yi ger 'drin 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab
175a3(brgyad stong): mig g.yeng zhing yi ger 'drin 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor yi ger 'dri ba dag phan tshun tshogs pa dang mi mthun par gyur na 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig pa
175a4(brgyad stong): bya'o// rab 'byor bdag gis 'di'i gting mi rnyed do mo myong ngo zhes stan las langs te 'gror 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
175a5(brgyad stong): 'di las lung ma bstan to zhes sems ma dad pas stan las langs te song na 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor bdag gang du myos pa'i grong dang grong byer dang grong rdal gyi
175a6(brgyad stong): yang 'dir ma smos 'dir ba dag gi ming dang rigs kyang ma smos/ bdag gi pha ma'i ming dang rigs kyang 'dir ma smos/ bdag gang du skyes pa'i rigs kyang ma smos so snyam nas/ de dag shes rab
175a7(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa mi nyan par sems shing de nas 'gro bar sems na sems bskyed pa de dag ji snyed kyis de dag ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar/ gang du de dag gis slar rnal 'byor nyid du
175a8(brgyad stong): byar 'gyu ga bsngal pa de snyed du gabor ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir ne na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi nyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
175b1(brgyad stong): chen po rnams de 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di yang de dag gi bdud rtsi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'a
175b2(brgyad stong): yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes grub par byed pa 'di spangs shing bor nas mdo sde gang dag thams
175b3(brgyad stong): khyen pa'i ye shes sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa nyid de dag yongs su btsa pra par sems par 'gyur te rab 'byor 'di yang de dag gi bdud rtsi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byo ba shAng ci ltar 'jig te
175b4(brgyad stong): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dpral slob par mi 'dod pa dang 'arig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dag pa nges par 'byung bar mi 'dod pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
175b5(brgyad stong): skyob ste/ shes rab gi byo tu byin pa 'dis pa bslabs pas pa ga rten pa dang 'jig rter las 'das pa'i chos dag la des par byeng bar mi 'gyur ro// da ltar blo rkyong ba de dag 'jig rte
175b6(brgyad stong): ngas 'das pa'i chos rnams pang dag pa'i khya ba ba'in du po shes pa'i rtsa ba shes rab kyi ro tu phyin pa spangs shing byor das pa stsag 'dra bar sems so// rab 'byor 'di sa ste
175b7(brgyad stong): khyen ngo bo'i thad nas zan gong bsu bya btang ste/ las byed pa'i mi las zum khas btsal bar sems pa de bzhin du rab 'byor phyi mas 'ongs pa'i dus na gang zag byang chub sems pa
175b8(brgyad stong): pa can ka' lal dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rna pa 'di bor te nyan thos dang ngangs
176a1(brgyad stong): rgyam nyid btsal bang sems par 'gyur te rang 'byor srig byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi bdud rtsi las bu rig par bya'o//  zhen/ blo rgyang ba de dag ni
176a2(brgyad stong): rA kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub par byed par mi shes te/ de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spangs shing po nas de las gzhan pa'i mdo sde gang dag nyan
176a3(brgyad stong): ces mngon par ston pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon par smin pa de dag la lhag par kun chung bar bya bar sems par 'jur te/ des bu'i tshul gyis kyang rgyur sems dpa' de dag ni yal gang
176a4(brgyad stong): dang 'dab ma lta bul zhugs pa yin par reg par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos cal dgang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can dag dang rang grangs rgya
176a5(brgyad stong): bag pa can dag slob pa de ltar bslab par mi bya'o// rab 'byor gang zag nyan thos kyi rig pa can dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can da ci ltar slob ce na/ rab 'byor de dag 'di snyam du sems te
176a6(brgyad stong): bdag gcig pu dul bar bya'o// bdag gcig pu 'i za ba shu gcig yongs su mya ngarnams bcwal bya'amam ste/ bdaga' bar zhigadul ba ba shib bya yongs su mya ngan pa'i bcwa
176a7(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa'i sbyor ba com ste/ rab 'byor yang de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par mi bya'o// ra 'byor 'on kyang byang chub

176b7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'dri yang de dag gi bdud byalus su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'a/  dper na sdes thu na ci ngo du gnyer bzhig la kyi chen po ma yong dam// ded da pa da
176b8(brgyad stong): dbyed cing mi sems la mi 'jug par de'i napo che'i rkang pa lang ga mig rjes kyi nang tshol bar sems shing ba lang gamig rjes dang rgya mtsho chen po mtshungs par bya bar sems na/

177b8(brgyad stong): med khang gi tshad gzung bar bya ba yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ma/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//

178a7(brgyad stong): 'khor los sgyung ba'i rgyal po lta 'dod par gyur pa des 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po mthong ste la myong nas 'khor los snang ba'i rgyal po'i 'dog dang gyi bas dang ga'i 'arjid dang

179a5(brgyad stong): pachen po thob cing bsgrubs nas/ de lta bu bor te theg pa dben pa yongs su btsal bar sems na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ldang pa 'asdu ba'i rang bzhin can yin nam/

179a7(brgyad stong): na pan sadun 'der ci'i man thug pa'i bar du 'akres pa dang sgom pa bzlog pa zhig rnyed la/ des de bor te zhag drug cu pa'i 'bras chan btsal ba ro sems shing dag drug cu pa'i 'bras
179a8(brgyad stong): char rnyed nas/ khebs rob phyab bar te/ zhag drug rngu pa'i 'bras can dab par sems na/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ ci skyes bu de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin cad yin nas/

185b4(brgyad stong): klog pa dang kun chub par mi 'gyid pa dang rab tu 'don par mi bgyid pa dang mi ston pa dang nye bar mi ston pa dang lung 'bogs par mi bgyid pa dang kha ton du mi bgyid pa dang yi ger mi 'dri ba dang yi
185b5(brgyad stong): dring mi 'jug pa de lta de ltar thabs sra sbyor zhing 'bad pa cher stso la/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab
185b6(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las byung ngo // 
185b7(brgyad stong): zhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las ni sems can gzhal du med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i nyon mongs pa spyong pa 'byung ngo // nyon mongs pa spangs pa la ni bdud sdig can gyis glags
185b8(brgyad stong): rnyed do// ma rnyed pas sdug bsngal gyis yid gzir cing yid mi bde ste mya ngan gyi zug rngu khong du chud par 'gyur ro// 
186a1(brgyad stong): pa'am slob par byed pa la ba tu mi dga' zhing 'thad pa chen pos brtson parar byed// nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di su yang mi 'dri ba dang kun chub par ma/ 
186a2(brgyad stong): byed slob par mi byed pa de lta de ltar thabs su sbyor zhing brtson pa cher byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dge sbyong gi cha byad du 'ongs nas 'byed par byed par 'gyur te
186a3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la go sar du zhugs pa blo chung ba blo zhan pa blo dman pa ljongs par gyur pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan pa
186a4(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu de dag 'di ltar 'bral byar byed de/ ga tshe dang ldan pa khyod nyan pa 'di ni shes rab kyi rlol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ yang ci sa pa'i mdo sde nang du chu de ni mdo sde 'i

192a3(brgyad stong): sngar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sems cad gzhal du med padag gi kun nas nyod yongs par gyur pa'i sems rnams kun nas nyon mongs par

192a5(brgyad stong): paste/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po 'di la brten nas sems can gzhal du med 'don gi sems kun nam tshon mongs par gyur pa dag thams
192a6(brgyad stong): kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas
192a7(brgyad stong): sems can gzhal du med pa dag gi sems pan nas nyon mongs par ma gyur ba rnams sems kun nos nyon mongs par mgyur ba'o zhes yang dag bci lta ba bzhin du ra'i tu mkhyen to// 
192a8(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sems can gzhal du med pa dag gi sems kun nas nyon mongs par ma gyur pa rnams sems kun nas

193a1(brgyad stong): sems rab tu bzung ba rnams sems rab tu bzung ba'o zhes yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor sems de dgra ni bzung ba ma yin zhing

193a3(brgyad stong): rnams sems rab tu bzung ba'o zhes yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sem

198b5(brgyad stong): bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sems can gzhal du med pa dag gi sems mnyam par ma bshag pa rnams sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa'o zhes yang dag pa ci lta
198b6(brgyad stong): du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor sems de dag ni mi mnyam pa dpa' nyas pas kyi mnyam par 'jug cing da ltar sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin
198b7(brgyad stong): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sems can gzhal du med pa dag ga sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa rnams sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta
198b8(brgyad stong): bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes par gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sa brten nas sems can gzhal du med pa dag gi sems mnyam par
199a1(brgyad stong): bzhag pa rnams sems mnyam par 'azhag pa'o zhes yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi phar
199a2(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sems can gzhal du med pa dag gi sems mnyam par bzhag pa rnams sems mnyam par bzhag pa'o zhes yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen
199a3(brgyad stong): / rab 'byor sems de dag ni mnyam pa dang mnyam pas mnyam par 'jug cing de ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pa de dag ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/ rab 'byor de ltar
199a4(brgyad stong): nin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sems can gzhal du med pa dag gi sems mnyam par bshag pa rnams sems mnyam par bzhag pa'o zhes
199a5(brgyad stong): yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te// rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri la brten nas sems cad gzhal du med pa drug
199a6(brgyad stong): sems rnam par ma grol ba rnams sems rnam par ma grol ba'o zhes yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha
199a7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sems can gzhal du med pa dag gi sems rnam par ma grol ba rnams sems rnam par ma grol ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
199a8(brgyad stong): mkhyen can/ rab 'byor sems de dag ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i rang bzhin te/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab
199b1(brgyad stong): bod sbyin pa 'dil ba rnams sems can gzhal du med pa dag gi sems rnam par ma grol ba rnams sems rnam par ma grol ba'o nas yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// @
199b2(brgyad stong): ngan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri la brten nas sems can gzhal du med pa drag gi sems rnam par grol ba rnams sems rnam par grol ba'o zhes yang
199b3(brgyad stong): ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sems can gzhal du med pa dag gi sems rnam par grol ba rna
199b4(brgyad stong): sems rnam par grol ba'i zhes yang dag pa ci stab bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor sems no med pa yin pa'i phyir sems ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'das par ma dmigs ma 'ongs pa
199b5(brgyad stong): ltar byung bar ma dmigs te/ rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sems can gzhal du med pa dag gi sems rnam par grol ba rnams
199b6(brgyad stong): dam par grol ba'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mabyen to// rab 'byor gnar yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sems can gshal
199b7(brgyad stong): dug gi sems bltar med pa rnams sems bltar med pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
199b8(brgyad stong): na nas sems can pa rnal du med pa dag gi sems bltar med pa rnams sems bltar med pa'o/ shes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor med pa'i phyir
200a1(brgyad stong): de ltar med pa dang ma byung ba'i phyir rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin pa dang yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir shes rab kyi mig dang lha'i mig gis kyang bzung du med na thams cad la med
200a2(brgyad stong): ba'i phyir shA'i mig gis lha ci smos te/ rab 'byor de ltar dri bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sems can gzhal du med pa dag gi sems bltar
200a3(brgyad stong): rnams sems bltar med pa'i zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
200a4(brgyad stong): gas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sems can gzhan dang gang zag
200a5(brgyad stong): gzhan gzhas du med grangs med pa dag gi phye ba dang btsums pa rnams phye ba dang btsums pa'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu ma sbyin to// rab 'byor ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pas
200a6(brgyad stong): sarab sde pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gzhal du med grangs med pa dag gi bya ba dang btsums pa rnams phye ba dang btsums pa'o zhes yang dag
200a7(brgyad stong): lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen ce na/ rab 'byor de dag skye ba thams cad ni gzugs la gnas shing skye'o zhes yang dag pa lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rang 'byor de bzhin du de dag
200a8(brgyad stong): thams cad ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa la gnas shing skye'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te// rab 'byor de la ci lta
200b1(brgyad stong): shegs pas bye dang brtsams bden pas gzugs pa gnas pa danas pad+mam sbyin pa 'ashur zhing / blad nin dung lta bye ba dang rnams pa de mas ma ba nga dunas dang dubya
200b2(brgyad stong): kyi ga sa na na sa kyi byung ba la nga na sa no//

201a1(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti brubra go zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten rtag pa nyid kyang ma yin mi rtag pa nyid rnang
201a2(brgyad stong): yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid badren gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / bdag dang 'jig te
201a3(brgyad stong): de nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten ni mi rtag pa ste 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug
201a4(brgyad stong): sa bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag pa yang yin la mi rtag pa yang yid no zhes bya ba 'di nyid bdon gyi gshin ni gti mug go zhes bya ba
201a5(brgyad stong): dede rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten ni rtag pa nyid kyang ma yin mi rtag pa nyid kyang ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan de gti mug gro zhes bya
201a6(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ bdag dang 'jig rtenam
201a7(brgyad stong): bcas pa'o zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten pa'o// bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' med pa'o zhes bya ba 'di nyid bdon gyig
201a8(brgyad stong): bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' dang bcas pa yang yin la mtha' med pa yang yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid ba

201b3(brgyad stong): namapa' med pa'o zhes bya ba 'di nyid 'den gyi gzhan ri gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la ba
201b4(brgyad stong): bdag dang 'jig rten mtha' dang bcas pa yang yin la mtha' med pa yang yin no zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes pa la brten pa'o//

201b6(brgyad stong): mang lo zhes bya ba 'a nyid 'den gyi gzhan nig/ lug go zhes bya ba 'di ni gzugs la brten pa'o// srog kyang gzhan la lus kyang gzhan no zhes bya ba 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan

202b2(brgyad stong): tshwa di rnaM ses sa non de dag dag kun kyas med 'a dug gi bye dang 'gram duto// @

202b5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de lta bas na phung po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten gyi de bzhin nyid do// 'jig rten gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do// chos thams
202b6(brgyad stong): da kyi de tsun nyid gang yin pa de'i rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i di bzhin nyid/ rgyun tu rmugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid grang yin pa de de lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i
202b7(brgyad stong): 'i'abras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni phyir mi'i shi'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de phrin nyid gang yin pa dran
202b8(brgyad stong): dgra' tsam pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do// dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid do// / rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang
203a1(brgyad stong): pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de/ rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang phung po'i de bzhin nyid dang chos thams cad kyi de bzhi
203a2(brgyad stong): dang 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid 'di ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa dngos po dang dngos po meng ba du ma dang bral ba ste/ gcig pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang
203a3(brgyad stong): pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang mi zad pa'i phyir dang 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir dang gnyis su med pa'i phyir dang gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas

203a7(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum dang spyad byed dang snyed par mdzad pa'o// rab 'byor de lta de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya
203a8(brgyad stong): kyi de bzhin nyid mkhyen to// ma log po 'de bzhin nyi
203b1(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyal bas na de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bya 'gyur gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid ni zab ste bcom ldan

203b3(brgyad stong): ga pani byang chub sems dpa' sem pa dpa' chen po'am dgra bcom pa brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa'am/ gang bkI m+b+ha btsun su ma tshogs pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das

203b5(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas mchog tu zab pa'i gnas 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par
203b6(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas nas bshad de rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di ni mi zad pa ste mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na
203b7(brgyad stong): da pa lnga mi zad pa nyid du bstan to// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu nyi khri dag bcom ldan 'das ka
203b8(brgyad stong): der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tsha
204a1(brgyad stong): dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos zab mo dag rab tu bshad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la mtshan
204a2(brgyad stong): nyid ji ltar ba nag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag stong pa'o zhes 'di la mtshan nyid bzhag go/ lha'i bu dag mtshan ma myed pa'o// smon pa med
204a3(brgyad stong): zhes 'di la mtshan nyid bzhag go// lha'i bu dag skye ba med pa'o 'gag pa med pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o// rnam par byang ba med pa'o// dngos po med pa'o mya ngan

205a6(brgyad stong): badzad do bsnyen bkur mdzad do// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid yin te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
205a7(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur stir mdzad do bla mar mdzad rdo rjed par mdzad do mchod par mdzad do// ri mor mdzad do bsnyen bkur mdzad do// de ni'i phyi
205a8(brgyad stong): na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
205b1(brgyad stong): bar gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgra par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni byas pa shes shing byas pa tshor ba yin no// rab 'byor yang ga bzhig 'di skad du de bzhin
205b2(brgyad stong): dadakyu' pas smra 'o// byas pa shes shing kyim pa zo ba 'gyis pa na yang dag pa sgru bsas pa'i zhes/ 
205b3(brgyad stong): ci sbyar de bzhin gshegs 'o byas pa shes shing byas 'tshor ba yin byen/ rab 'byor gdugis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg pa du da / 
205b4(brgyad stong): goso ga shegasu pa sgrub pa gang dang gang gis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu ba mngon par rdzogs par 'angs rgyas pa'i yig bdudag ted dang zlab pa de dag nyid byas pa shes shi
205b5(brgyad stong): byas pa tshor ba de nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su 'dzin cing rjes su sbyong ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa shes shing byas pa tshor ba yin par rig par bya'o// 
205b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos byams pan ma bya pa ma byas pa ni pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// 'gyur ba med pa 'gyur ba med pa'o zhes mngon par rdzogaso padu
205b7(brgyad stong): gangs rgyas s+ho// mngon par 'jams byas pa 'o/ ngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o zhes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ rab 'byor 'di yad de bzhin shegs pa'i byas pa she
205b8(brgyad stong): shing byas pa tshor bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas chos thamasaca
206a1(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi ye shes 'jug ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
206a2(brgyad stong): rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di yang dag par ston pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
206a3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das gang gi tshe chos thams cad shes pa po dang mthong ba ba med pa yin pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
206a4(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di yang dag par ston pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad
206a5(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su zhu bar bya ba dang 'dra bar bya ba sems pa gang
206a6(brgyad stong): pir ba de ni legs so legs so// rab 'byor byed pang 'di skad du chos thams cad shes pa po med pa mthong ba po med pa'o zhes zer ba ni rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ chos thab
206a7(brgyad stong): cang de shes pa ba dang yong ba po med pa yin no// rab 'byor ce sta chis thams cad shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor mor yams cad ni snang ba'o// rab 'byor ma
206a8(brgyad stong): da ni mi gnas pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar ra chos thams cad shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na chos de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa
206b1(brgyad stong): brten nas de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rab 'byor de ltar na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo
206b2(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di yang dag par ston pa yin no// gzugs ma mthong ba dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ma mthong ba'i phyir yang dag/ 
206b3(brgyad stong): shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'jig rten 'di yang dag par
206b4(brgyad stong): ston pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar gzugs ma mthong ba lags/ ci ltar tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das
206b5(brgyad stong): ra rnam par shes pa ma mthong ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te gzugs la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi skye ba de ltar na gzugs mi mthong ba yido/ 
206b6(brgyad stong): de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor gal te rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa'i sems mi snyed pa de sa pan rnam par shes pa mi mthong ba yin no// @
206b7(brgyad stong): 'byor gzugs mi mthong ba gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang 'du she pa dang 'du byed rnams gang len pa dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa mi mthong pa gang yin pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs papa
206b8(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gzigs pa yin no// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
207a1(brgyad stong): yang dag par ston pa'o// rab 'byor yang ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'jig rten yang dag par ston rten de ltar 'jig rten stod pa'o// de ltar 'jig
207a2(brgyad stong): rten brjod pa'o// de ltar 'jig rten shes par byed pa'o// de ltar 'jig rten mthong bar mdzad do// de ltar 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang de ltar 'jig rten zhi ba dang de ltar 'jig tu
207a3(brgyad stong): dben pa dang da ltar 'jig rten rnam par dag pa'o zhes 'jig rten brjod de/ 
207a4(brgyad stong): byed pa brgyad stong du las 'jig rten yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la che dang ldan parab 'byor gyis 'di skad
207a5(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab rje/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bkyi chen pos nye bar gnas so// 
207a6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bgyi ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang de gyi ba mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang brgya ba gnal du la mchis pa dang bgyi bgrangs ma mchis
207a7(brgyad stong): dang bgyi ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
207a8(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang bya ba mnyam pa med pa dang bya ba gzhal du med pa dang bya ba
207b1(brgyad stong): grangs med pa dang bya ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor rtsa snar shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa 'di bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas nye bar gnas nad/ rab 'ar
207b2(brgyad stong): gshegs pa nyid dang sangs rgyas nyid dang rang byung nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsngam gyis mi khyab bo// rab 'byor du ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dun bya bya bsam gyis kyi
207b3(brgyad stong): pas nye bar gnas te 'don sems kyis pas ma par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di la sems sam sems pa'am sems las byung ba'i chos mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro// rab
207b4(brgyad stong): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bya ba mnyam pa med pas nye bar gnas de na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas de ba ni dgashegs pa nyid dang sangs rgyas nyid dong rang byung nyid dang
207b5(brgyad stong): cad ma khyen pa nyid ni bam po pa ma tham par mi rus so// rab 'byor de ltar ni shes pa pa ma tu phyin pa 'dir bya mnyam pa med pas nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ci ster na shes pa
207b6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa'ang bya ba gnal du med pas nye bar gnas son/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang sangs rgyas nyid dang rang thung nyid dang thams cad pabyen pa nyid ni gnal
207b7(brgyad stong): da yin te/ rab byer sa ba bya 'is// byon pa 'di ni bya bga'ayang med pas nye bar gnas so// rang / nagyis rab kyi lo// sbyi pa'i di bya sa thangs med
207b8(brgyad stong): bar gnas ni na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang sangs rgyas nyid dang rang byung nyid dang thams cad mkhyad pa nyid ni grangs med pa
208a1(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba grangs med pas nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor ci ltur na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas
208a2(brgyad stong): nen/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang sangs rgyas nyid dang rang byung nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnams la mnyam pa yang med na lhag pa lta ci smos/ rab 'byor de ltar na shes
208a3(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bya ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas nye bar gnas so// gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags dri bzhin gshegs pa nyid bsam gyi
208a4(brgyad stong): khyab pa mnyam pa ma mchis pa gzhal du ma mchis pagrangs ma mchis pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags sam/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas nyid dang de bzhin du rang byung nyid dang de bzhin du
208a5(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnyam pa ma mchis pa gzhal du ma mchis bgrangs ma mchis pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags sam/ yon te gzugs kyang bas kyi
208a6(brgyad stong): khyab ba mnyam pa ma mchis pa gzhal du ma mchis pa grangs ma mchis pa'i mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dpa du byed rnams dang / 'on te rnam par she
208a7(brgyad stong): ba yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnyam pa ma mchis pa gzhal du ma mchis pa grangs ma mchis pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags/ 'on te chos thams cad kyang bas mkhyem ma bye' pa la
208a8(brgyad stong): ram mchis pa gzhal du ma mchis pa grangs ma mchis pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka'
208b1(brgyad stong): bto// rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnyam pa med pa gsang du med bgrangs med pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rabang pyor de bzhin du tshor bar
208b2(brgyad stong): du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mo khyab pa mnyam pa med bgran 'du med pa grangs me dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos mam pa cad kyang ba
208b3(brgyad stong): kyis mi byab pa mnyam pa med pa gzhal du med pa grangs med pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// de ci'i phyir ner/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni sems med sems pa me
208b4(brgyad stong): nga ba'i chos rnams med pas snyam du med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni sems med sems pa med pa
208b5(brgyad stong): nga ba'i chos rnams med pas snyam du med do// rab 'byor ches thams ca kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni sems med sems pa med sems las byung ba'i chos rnams med pas snyam du med do// rab 'byor
208b6(brgyad stong): rar gzhags kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnyam pa med pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis mi phyag mnyam pa med pa'o// 
208b7(brgyad stong): ba nin du chos thams cad yang bas ma gyis mi khyab pa mnyam pa med pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyang gnas du med pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang dab par zhes
208b8(brgyad stong): la du med pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang gzhal du med pa'o// 
209a1(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa'i tshad ma mi shes te/ rab byang chos thams cad kyi ya tshang pami shes so// rab 'byor ci'i phyir gzugs kyi chad parab tu mi shes/ de bzhin du tsha
209a2(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rab byor rgya'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i tshad ma rab tu mi shes/ rab byung ci'i phyir mo semams cad kyi yang tshad ma rab tu mi shes zhen/ rab 'byor gzugs/ 
209a3(brgyad stong): tshad ma med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la tshad ma med de/ rab 'byor chos thams cad la yang tshad ma med do// 
209a4(brgyad stong): ci'i phyir gzugs la tshad ma med/ rab 'byor ci'i phyir de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor ci'i phyir rnam par shes pa la tshad ma med/ rab 'byor ci'i
209a5(brgyad stong): chos thams cad la tshad ma med ce na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni tshad ma med pa yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzugs kyang grangs med pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes
209a6(brgyad stong): dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yod grangs med pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang grangs med pa te grang ba las 'das pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor garma
209a7(brgyad stong): ngami mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du
209a8(brgyad stong): thams cad kyang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir
209b1(brgyad stong): grangs sam dza pa ma slob pa'am sems sam sems pa 'am/ sems las byung ba'i chos gang yang yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom
209b2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de kho na bzhin du rnam grangs 'dis chos 'di bams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnyam pa med pa gzhal du med pa grangs med pa mi mnyam pa dang
209b3(brgyad stong): matab pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos yin no// rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang chos thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khya ba mnyam pa med gnyer du med grangs med
209b4(brgyad stong): pa dang mnyam pa ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni sems dang bral ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab po// skom pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir mnyam pa med do// rab 'byor/ 
209b5(brgyad stong): sab kyis mi khyab pa dang mnyam pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes par gyur pa'i chos kyi tshig bla dgas so// gzhal du med pa dang bgrang du med pa drang sri mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes
209b6(brgyad stong): yang de bden te/ rab 'byor gnal du med pa dang bgrang du med pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni/ mnyam pa dang grangs dang tshad ma dang bral ba'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
209b7(brgyad stong): chos rnams gnal du med pa dang bgrang du med pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no// chos 'di dag ni nam mkhar dang mnyam pa dang bgrang du med pa dang gzham du med pa nyid kyis na mi mnya
209b8(brgyad stong): dang mnyam pa dang 'grang du med pa dang gzhal du med pa yin no// 
210a1(brgyad stong): dag ni mnyam pa med pa zhe brjod do// nam mkha' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir chos 'di dag bsam gyis ma khyab pa'o// nam mkha' mnyam pa med pa'i phyir chos
210a2(brgyad stong): dag ma nyam pa med pa'o// nam mkha' gnal du med pa'i phyir chos 'di dag gzhal du med pa'o// nam mkha' grangs med pa'i phyir chos 'di dag grangs med pa'o// nam la ba' ma
210a3(brgyad stong): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir chos 'di dag ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang mnyam pa med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang grangs
210a4(brgyad stong): med pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa 'di dag bshad pa na yang dge slong lnga brgya len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong ma nyis stong yang len pa med pa
210a5(brgyad stong): zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo// dge bsnyen pa drug stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// dge bsnyen ma sum stong yang
210a6(brgyad stong): chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khris kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te// de dag kyang bas
210a7(brgyad stong): pabazang po 'di nyid la bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma gang dag chos rnams la
210a8(brgyad stong): chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan te/ 
210b1(brgyad stong): bral bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang snun pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab ste/ 
210b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyi ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bgyi ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa lags so// dri skad cig gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis char
210b3(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rolatu
210b4(brgyad stong): pa'adi ni bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ni thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang yang dag par ldan no// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang yang dag par ldan no// 
210b5(brgyad stong): 'di ni nyaran thos kyi sa dang yang dag par ldan no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs skye ba nas dbang bskur phrul gyi mi ldumathu dang brtson du grus thob pa'i rgyal po'i bya
210b6(brgyad stong): gang zhig yin pa dang grong byerd kyi bya ba gang yin pa dang ljongs kyi bya ba gang yin pad dag thams cad ni skyon po dang 'brel bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir rgyal po dri brtson pa chung shing khur bor bar
210b7(brgyad stong): ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du gang sangs rgyas kyi chos sem rang sangs rgyas kyi chos pa mnyan thos kyi chos kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
210b8(brgyad stong): ldan pas shes rab kyi ma rol tu phyin pa nyid de la bya ba byed do// rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya 'i chen pos nye bar gnas so// gzugs
211a1(brgyad stong): yongs su mi 'dzin cing mngon par mazhen par bya ba'i phyir dang de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dpa du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la yongs su mi 'dzin
211a2(brgyad stong): mngon par mgrin par bya ba'i phyir dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yongs su mi 'dzin cad mngon par ma zhen par bya ba'i phyir dang de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / 
211a3(brgyad stong): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa la yongs su mi 'dzin cing mngon par mazhen par bya ba'i phyir dang / rang byang chub la yongs su mi 'dzin cing mngon par ma non par bya ba'i phyi
211a4(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su mi 'dzin cing mngon par mazhen par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
211a5(brgyad stong): ci ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su mi 'dzin cing mngon par ma zhen par bgyi ba'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar gnas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra
211a6(brgyad stong): la pa/ rab 'byor de ngo snyam du sems/ gang pa yongs su 'dzin pa 'am mngon par zhen par byed pa dgra bcom pa nyid ci khyod kyis yang dag par rdzas su mthong ngam/ rab 'byor
211a7(brgyad stong): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang la yongs su 'dzin pa 'am mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos de lta bu ni bdag gis grang
211a8(brgyad stong): dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor ngas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yang dag par
211b1(brgyad stong): sum yong ste/ rab 'byor ngas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su 'dzin par mi byed mngon par zhen par mi byed do// rab 'byor de lta bas na
211b2(brgyad stong): cad pa khyen pa nyid la yang yongs su 'dzin pa med cing mngon par bzhen pa med do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das reg pa la gsar du zhugs pa dge ba'i bcu byed
211b3(brgyad stong): byadra chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag bcom ldan 'das thams ca
211b4(brgyad stong): dong zhing kun tu skrag la kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par 'gyur du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tu phun sum tshogs pa
211b5(brgyad stong): rgyal ba la bkye ba bgyis pa dang yun ring po nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsnun par gyur pa de dag gis ni shes rib kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na mos pa rI 'gyur ro// bcom
211b6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin nod de bo nin te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa na byed pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis 'dis
211b7(brgyad stong): sa gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab ma pa pol tu phyin pa ni zab cing blta dka' ba tegs par dka' ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag shes rab kyi pha
211b8(brgyad stong): pa zab mo 'di thos nas mos par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa yun ring por dge ba'i rtsa ba bstan pa'o// bcom ldan pa
212a1(brgyad stong): gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can ji skyed mchis pa de dag thams cad kyis dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sa la bska

218a1(brgyad stong): gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las dang po pa shes rab kyi pha rol
218a2(brgyad stong): pa la slob par 'dod pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la bsnyen par bya bsten par bya bsnyen bkur bya'o// gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la 'doms shing rjes su ston par/ 
218a3(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba dang yang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don 'di la lung 'bogs pa de dag ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i dge ba'i bshes ga
218a4(brgyad stong): du rig par bya'o// de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du gyis shig de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol
218a5(brgyad stong): phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam gton gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'arnal 'byor du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod sbyin pa gang
218a6(brgyad stong): byin pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
218a7(brgyad stong): rgyam lugs su ba sgoms shig/ de 'i sprin du tshor ba ma yin 'du shes sum yin 'du byed dmas su ma yin rigs kyi khyod blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya chu
218a8(brgyad stong): shes pa ma skyems shig/ de ci'i phyir shi na/ rigs kyi bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi snyems pa'o// de bzhin du 'ong tshul khrims gang dang gang nyid byung ba dang / 
218b1(brgyad stong): basbyin du sbyar te rigs kyi ba khyod bzod pa gang dang gang nyid bsrub pa dang rigs kyi bu khyod brtson 'grus gang dang gang shing rtsom pa dang rigs kyi bu kyang ba ma gtar gang dang gang nyid la mnyam par
218b2(brgyad stong): 'jog pa dang rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab gang dang gang nyid yongs su spyong bar byed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos shig/ rigs kyi
218b3(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzu
218b4(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub sem par shes par ma skyebs shig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ rigs kyi thathams cad ma byer pa nyid ni mi skems pa'o// rigs kyi bu pyod tan thos kyis 'am rang sangs
218b5(brgyad stong): kyi sa la 'dod par ma byed cig ces shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i den lung 'a 'ogs te/ rab 'byor da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las dang po pa dge ba'i bshes ga
218b6(brgyad stong): ngag gis bathang rjes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhog par byar// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag blar med pa
218b7(brgyad stong): ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang dag par zhugs shing de lta bu'i ngo bo'i snyan pa la brten de lta bu'i ngo bo'i tshul khrims dang de ltar
218b8(brgyad stong): ba'i brtson 'grus dang nges bu'i ngo ba'i bsam gtad dang / de lta bu'i ngo bo'i shes rab la brten nas yong ses mya ngan las 'das pa la rang dbang du gyur ba lags kyang yongs su mya ngan las
219a1(brgyad stong): / 'das pam lda kyi/ ldan kyang sem can kyi la sa shAd tu sdug bsngal byam thong nas ldan med pa pang dag par rdzogs par byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa
219a2(brgyad stong): rgyu bar 'tshal te 'khor bar skrag par mi bgyid pa ni dga' ba bgyid pa lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bkra' gul
219a3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de de bshin no de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang 'jig rten la bde ba'i phyir dang 'jig rten
219a4(brgyad stong): brtse ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi skyob par 'gyur bar bya'o/ 'jig rten gyi sgyu
219a5(brgyad stong): 'gyur bar bya'o'ajig rten gyi gnas su 'gyur bar bya'o 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur bur bya'o/ 'jig rten gyi gling du 'gyur ba bya'o 'jig rten gyi snang bar 'gyur bar byor
219a6(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren par 'gyur bar bya'o 'jig rten gyi rten du 'gyur bar bya'o/ snyam snyid lta bu'i ngo bo'i blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dka' ba
219a7(brgyad stong): pa yin no// rab 'byor ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' deyas dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten gyi
219a8(brgyad stong): pong 'gyur nan/ rang 'byor 'byor ba na spyod ba'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed med pa de dag las de skye'i bar byed cing sdug bsngal de dag spang ba'i phyir 'bad bar byed pa bcom
219b1(brgyad stong): za ba ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'tshan po blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten gyi skyer par 'gyur ro// 8

219b4(brgyad stong): dag skye ba dang rga ba dang de'angango 'chi bya dang mya ngan dang ske sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa la sa yongs su bar bar byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang
219b5(brgyad stong): sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po blan dad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten gyi skyabs su 'gyur ro// rab 'byor ci ltar+yan

219b8(brgyad stong): mas dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
220a1(brgyad stong): ldan 'a na sbyor las kyis pa lags/ som na las kyis dka' stsa pa/ gzugs pa med pagang don gzug
220a2(brgyad stong): gzugs kyi skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi sbyor ba med pa'o// gang gzugs pa sbyor ba med pa 'di ni gzugs kyi 'brel pa med pa'idi

220a6(brgyad stong): yid pa gang yin pa 'din rnam par shes pa'i 'brel pa med pa 'di ni rnam byung shes pa'i sbyong bskyed pa'o// 'byor de ltar na rgyas thams cad ni byung ba ma dang 'phel ba med pa

224b1(brgyad stong): ba ldang ba yin tan thos kyi sa'i don du 'brel pa yang ma yin/ rang sa ngas rgyas kyis dang 'brel ba gang ma yin rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du 'brel ba yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyis dang 'brel 'al
224b2(brgyad stong): ma yin sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du 'brel pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor kye sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po 'gos pa'i go cha 'di ni chos thams
224b3(brgyad stong): dadang ma 'brel pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
224b4(brgyad stong): de ltar yod pa des gnas gsum le re bar mi bgyi ste/ gsum gang na ne/ 'di sa ste nyan po dkyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'am sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// de skad ces gsol po dang / 
224b5(brgyad stong): na 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad tsam bkar stsal to// raba'i phyir khyod don kyi dbang ci zhig mthong na 'di skad du 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga
224b6(brgyad stong): na po bgos pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa phu rol de ltar spyod pa de la gnas ga som la bar mi bya ste/ gsum gang ni ni 'di lta ste tan thos kyis 'am dang sangs rgyas kyis 'am
224b7(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi sa'o zhes zer/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gau rje chen po bgos pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu na pa 'i 'akrol da ltar spyod pa de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ raH/ 
224b8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyis pha re ba 'di ni gnas med cing go skabs med do// 'on kyang gang gis sems can thams cad kyi don du go chen po bgos pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sa nyid la re bar bya'o// 
225a1(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab ste/ de ni sus kyang sgom par bgyi ba ma lags de ni gang gis kyang bsgoms
225a2(brgyad stong): mgyur gang gis kyang bsgom par mi byed gang gis kyang sgom par mi 'gyur sgom par bgyi ba yang cung zad ma mchis gang du slob par bgyi ba yang ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bco
225a3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos gang yang yongs su grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni nam mkha'
225a4(brgyad stong): sgom pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdom pa 'di ni chos thams cad mi bsgom pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha ro
225a5(brgyad stong): napa sgom pa 'di ni ma chags pa bsgom pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa bsgom pa lags so// bcom lda
225a6(brgyad stong): 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi khyed zhab pa 'di ni dngos po ma mchis pa bsgom pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'ang lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdom pa 'di ni yongs su gzung
225a7(brgyad stong): mchis pa bsgom pa lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ 
225a8(brgyad stong): byor de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'i gnas pas gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
225b1(brgyad stong): log par ba dag par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen pa shes rab kyi ba rob tu pa 'dis mngod par chags par ma byung ba
225b2(brgyad stong): gzhan gyis smras pa dang gzhan gyis bzlas pa dga'i mang bang rgyags par myi byed ba dang / 'dung bya chub sa dpa' mams pa'i chen po sa kyi dang po byang
225b3(brgyad stong): pa napa wA byed du ma ngas gyung shi ngogs pa da du smras
225b4(brgyad stong): 'ar 'dim sngon gyi mnar ma shes rab kyi pha rol yin pa yongs su dris pang drug par gyi'o//  phyi na/ ltur shes rab
225b5(brgyad stong): na pa ma 'ang sa shad pa la nga kun tu skrag pa dang ldan pa mi 'gyur ni 'ad pa gang gis des
225b6(brgyad stong): zag tu rtag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka la gams khyen
226a1(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bye brag tu brtags pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci stang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i rgyud bye brag
226a2(brgyad stong): pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la gzhas pa'i rgyud dang rab 'byor nam mkha' la 'bab pa dang rab phyir nam mkha' la phyogs pa'i rgyud kyis
226a3(brgyad stong): rnams par mkhyen pa nyid la myo 'i rgyud bya brag dugs pa na no// dbu byor ma ngo ba rjes maldan pa nyid sa gan gyis kyi brag bahwags pa gang yin
226a4(brgyad stong): brag tu brtags pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gzhal du med pa'o// rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni char ma med pa'o// rab 'byor ga
226a5(brgyad stong): du med pa dang tshad ma med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin tshor ba ma yin 'du shes ma yin 'du byed rnams ma yin rnam par shes pa ma yin/ thob ma yin mngon par rtogs
226a6(brgyad stong): srin khong du chud pa ma yin lam ma yin lam kye 'bras bu ma yin ye shes ma yin rnam par shes pa mo yin skye ba ma yin 'jig pa ma yin 'byung ba ma yin/ 'grib pa ma yen 'gag pa ma
226a7(brgyad stong): yid sbom po ma yin rnam par bsgom pa ma yin te/ sras kyang ma byas gang nas kyang ma 'ongs gang du ya dri mi 'gro yul gang du ya mi gnas phyogs gang du yang mi gnas te/ gzhan du ma
226a8(brgyad stong): gzhal du med pa tshad med pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i grangs su 'gro'o// nam mkha' gzhal du med pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzhal du med pa ste/ 
226b1(brgyad stong): lus kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te gzugs kyis ma yin tshor bas ma yin 'du shes kyis ma yin 'du byed rnams kyis ma yin rnam par shes pas ma yin/ sbyin pa
226b2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pas ma yin tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas mu yin brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin pasam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pas sa
226b3(brgyad stong): te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas mngon par rdzogs par 'chung rgya bar rje nus so// rdo rje'i phyir zhen/ raba'i byeng gzugs nyid rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid de// de bzhin du na chub
226b4(brgyad stong): da dang 'du shes nyid dang 'du byed nyid rnams dang rab 'byor rnam par shes pa nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 
226b5(brgyad stong): de'i shin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid da / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang rab 'byor shes
226b6(brgyad stong): kyiphyi rol tu phyin pa nyid ni thams tshod mkhyen pa nyid do// de nas lharna mos kyi dbang po brgya byin 'dod pa na song po'i l-I'i ba rnams dang bcas pa dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang gzu/ 
226b7(brgyad stong): na da pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das gal ba de dang ste gags nas/ ya ma lan 'das gangs sa ga la / ma ldan 'das pa ltan gsum
226b8(brgyad stong): nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs macag tu 'khod pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po la byed 'dod pa ra skyed pa'i ba'i bu rnams dang bcas pa dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang gsu
227a1(brgyad stong): delha'i bu rnams dang bcas bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bya'o bcom ldan 'das
227a2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gting dpag dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni blta bar dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtog
227a3(brgyad stong): pa ka' pe/ dor kya dab 'di gzigs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa
227a4(brgyad stong): par sangs rgyas nas byang chub kyi sring po la bzhugs par/ brtson pa chung ba la thugs gzhol bar mdzad de chos bstan pa la gzhol ba ma mdzad do// de skad ces gsol pa dang / ba/ 
227a5(brgyad stong): na 'das kyis kun thos kyi dbang po brgya byin dang 'dod ba na spyod par lde'i bu rnams dang mi mjed kyi b.rag po tshangs pa dang gzugs na spong bir rtswa'i bu rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
227a6(brgyad stong): bu dag de de bzhin te de de bzhin no// lha'u bu dag kye sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i di ni zab pa'o// lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gting dpag dka' ba'o/ 
227a7(brgyad stong): 'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bkra dka' ba'o// lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rtogs par dka' ste/ don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas kyang de ba
227a8(brgyad stong): shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla na mang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma thag tu byang chub kyi phung po
227b1(brgyad stong): zhugs pan kye mchos zab me 'de ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so snyams pas brtson pachung ba la thugs gnal par mdzad de chos bstan pa la gzhol par ma mngango // gang
227b2(brgyad stong): kyang mngor par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas su yang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar mi 'gyur su yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba 'dzin chos kyi ba' ba yin no// nam ma
227b3(brgyad stong): phyir chos 'di zab bo// bdag za bya ba'i phyir chos 'di zab po// chos thams cad 'ong ba med pa'i phyi chos 'di zab bo// chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phying ngas mngon par rdzog
227b4(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas pa'i chos 'dri bab pa yin no// de skad ces bka' snyam pa dang bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang 'dod pa na spong ba'i lha'i bu dag dang me mjed kyi bdag
227b5(brgyad stong): padang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i 'dug gis 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to bdab gshegs pa med dbyung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni 'jig rten
227b6(brgyad stong): ngamamatshan pa gag mas rgya ma gzung 'i sring nam 'a ma lag 'i ni la sa sna // 'ag sa
227b7(brgyad stong): na pa brkyang stong pa las la'i le'u'is bya ste/ bcol pa'o// 'phyags po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad song ba/ bam pa bcoMl pa/ denas bcom ldan 'das la chod
227b8(brgyad stong): kyis 'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi ma chos bstan pa ni thos thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das mos 'ad ni ga
228a1(brgyad stong): zugs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyi mnam mkha' dang mtshungs pas gnas thams cad dmigs sum mchis pa'i srad du chos 'di ni thogs pa
228a2(brgyad stong): na 'ad do// bcom ldan 'das kyi ma gnyis sum chis pa'i srang duchos sbyin mtshungs pa ma mchis pa ma nyid do// bcom ldan 'das gyom rgol bam mchis pa
228a3(brgyad stong): du chos 'di ni do zla ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kye ma mngon par grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du chos 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi ma skye ba
228a4(brgyad stong): thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du chos 'di ni 'byung ba ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyim lam thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du chos 'di ni lam ma mchis pa'o// de nas la
228a5(brgyad stong): mas kyi dbang po brgya byin dang mi mdzod kyi 'dog tshangs pa dang rgod pan spyod pa de gzugs na spyod pa /  bu de dag gis btsam yin 'das la 'di skad ces gsam
228a6(brgyad stong): na dus sdes ma na 'das kyi nyin po las gas pa gnas brten du ba'i byor 'di na rjes su mkhyen par skyes pa migs so// de ci'i srid du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das gnas sa
228a7(brgyad stong): bya 'byor 'di ni 'di ltar chos gang dang gang kho nar ston pa'i chos de dang de nyid steng pa nyid las brtsams te/ ston pa'i slad du'o de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang
228a8(brgyad stong): tu byin dang mi mdzod kyi bdag pa tshangs pa dang 'dod par spyod pa deng gzugs na spyod pa'i sla bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag gang 'dond du gnas btan rab kyi
228b1(brgyad stong): na gshegs pa'i rjes su matsun par skyes so zhes smras pa ni ma skyes pa'i phyir gnas brtan rab 'byur ni da bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzas su mthun par smras te/ gnas brtan rang 'byor
228b2(brgyad stong): 'dren gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ba'o// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri bzhin nyid 'ong ba yang med song ba par med pa de bzhin du gnas brtad rab 'byor rje
228b3(brgyad stong): na nyid 'ong ba yang med song ba yang med de/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su spong ba'o// gnas partan rab 'byor ni dang po nyid
228b4(brgyad stong): nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rjes su song ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do// chos tham
228b5(brgyad stong): dkyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni gang
228b6(brgyad stong): tarab 'byor gyi bzhin nyid do// gnas btan rab 'byor ni de bzhin nyid de'i rjes su mang ba ste/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dra
228b7(brgyad stong): dadri yang de bzhin nyid ma yin te/ de bzhin nyid de'i rjes su song ba'o// de ltar ni gnas brtanA rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes sa skyes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de
228b8(brgyad stong): kyi gnas pa gang yin pa'i gnas pa des gnas brtan rab 'a
229a1(brgyad stong): rnam par 'gyur ba med pa dang rtog pa med pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du/ gnas brtan rang 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med pa dang rnab
229a2(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba med pa dang rtog pa med pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa'o// de ltar na gnas gartan rab 'byor yang de'i zhin nyid ngas 'gyur ba med pa rnam par 'gyur bya med pa rtog pa med pa nas
229a3(brgyad stong): par rtog pa med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med rnam par 'gyur ba med rtog pa med
229a4(brgyad stong): de gang la yang thogs pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med rnam par 'gyur ba med rtog pa med rnam par rtog pa med de gang la yang bogs pa med
229a5(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di ni gcig ste gnyis su med de ga
229a6(brgyad stong): dbyar med do// gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gang du yang de bzhin nyid ma yin gang las kyang de bzhin nyid ma yin gang gi yang de bzhin nyid ma yin te/ gang gi glir de ni gang gi yang de
229a7(brgyad stong): zhin nyid ma yin pa des ra de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med pa ste gnyis su med dri 'de bzhin nyid ni gnyis su byar med do// de ltar na gnas bkar rab 'byor ni ma byas pa'i de banan
229a8(brgyad stong): ma byas pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur ro// gang gi phyir de nam yang de bzhin nyid ma
229b1(brgyad stong): yin par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su med pa de bzhin nyid ni gnyis nga byang med do// de lta na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes
229b2(brgyad stong): skyes so// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid rnam pa thams cad du chos thams cad la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang thams cad
229b3(brgyad stong): sa thams cad la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dang rab 'byor ni de bzhin nyid kyis mngon par sprul pa ste/ 'di gnyis ka yang bskal pa ma yin zhing thami
229b4(brgyad stong): pa ste/ tha dad par byed pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni chos thams
229b5(brgyad stong): kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang chas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan ma yin la chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan ma
229b6(brgyad stong): na pa gang yin pa de ni gang gi yang de bzhin nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin nyid de nyid ni chos thams cad kyi bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid de la gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gzhan sa
229b7(brgyad stong): yin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rjes su spong bar khas blangs te/ 'dir 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig tu rjes su song bar khas blangs pa yang med do// de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin
229b8(brgyad stong): gas pa'i rjes su skyes so// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'das pa ma yin ma 'ongs pa ma yin da ltar byung ba ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de zhin nyid kyang 'das/ 
230a1(brgyad stong): da ma yin ma 'ongs pa ma yin da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin nyid de'i rjes su song bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa zhes bya
230a2(brgyad stong): de zhin gshegs pa'i de zhin nyid kyis kyang de ni nyid kyings su myong / de 'azhidu ga sheg di sngon nyid kyis 'das pa'i de yinan nyid kyings su spyodang de// 'das dri'i ni
230a3(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ngo // ma 'ongs pa'i dra
230a4(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ngo // da ltar byung
230a5(brgyad stong): da kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi
230a6(brgyad stong): rjes su mang ngo // 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang lta dbyung nan nyid kyi na shegs pa'i di shin kyis sum ste/ dekyang dganas sbyin rab 'gyur
230a7(brgyad stong): nyid dang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// de bzhin du chos thams cad
230a8(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid dang rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid ni
230b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin nyid de de bzhin nyid gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blan med pa
230b2(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs kyi'i byung chub 'angon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i meng 'thab par 'gyur ba de ni de bzhin nyid 'di yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges
230b3(brgyad stong): de'adi bstan pa de'i tshe na yang de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba bzhin dus chen po 'di rnam par 'gyur ba drug dang ltas
230b4(brgyad stong): bco brgyad du 'gul rab tu 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yos rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldog/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun tu ra
230b5(brgyad stong): mche ma rab tu che mchi makun tu rab tu mche ma/ 'du 'u rab tu 'a nga kud tu ra tsu'ura'ur ro// gzhan yang gnas garten rab 'byor gyis 'i bu de dag la smras pa lde'i bu dag
230b6(brgyad stong): na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de 'azhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so// grazhan yang gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gzugs kyi rjes sum skyes te tshor ba'im yin 'du shes kyi ma yin 'du bye
230b7(brgyad stong): rnams kyi ma yin rnam por shes pa'i rjes chub skyes so// drur tu chug pa po'i 'bras bu'i rjes su ma byas te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma yin phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma yi das
230b8(brgyad stong): com pa'i 'bras bu'i rjes su ma skyes so// rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes sangs rgya chab de kyirjes su ma skyes so// de ci'i phyir nam/ 'di ltar gang gis rjes su skye ba dang ga

232a1(brgyad stong): gal kye yang 'di snyam du kyem bdag ni ma hAs ma snad par 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas par bya'o snyam na shA ri'i bu de cisnyam du sems ci 'da' chags bye de ma d+ma sa ma sdang ba
