314a8(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa rjes su thob par 'dod pa dang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su chos kyi gtam byed par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
314b1(brgyad stong): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa na des gang ma bslabs par
314b2(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba'i phun sum tshogs pa de dag ngas yar dag par rjes sus mayong ngo // rab 'byor gyis gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang ci nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang byang chub sems dpas
314b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po des bslab pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bslas
314b4(brgyad stong): par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos kyi phran sum tshogs pa lnga yang gnas par bya'o zhes mi slob bdag la nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa yod pa/ 
314b5(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro zhes mi slob ste/ de ltar slob par ni mi byed do// rab 'byor yang nyan thos kyi yon tan gang dag yin pa de dag kyang yang dag par shes te de la gnas pa ni ma lan no// de ltar rnam par
314b6(brgyad stong): dpar byed kyi gnas par ni mi byed de bdag gis nyan thos kyi yon tan 'di dag bshad par bya'o rab tu bstan par bya'o zhes slob po// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
314b7(brgyad stong): de ltar slob na lha dang mi dang snya ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spong ra/ de las gzhan
314b8(brgyad stong): pa'i sbyin pa'i gnas nyan thos dang ldan pa dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag thams cad zil gyis gnon to// de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang
315a1(brgyad stong): chub sems drapa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dor te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu
315a2(brgyad stong): phyin pa'i gnas pa dang ma bral ba yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ltar spyod na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can
315a3(brgyad stong): pUng bya'o// nyan thos kyi pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyis 'ang ring du byed do// blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chugs 'o ba gyur no// gal te yang de 'dri snyam du 'di
315a4(brgyad stong): bkyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste gang zhig thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa yin no// snyam du sems shing de ltar shes na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// de ste shes ra
315a5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang yang dag par mi shes te/ 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thams
315a6(brgyad stong): dmakhyen pa nyid thob pa'o zhes rab 'byor gal te de ltar yang byang chub sem pa dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang dag par ye shes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ rab 'byor
315a7(brgyad stong): ra spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpar sems dpa' chen po re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las bas
315a8(brgyad stong): la du zhes bya ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam ze nyi shu gcig pa/ de nas lharnams kyi dbang
315b1(brgyad stong): du sems te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa nyid kyis kyang re shig sems can thams cad 'di ltar zil gyis gnon na gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
315b2(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pos lta ci smos/ sems can gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems 'jug pa de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin/ 
315b3(brgyad stong): sems can de dag ni 'tsho ba yang legs par 'tshe ba yin na yang gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lta ci smos/ sems can dam pa gang bla na med pa yang dag
315b4(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni 'dod par bya'o// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis me tog sar dA ra ba dag
315b5(brgyad stong): par stsal nas me tog snyim par thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor nas tshig tu yang 'di skad ces smras so// byang
315b6(brgyad stong): ba sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas la
315b7(brgyad stong): 'i rgya mtsho chen pos khyar bar gyur pa'i sems can thams cad pha rol gyi 'gram rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la mnyam par bzhag par bgyi'o zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
315b8(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag gis 'tshal ba dang yongs su bsams pa dang yongs su b.rung ba'i sems bskyed pa de rnams 'byor par gyur cig de dag gi sang
316a1(brgyad stong): de dag nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur rtag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i chos de dag nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ rang thung gi mos de dag
316a2(brgyad stong): yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ mi 'phrogs pa'i chos de dag nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skang
316a3(brgyad stong): po dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar ldog pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mi skye'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byang chub
316a4(brgyad stong): dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zab bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang dag par zhugs pa gang yin pa de dag de las slar ldog par
316a5(brgyad stong): sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mi skye ste/ sems can rnams kyi 'khor ba na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal rnams yang dag par mthong bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
316a6(brgyad stong): tu smon lam rgya cher skyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i srad du zhe na/ gang dag sems bskyed pa 'di lta bu 'di dag dang ldan te ci ltar bdag brgal bas sems can rnams bskul
316a7(brgyad stong): bar bgyi grol bas dgrol ba bgyi dbugs kyu pas dbugs dbyung bar 'gyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar kye'o zhes de lta bu'i sems bskyed pa de dag gis
316a8(brgyad stong): pa de dag ni snying rje chen po de don du 'chal ba dang sman par 'tshal ba dang lha dang mi dad lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la snying brtse bas snying brtse bar bgyid 'a lags so// 
316b1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das gang byang chub sems dpa' sems ba' chen po theg pa la dang por zhugs pa de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag la rjes su yi dang ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi
316b2(brgyad stong): bskyed pa de dag la yang rjes su pi rang ba dang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i chos nyid la yang rjes su yi rang ba dang skyi ba gcig gis thogs
316b3(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi skye ba gcig gis sogs pa'i chos nyid la yang rjes su la rung bar brgyad na/ bcom ldan 'das rig kyi bu'am rigs kyi bum
316b4(brgyad stong): nams ce tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kau shi ka lang ri rab ri'i rgyal po thang
316b5(brgyad stong): grangs su btsal ba'i tshad ni gzung bar rus ste/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bum byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa do
316b6(brgyad stong): bsod nams kyi tshad ni gzung bar mi nus so// kau shi ka yang gleng chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams srang grangs su btsal ba'i chad ni gzung bar nus kyi/ kau shi ka rje 'i rang
316b7(brgyad stong): dang rdzun pa'i sems bskyed pa de'i bsod nams ni tshad ni bzung bar mi nus so// kau she ka yang stong skye phung rje 'jig rten gyi khams srang grangs su btsal ba'i tshad ni gzung bar
316b8(brgyad stong): dus kyi kau shi ka rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de'i bas
317a1(brgyad stong): srang grangs su bcal ba'i tshad ni gzung bar nus kyi/ kau shi ka rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de'i bsod nams kyi tshad ni gzung bar mi nus so// 
317a2(brgyad stong): shi ka yang stong gsum gyi snod chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams srang grangs su btsal ba'i tshad ni gzung bar nus kyi/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems
317a3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de'i bsod nams kyi tshad ni gzung bar mi rus so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan
317a4(brgyad stong): 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can yang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang
317a5(brgyad stong): bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar rnams kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems
317a6(brgyad stong): pa'i bsod nams de ltar gzhal du ma mchis pa lags par mi nyan ma 'tshal ma mthong rjes su yi rang bar mi sems pa de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs par rig
317a7(brgyad stong): par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa 'di la rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa de dag
317a8(brgyad stong): kyiphyogs su gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa 'di la rjes su ye ra
317b1(brgyad stong): par mi 'gyid pa de dag ni bdud kyi gnas nas shi 'phos pa 'gas sa// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems bskyed pa 'di dag mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / 
317b2(brgyad stong): bskyed pa 'dri dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsdus pa'am sems bskyed pa 'di dag la rjes su yi ring bar bgyis pa de dag gis ni bdud kyi gan
317b3(brgyad stong): rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
317b4(brgyad stong): bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis sems bskyed pa de dag ni rjes su yi rang bar brtse ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang gis de bzhin sa
317b5(brgyad stong): pa yongs su ma btang ba dang / chos yongs su ma btang ba dang / dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems bskyed pa 'di la rjes su yi rang bar
317b6(brgyad stong): bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kau shi ka de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ kau she ka rigs kyi
317b7(brgyad stong): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su ma btang ba dang chos yongs su ma btang ba dang dge 'dun yongs su ma btang ba de dag gis sems bskyed pa 'di dag
317b8(brgyad stong): pa rjes su yi rang bar bya'o// kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang dag gis
318a1(brgyad stong): sems bskyed pa 'di la rjes su 'i rang bar byas na/ de dag myur du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
318a2(brgyad stong): nyes par byed parar gyur gyi mi mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' spel ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces
318a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'ang rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'bya rang sangs rgyas kyi theg bad+mal
318a4(brgyad stong): na thos kyi theg pa pa gang dag gis sems bskyed pa 'di dag la rjes su yi rang ba de dag ni shin tu myur bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
318a5(brgyad stong): sa rnams mnyes par bgyid par 'gyur gyi mi mnyes par bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// de ltar rjes su ma ring ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rta ba de dag gis gang dang
318a6(brgyad stong): skye ba dUr pa ded der shA gur sting brdzes par 'gyur bla mar bgyis par 'gyung rjod par bgyis par 'gyur mchod par bgyis bor 'gyur ri mor bgyis par 'gyur bsnyen
318a7(brgyad stong): bkur bgyis pal / de dag phyid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs mthong bar mi 'gyur de dag yid du mi 'ong bI'i ska bas par mi 'gyur de dag yid du mi 'ong ba'i dri sdom pa
318a8(brgyad stong): 'gyur de dag yid du po 'ang zan de yongs su myong bar mi 'gyur de dag yid du mi 'ang ba'i reg byar rig par mi 'gyur ro// de dag dan sa du mi skye bar rig par bgyis/ 
318b1(brgyad stong): bab dris su skye bar rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis sems can gzhal du med pa dang / grangs med pa'i dge bar
318b2(brgyad stong): rtsa ba sems can thabs cad bde bar byed pa la rjes su mi ring po'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das grang gis 'dun pa bskyed do// gang dag byang chub sems dpe 'beg pa can rnams kyi sems
318b3(brgyad stong): skyed pa de dag la rjes su yi rang bar bgyis pa de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag kyang rnam par 'phel bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub the' bar bgyid par 'gyur ro// 
318b4(brgyad stong): dog kyang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon por rngog par sangs rgyas nas sems can gzhal du ma mchis grangs pa mr-idzes pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las

318b7(brgyad stong): legs kyi bu mo ngas gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de dag la ngasu yi ring ba byas pas sems can gzhal du med pa drang du med pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yi dang / 
318b8(brgyad stong): ra 'gyur bskyed pa dang mngon par bsgrubs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sems smra ba lta bu ci ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdzo ga
319a1(brgyad stong): / rgyab par gyur/ de skad ces gsor ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan par 'byor pa 'di skad ces bka byal te// rab 'byar 'di ci snyam du sems khyod
319a2(brgyad stong): sems sgyum lta bur yang dag par rjes su thong ngab/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// btsor ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'phyo
319a3(brgyad stong): snyam du sems khyod kyi sgyum yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems sgyu ma lta bu dang
319a4(brgyad stong): ma yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di nasnyam du sems sku ma dang sems sku ma lta bu yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas
319a5(brgyad stong): dpa khyod kyis ci sgyu ma ram sems sgyu ma lta bu las gzhanan chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su
319a6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de nir lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sgyu ma rab sems snum lta bu las gzhan chos gang bran med pa yang dag par
319a7(brgyad stong): ngogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa 'ardzogs par 'acad na pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mdzad do// banam smin 'das badrag gis sgyu ma 'amase mas sku ma smra bulas gzhan du chos des
319a8(brgyad stong): dag par rjes su ba mthong na mchis pa'o zhes sam ma mchis pa'o zhes chos gang zhig brjod pa rab kyi/ chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni mchis pa'o de 'tsho ma mchis pa 'o zhes rtogs
319b1(brgyad stong): mchis te/ chos gang shin tu dben pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mina'o// de ci'i slad du na na/ bcom ldan 'das chos mam
319b2(brgyad stong): blan ma dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu'i mngon par rdzogs pa rje nang pona'o// bcom ldag 'das de ltar san shes rab kyi rim tu sbyin pa ni shin tu dben pa la gas pa/ 
319b3(brgyad stong): chos gang shin tu dben pa'i chos de ni bsgom par 'gyi ba ma lags te/ des ni chos gang yang thod par 'byed pa'am spong bar bgyid pa ma lags na// 
319b4(brgyad stong): ra kyi rol tu phyinang shin tu dben pal brten nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa de 'tshang rgya bar gyur
319b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shin tu dben pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi tri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa langs la blun
319b6(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub byeng shin sa dben pa lags sa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe ci ster dben pas dben pa mngon par rdzogs pa nga thum de na ce
319b7(brgyad stong): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor legs so legs so// rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab
319b8(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu gyi dben shin tu dben pa'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shin tu dben pa yin te/ rab 'byor dang ni phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
320a1(brgyad stong): shin tu dben pa nyid kyi phyir blan mdang yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chung shin tu dben pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor gal te byang chub
320a2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu dben pa'o zhes yang dag par shes na de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dang
320a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la brten nas phrin med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya ste/ ra 'byod shes rab kyi pha rol tu
320a4(brgyad stong): la brten nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngan par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang med do// dben pas dben pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi na mod kyi/ 
320a5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshar yang rgya ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par yang mngon par rdzogs pa
320a6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don 'tshal ba de ltar na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' se
320a7(brgyad stong): dpa' cher po ni don zab ro la spyod de// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin nod de bzhin te/ rang 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don pa
320a8(brgyad stong): byed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang don pa' chol yang sbyang la/ 'di snyas nyan pas kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis don des 'on sum du mi byed pa nang
320b1(brgyad stong): ba byed pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don 'tshal ba de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
320b2(brgyad stong): dkara' ba bgyid pa cang ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gang zhig mngon sum du bgyid pa'i chos de nyid kyang mi dmigs gang mngon sum du bgyi ba'i chos de yang mi ma
320b3(brgyad stong): gis mngon sum du bgyi ba'i chos de yang me dmigs pa'i slad du'o// 
320b4(brgyad stong): da kyi daphyogs par mi 'gyur mi ngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed do// gal te spyod do snyam du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 
320b5(brgyad stong): rab la sa ri tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bdag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar thurato/ snyam du de stir yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
320b6(brgyad stong): spyod do// gal te bdagags nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis rgyud reng du bsrings so snyam du de ltar yang dme sems na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das 'di
320b7(brgyad stong): nam mkha' ri 'di snyam du bdag kha cig dang ni nye'o kha cig dang ni ring ngo zhes snyam du mi sems so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam mkha' la rnam par rtog pa ma mdzes pa'i slad du
320b8(brgyad stong): com ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur te/ 
321a1(brgyad stong): ra@#/ ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur te nyan thos kyis dang rang sangs rgyas kyis ni bdag dang rlung rang ngo zhes mi sems so//

334a2(brgyad stong): par mi byed spong bar mi byed 'gog par mi byed gnod par bya bar mi sems na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba drug la bya ba byas
334a3(brgyad stong): yin par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo 'ad ltar yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon

334a5(brgyad stong): du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi don du rnam par smin pa sgrub par mi byed kyi kun dga' bo 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni phal cher shes

334a7(brgyad stong): yang nub par mi 'gyur ba chung zhig chongs shig lhags shig kun chub par gyis shig rab tu than cig yun ring por gnas par byas shig/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gal te shes
334a8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma gtogs par chos gang ngas mngon sum du bshad pa'i chos bshad pa de dag thams cad bzung nas phyis rnam par chud gzan tam phyes gtang ma
334b1(brgyad stong): rjed par byas dkun dga' bo khyod do tsam gyi sangs nyes par brtse bar mi 'gyur gyi/ kun dga' bo yang 'di ltar khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig gi yan la

334b3(brgyad stong): yang khyod kyis gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung nas phyis chud gzan cing btang ste/ brjed par byas na khyod kyis ngal bkur stir ma byas bla mar pa byas rjed par ma byas/

340a2(brgyad stong): skang slob na/ shes rab ni pha rol tu phyin pa la slob po// bslab pa rabs cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i byung chub chen pa rdzas su thob par 'dod pa'i byung chubasam
340a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo bslab pa 'di dag ni bslab pa thams cad kyi mchog ces pa'o// 
340a4(brgyad stong): pa zhes bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// rab ces bya'o// mchog rab ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla ma zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gong na med pa zhes pa'o// 
340a5(brgyad stong): bde ba zhes bya'o// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa thob par byed pa'o// 'jig rten thams cad la bde ba thob par byed pa'o// mgon
340a6(brgyad stong): rnams kyi mgon du gyur pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis gnang zhing sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa ste/ kun dga' bo bslab pa 'di la bsrabs shing bslab pa 'di la gnas nas deng
340a7(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams 'di rnabs kyi marje bo cig zhes 'a
340a8(brgyad stong): ste slar bzhag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni 'di snyam du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bteg pa'am bzhag par mi dgong pas// de ci
340b1(brgyad stong): phyir der/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzhal du med grangs med pa'i yon tan dang ldan te kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa
340b2(brgyad stong): lo bslangs nas 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang daltar byung ba'i chos rnams la chags pa mdang nyid rdzas su brnyes sa// kun dga' ba 'das pa dang ma 'das pa dang nga ltar rung ba'i dus
340b3(brgyad stong): ci snyed yod pa'i bslab pa de dag thams cad las kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di ni mchog ces bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// gtsu
340b4(brgyad stong): 'omachog rab ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bra ma zhes bya'o bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gang na med pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
340b5(brgyad stong): ba'o// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma med pa'o// kun dga' ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi zad pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes ra
340b6(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ma' ma zad pa'am mtha' ma bzung bar sems pa de ni rnam mkha
340b7(brgyad stong): 'dra pa'am mtha' ma bzung bar sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol ga len pa ni tshad ma med pa'o// kun dga' ba sa
340b8(brgyad stong): pe pa'o// ya da ga shes rab kyi pa mdu ldan pa po 'am sa pa'o// kun dga' sa nga ba'i chad pa 'as 'ang pa
341a1(brgyad stong): ma ni ma bshad de/ kun dga' bo yang ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs dang yi ge'i tshogs rnams la ni tshad ma dang 'brel ba yod kyi kun dga' bo shes rang
341a2(brgyad stong): rje pha rol tu phyin pa lce'i chang ma drang 'brel ba med do// de ci'i phyir nang/ kun dga' bo ming gatshogs dang tshig gi tshogs dang yi ge'i tshogs ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
341a3(brgyad stong): yin te/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chad mdang ldan pa ma yin no// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad meng pa'o// kun dga' bos
341a4(brgyad stong): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ma ma gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
341a5(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas chang ma mi bstan to// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
341a6(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas tshad ma ma brjod do// kun dka' bo dben pa'i chos la dben pa dmigs sa med na de'i tshad nga lha ga la yod/ kun dga' bye pa nan du
341a7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhal du med pa'i phyir chad pa med cing tshad med pa yin no// kun dga' ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang da
341a8(brgyad stong): dardzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa de dag kyang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu phye ba yin yang / kun dka'
341b1(brgyad stong): shes rab che pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zad pa'am yongs su zad par 'gyur ba pa yin no// kun dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus da de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
341b2(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu 'byed par 'gyur yang / kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
341b3(brgyad stong): pa 'di zad pa'am yongs su zad par 'gyur ba ma yin no// kun dka' bo ltar gzhal du med grangs med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
341b4(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag kyang / kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu phye ba yir yang /

341b6(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga yang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu phye ba yin yang / kun dka' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zad pa
341b7(brgyad stong): 'am yongs su zad par 'gyur ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' ba gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' zad par bya
341b8(brgyad stong): bar sems te/ kun dga' bo skyabs na shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa 'di re mi zad pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs
342a1(brgyad stong): pas gsungs pa'i gnas 'di ni zab mo zhig yin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis gnas 'di'u'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la chod

342a4(brgyad stong): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ce ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
342a5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs zad pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// rab 'byor

342a8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma reg pa mi zad pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mang

346b3(brgyad stong): phyed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig pa

346b5(brgyad stong): rar kyis rjes su rtogs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad ming tsam dang tha snyad gdags pa tsam gyis brjod pa'i phyir shes rab/ 
346b6(brgyad stong): kyipha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// bskrad gdags pa yang gang la yang ma yin gang gis kyang ma yin gang yang tha snyad gdags pa med do// chos thams cad tha skad
346b7(brgyad stong): med pa brjod du med pa slar med pa tshig med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad tshad ma med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
346b8(brgyad stong): phyi par rjes su rig par bya'o// gzugs chad pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba chad pa med pa dang 'du
347a1(brgyad stong): chad ma med pa drang 'dra byed rnams chud ma med pa dang / rnam par shes pa tshad ma med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya/ 
347a2(brgyad stong): chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su ris par bya'o// chos thams cad nges par 'byed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
347a3(brgyad stong): phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// cho
347a4(brgyad stong): thams cad tshig med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad 'gog pa med pas spang bar bya ba mnyam pa'i phyir
347a5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa thob cing de bzhin nyid dang mnyam pa'i phyir sha
347a6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad mi 'ong mi 'gro mi shes mi skye shin tu mi skye ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par
347a7(brgyad stong): bdag dang gzhan du mi lta ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad 'bugs pa dgra bcom pa rang bzhin gyis yongs su da
347a8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad khur bor zhing khur mi khyer ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par
347b1(brgyad stong): chos thams cad yul med cing phyogs med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lo zugs ni rang bzhin gyis ngo bo nyid
347b2(brgyad stong): kyis yul dang phyogs med pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tsho rab dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam pa shes pon rang bzhin gyis ngo na nyid kyis phram dang phyogs med pa'o// 
347b3(brgyad stong): sa thams cad 'gog pa rab tu sim par byed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rje sa su rig par bya'o// dga' ba med cing dga' ba dang bral ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
347b4(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pararjes su rig par bya'o// 'dod chags pa med cing 'dod chags dang bral ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
347b5(brgyad stong): 'byor gzugs ni de kho na dang bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na 'dod chags par mi byed 'dod chags dang bral bar mi byed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du
347b6(brgyad stong): mas dang rnam par shes pa ni de kho na dang bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na 'dod chags par mi byed 'dod chags dang bral bar mi byed do// rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes
347b7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad chags pa dang ma chags pa'i glen pa dang bral ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// 
347b8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes khong du chud pas ches thams cad byang chub po zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bar rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med
348a1(brgyad stong): pa dang smon pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// byams pa chen po stan du 'grabs chos thams cad spyan lta bu'o
348a2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad byams pa la gnas pa dang snying rje la gnas pa dang dga' ba la gnas pa dang btang snyoms la gnas
348a3(brgyad stong): shes rab 'i pa rlom tu byin pa rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad tshangs par gyur pa smran sred mi bskyed cing sdang thams cad mi len pa'i phyir shes rab tu
348a4(brgyad stong): pAr rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad smon pa med pa'i phyir dang khong khro ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// rgya mtsho bu med
348a5(brgyad stong): dephyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// nam mkha' mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// 
348a6(brgyad stong): rlab sna tshogs pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs par rjes su rig par bya'o// gzugs mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par
348a7(brgyad stong): su reg par bu'o// de bzhon du cher blang ba dang shes da shA b+h+r-ing rnams dang rnam par shes par med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha pol// ldan pa su med par rjes su d+ha/ 
348a8(brgyad stong): nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor mu med pa snang ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// 
348b1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bu med pa'i rjes su rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sngar ba ma med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rolatu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par

348b3(brgyad stong): rwa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang me'i khams drang rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par

348b7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad du myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par

349a1(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// sems kyi spyod pa mu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pAr rjes su rig par bya'o// dkye/

349a3(brgyad stong): par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thamos cad 'khrug pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa 'khrug pa med par rjes su rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
349a4(brgyad stong): 'byor gzugs ni rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du rab 'byor char ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa

349a6(brgyad stong): r-irab sna tshogs dang mtshungasmra pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni ri rab sna tshogs dang mtshungs pa'o// 
349a7(brgyad stong): demu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dadeng 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni nyi ma'i
349a8(brgyad stong): kyi 'od gzer 'byung ba dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od

349b4(brgyad stong): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs su med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs na sa dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang
349b5(brgyad stong): par shes pa ni sa drang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni chu dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni chu dang

350a3(brgyad stong): dge ba'i chos bsags pa dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos bsags

350b8(brgyad stong): pa dang rtogs par byed pa dang sems pa dang 'jal ba dang nye bar rtog pa dang sku dang g.yo thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i yid gi byed pa dang le lo thams ca
351a1(brgyad stong): byed pa dang rlom sems thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang / bdag bstod pa rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang / gzhan la smod pa rnam pa

351a8(brgyad stong): 'drung na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa des yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du yongs su btsal bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang

353a1(brgyad stong): gyi bu phan yon 'di rnams khyod kyis yongs su rtogs pa dge slong chos smra ba la ston pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu
353a2(brgyad stong): khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi bad+ma'i dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis dge slong chos sra ba'i bya bzhin 'brang bar mi t+tA ri/ snod kyis dge slong chos smra ba la chos don du gnyer ba dang
353a3(brgyad stong): chos ma gus par bya bas phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o// khyod kyis bdud rtsi las rnams kyang rtogs par bya ste rigs kyi bu bdud sngog can ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
353a4(brgyad stong): chen po rnams la gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dag bsnyen pa dang bstan pa dang spyad par bya ba'i phyir nye bar bslab ste/ de dag chos smra ba des zil gyis mnan nas thabs mkhas pas/ 
353a5(brgyad stong): 'grogs shing bsnyen par byed pa dang bsnyen par byed pa yang yod de/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba de la ma dad pa skyed par mi bya'o// gzhan du na sems 'di ltar
353a6(brgyad stong): bskyed par bya ste/ bdag ni thabs mkhas pa de mi shes kyi 'di na thabs mkhas pa rab tu shes so 'dri ni sems can gdul po'i tshul gyis sems can rnams kyis dge pa'i
353a7(brgyad stong): cwa bo yongs su bzung ba'i phyir chos 'di dag la brten cing 'grogs ste bsnyen par byed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gang la yang chags pa 'am
353a8(brgyad stong): sleb pa med kyis skad cig de nyid la rigs kyi bu khyod nyid kyis chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul so sor btag par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul
353b1(brgyad stong): na/ 'di lta snyams mas cad kun nas rgan mangs pa pa yin rnam par byung bab yid do/  pa/ myos bzla rdzun du mAn pa smra ba chos 'bras cad ni sems can byed
353b2(brgyad stong): pasrog med pa gso ba med pa/ skyes bu med pa gang zas med pa sgyu ma lta bu mi lam lta bre sgra brnyan lta bu mig yor lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de
353b3(brgyad stong): tog cing chos smra ba'i rjes su 'brang na ring por mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang khyod kyis bdud kyi las la sems shis
353b4(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu gal te mos smra bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don du gnyer bu'i rigs kyi bu la brnyas par byed cing mi sems na de la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyir bsngo bar mi bya ste/ 
353b5(brgyad stong): gzhan du na chos don du gcer ba nyid dang chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang yid mi skyo bas dge slong chos sla ba'i phyi bzhin 'drang bar bya'o zhes de skad kyang thos so// de nas byang chub sem
353b6(brgyad stong): dba' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de las rjes su bstan pa 'dre ba ngas nas shar phyogs gal ba der song ba dang ring por ma phyin par de 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis sgra de la ci
353b7(brgyad stong): srid du 'gro bar bya ba ma dris so snyam du bsams nas des phyogs de nyid du ngu zhing chongs 'debs te mya ngan byed la smre zhing 'dug ste/ de 'di snyam du so phyogs 'di nyid du nyin zhag ga ce
353b8(brgyad stong): bar du nyin mtshan 'da' bar bya'o// nyin mtshan gnyis sam gsum mam pa ni 'am lnga'am drug gam nyin mtshan bdun yang 'da' bar bya ste/ shes rab
354a1(brgyad stong): ma gyur gyi bar du lus bab pa yid la byed pa 'i skyed rmugs pa dang gnyid yid la byed pa mi sred bza' ba yid pa byed pa mi skyed btung ba yid la byed pa mi skyed mtshan mo
354a2(brgyad stong): la byed pa mi skyed nyin mo yid la byed pa mi skyed grang ba yid la byed pa pa skyed tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skyed de snyad du bsams so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu la la zhig bu
354a3(brgyad stong): gcig pa 'chi ba'i dus byas na sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de mya ngan gyis bu gcig pu yid la byed pa nyid ma gtogs par yid la byed pa
354a4(brgyad stong): gzhan gang yang mi 'byung ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus yang de'i tshe bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'os
354a5(brgyad stong): gyur snyam pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang ma byung ngo // rab 'byor de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de ltar gdung zhing 'dug pa
354a6(brgyad stong): mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shig bzhugs nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis tshig de skad smra ba legs so legs so// ci ltar
354a7(brgyad stong): rdzis da ltar yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sngon byang chu
354a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsam to// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyong gis brtson 'grus 'di nyid dang spo ba 'di nyid dang don du gnya
354b1(brgyad stong): 'di nyid dang 'dod pa 'di lta bu nyid kyis nges spu 'brang thung shar phyogs nyid du mang nag dang rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brtan spom dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che pa

354b3(brgyad stong): dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa 'byor pa rmas pa bde ba lo lags pa skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/ bar gyi cheng khang gi phreng b.ri mo sna tshogs su bris pa lta bur 'dun sdug

354b7(brgyad stong): ge 'bras bu chags pa/ mnga' yapA las shing skyes pa thams cad las kyang rin po che'i rang bzhon gyi bag gu nyung bras mnga' yab gnyis pa'i shing gzhan dang 'bre
354b8(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa'i grong khyer de gsar gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas khebs te/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bde dka la rlung gis btab ra skra 'angam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong bar
355a1(brgyad stong): ba 'di lta ste/ dper na yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo sna tshogs pa/ rol mo mkhan khas pas brdungs shing blangs na spa'angs zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong 'ang
355a2(brgyad stong): 'byung ba de bzhin du/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag la rlung gis btab na smi'ang ba zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ sgra des sems can de dag rtse dka' shing dga' ma
355a3(brgyad stong): grong khyer de khor yug tu 'obs chu rjes su mthun par 'bab pa'i chus yongs su gang dang / chu ha chang yang mi grang ba ha cang yang mi dro bas gang bdag yod do// chu de dag nyid
355a4(brgyad stong): sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa/ rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra zhing bstan sdug pa'i klu dag yod de/ der sems can dag zhugs nas
355a5(brgyad stong): dka' shing dga' mgur spyod do// mu dag thams cad kyang ut+pal dang ku mu dra dang pad+ma dkar po dka kis khebs pa/ me tog gi rigs che zhing bzang la dri zhis
355a6(brgyad stong): duldang ba gzhan dag gis kyang khebs te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i me tog gi rigs la de na med pa gang yang med do// grong
355a7(brgyad stong): de'i nang na skyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de thams cad kyang rin po sde bdun gyi rang bzhin rnam par bkra zhing bltar sdug pa sha stag ste/ skyed mos tsha lnga de dag
355a8(brgyad stong): ren yang rdzing bu khor yug tu rgyang grags kyi ched tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya yod de/ rdzing bu de dag thams cad nas rin po che sa bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi
355b1(brgyad stong): ut+pal dang ku pu da dang / badra dkar po rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa dag skyes te/ de dag gis chu de dag khebs shing / ut+pal dang ku mu da dang pad+ma dkar po bzang po de dag

358a3(brgyad stong): rol 'apas cad kyi ngo bo nyi 'i das sang zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa lda
358a4(brgyad stong): bar 'byung ba ni bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams snang tha dad med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / cho mams cad 'gyur ba med pararathong ba zhes bya ba'i
358a5(brgyad stong): 'dzin dang / ma sa rgyang byung bar byed pa zhes bya ba cing nge 'dzin dang / chos mas na myed pa dang bral ba nas bya ba ni te rnye 'don dpa / ches thanas
358a6(brgyad stong): pasrel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge dzi na dang / chos thams cad rnam par gsas du zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge

358b4(brgyad stong): rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ming dang nges pa'i tshig dang tshig drang yig 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la rnam par bral

359a2(brgyad stong): brakra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur gcod pa zhes bya ba'i
359a3(brgyad stong): tang nge 'dzin dang / snying po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par
359a4(brgyad stong): shes pa dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la nges par 'bigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa
359a5(brgyad stong): phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bye brag med par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
359a6(brgyad stong): smra bar gyur pa'i thibs po thams cad rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma dang bral ba
359a7(brgyad stong): ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / le lo thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos zab
359a8(brgyad stong): ro'i 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par sel ba
359b1(brgyad stong): byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten gsum la mngon par ma chags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od gu per sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshes
359b2(brgyad stong): pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
359b3(brgyad stong): khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhal du med grangs med pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid rab tu ston pa
359b4(brgyad stong): dag mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis legs so zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs dbyung ba mdzad de/ tshig 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu nged kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems drapra'i
359b5(brgyad stong): spyang ba spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin du yongs su brtul te/ yongs su tshol ba nA yang gang 'dir byed kyi thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu nyid dag thob ste/ tIng nge
359b6(brgyad stong): rnyedrin 'dod ga thob nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtogs par khong du chud par gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas par gyur to// nged kyis ting nge 'dzin
359b7(brgyad stong): 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin la bltas ni/ gang mnyam par bzhag par bya ba 'am/ ldang bar bya ba 'am/ gang byang chub tu spyad par bya ba 'am gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
359b8(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshar rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di ni
360a1(brgyad stong): kyang rlom sems sam/ rnamasams med par mi byed pa la gnas nas/ nged kyis 'di 'dra ba'i lus gser gyi 'dogs bu bo ste/ skyes thu chen po'i mtsham
360a2(brgyad stong): caganyis dang / dpe byad babang po brgya cu dang 'od 'dom gang ba dang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa// bla na med pa dang sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin bla na med pa
360a3(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob ste/ yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la re shig de bzhin gshegs pa dag las kyang tshad gzung ba 'am
360a4(brgyad stong): mtha' bstan par mi nus na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis chos 'di dag nyid la rab tu don du gnyer ba dang 'dod pas su
360a5(brgyad stong): mchog tu bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu don du gnyer ba dang 'dod pa la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
360a6(brgyad stong): dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shin tu gus pa bskyed par bya'o// phangs par bya'o// rab tu dang bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
360a7(brgyad stong): po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dgra par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// zhes kyang gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
360a8(brgyad stong): pade dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags zhes gsol to// de dag gis de la
360b1(brgyad stong): skang nas rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
360b2(brgyad stong): smin par byas shing yongs su gzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bslabs so// rigs kyi bu de ni khyod kyi dge ba'i
360b3(brgyad stong): shes gnyen yongs su 'dzin pa yin te/ byas pa shes pa dang byas pa tshor bas des bsgo dang nges byas pa bzhin du zung zhig rigs kyi bu gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'
360b4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags pa bskal ba gcig gam bskal pa gnyis sam bskal pa gsum mAm/ bskal bya bcu'am/ bskal pa stong ngamaM/ bskal pa brgya stong
360b5(brgyad stong): dam/ de las lhag par yang mgo lathod pazhin du thogs shing bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi sgra rim glor byas te/ slong gsum gyi sgong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
360b6(brgyad stong): nagazugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad phul yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyi rigs kyi bu de'i byas pa de nyid la ldan lon pa ma yin no// 
360b7(brgyad stong): rigs rje su de'i mya thus khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnams rnyed par gyur to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bas mkhas pas ngos
360b8(brgyad stong): shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur to zhes bka' stsal to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
361a1(brgyad stong): rtag drung thugs byung nas pasgrur ba shA // gas kyi pa ting de la nang dag pas yangs te lang sanas kyang 'di snyam du sems so
361a2(brgyad stong): gas pa da ga ga da zhin ga shegasas sa / de na gags par dag sum tho cug d+hA / 
361a3(brgyad stong): de'adis du ma te/ 'ams rgyu ma mas dpa' sems sa nag /  sa pa nag
361a4(brgyad stong): byas d+huH/ bdag gi ga ma shes na nga dag par po sa na pa/ 'a ba sa sa dug gdin byas pa sri gyis/  'i rnams
361a5(brgyad stong): na rgyas pasas rdzun du ma na pa bang sten na du gas pa dag ma na/ gags pa dgas nas
361a6(brgyad stong): dzin rnam // nas byung chub sems dpa' sems nu ga byung chubs ma snang pa'i sems gyu ba sa gas pa shu nga nga nga slong
361a7(brgyad stong): ya gyum ti par shAg ste/  ra banaganas 'di sam du semams bdag gis la gang ster thazas snang chub sems dpabu sems dpa' tsun pa ces gi nga
361a8(brgyad stong): bar bya/ bdag ni dbul te gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ma chos 'phags la byadag gi 'gur snyer bya ba'i gos sam ri po che'am/ gser pa tsho
361b1(brgyad stong): mu tig gram bai DUr+ya 'am dang ngam man shel lam byi ru 'am dngul lam me tog gam bdug pa 'am dri'am phreng ba 'am thug pa 'am phye ma'am chos gas sam/ gdugs sam rgyal ma
361b2(brgyad stong): dam/ dril bu 'am ba dan de lta bu yang bdag la ci yang med na/ bdag 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du song na ni bdag gis mi rigs pa bya
361b3(brgyad stong): par 'gyur te/ bdag dga' ba'am rangs pa yang mi skye'o snyam du bsams so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de lta bu'i yon tan dag dang bla mal gus pa
361b4(brgyad stong): yid la byed pa dag dang ldan pas spong nas mthar gyis grong khyer gzhan zhig tu phyin par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu grong bar gyi srang ga la bde
361b5(brgyad stong): songo ste de'i grong bar gyi dbus su byin nas de 'di stsal du 'di ltar bdag gi lus btsongs la/ de'i rin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir bya'o// 
361b6(brgyad stong): yun ring po nas bdag gi lus stong zhig cing zad de/ 'gags par btsongs so// 'khor ba dpag tu med pa na 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa'i gshis yang dang yang sems can dmyal ba'i
361b7(brgyad stong): sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa dag myong yang 'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir rab 'di lta bu'i sems can chen po la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir ma yin no snyam du bsams so// de nas byang chub sems dang
361b8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus grong bar kye tshor dus kyi dbus su 'dug ste mi su 'dod mi su 'dod mis nyo bar 'dod ces sgra spags
362a1(brgyad stong): snyam du byang na ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na
362a2(brgyad stong): chos 'phags la bkur stir byed cing / ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
362a3(brgyad stong): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs lnga mkhas pa yongs su 'dri bar 'gyur te/ des thos pa rgya mtsho rjes su thob par 'gyur/ bdud dang ba
362a4(brgyad stong): ris kyirtsadag gis mi thub par 'gyur/ yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thos par 'gyur/ der sems can mang po dag gi don byed par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang nga
362a5(brgyad stong): papar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de dang gzhan dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis 'di'i bar chad bya'o snyam
362a6(brgyad stong): bsams so// de nas bdud sdig can gyis ci nas bram ze dang khyim bdagra de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus mi su 'dod mi su 'dod cha
362a7(brgyad stong): bar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra ci ltar mi thos par 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsgribs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu gang gi tshe bdag nyod ba rnyed
362a8(brgyad stong): de'i tshe/ phyogs gcig tu sor nas ngus te mchim phyung nas 'di skad du bdag gi lus btsongs la byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
362b1(brgyad stong): snyam na/ lus nyo ba yang bdag gisu ma rnyed de/ kye ma badrag ni thob pa ngan pa thob bo zhes smras so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di snyam du 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa
362b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di lta skye chos 'dod pa'i phyir/ bdag gi lus yongs su btang bar lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin nam ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa'
362b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu bdag gis sad par bya'o snyam du bsams so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/ byang chub sems
362b4(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dug la bder du song skye 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar khyod yid mi
362b5(brgyad stong): dka' zhing gdung la mchi ma byung zhing gnas pa ci nyes de la rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u nga'i lus btsong bar 'dod na lus 'di nyo ba yang mched do// brgya byin tham
362b6(brgyad stong): 'i khye'u'i gzugs can gyis smras pa rigs kyi bu khyong ci'i phyir bdag nyid 'tshong bar 'dod / rtag tu dus de la smras pa/ bral po'i khye duni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid brjongs te/ 
362b7(brgyad stong): chos la mchod par bya bar 'dod cing 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bya bar 'dod na/ lus nyo bdengs ma rnyed nas de la
362b8(brgyad stong): snyam du sems so// kye mang ni bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
363a1(brgyad stong): chen chos la sas la yang bgur sbyin snya ma na/ bdag gi lus hob yang ma rnyed do snyam mo// de nas zlum ze'i khye 'u des byang chung sems dpa' sems
363a2(brgyad stong): chen po rtag tu dul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bung mi yis ri bya ba med kyi 'on kyang nga mchod sbyin zhig byed de/ der mi'i snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang / chung dag duya das
363a3(brgyad stong): na de'i rin gyis nyor byin cig ces byas pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bram ze'i bye'u 'di bad
363a4(brgyad stong): nga dang khrag dang rus pa dang rkang nyo ba rnyed pa 'di ni bdag gis rnyed pa'i mchog legs par rnyed do// bdag gi lus ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang sangs
363a5(brgyad stong): chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de sems dga' ba dang sems bde ba dang sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ bram ze'i khye'u de la 'di skad ces smras
363a6(brgyad stong): bram ze'i khye'u nga'i lus 'di las khyod gang dang gang 'dod pa sbyin no// des de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod rin du ci 'dod pa sbyin no// zhes byas pa dang des dal
363a7(brgyad stong): skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis gang yongs su btang bde la byin cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du mtshon rnon po poklas nas
363a8(brgyad stong): g.yas pa phug ste khrag gzags so// brla g.yas pa sha med par gtogs nas rus pa gcig tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig khang pa'i yang
363b1(brgyad stong): 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du khrag ma po 'dzag pa dang / badra shA med pA rab rtogs nas rus pa gcog tu cig pa'i drung du song ba mthong nas/ 
363b2(brgyad stong): 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i phyir bdag nyid la 'dag nyid 'di lta bu'i na cha byed pa bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste dri'o snyam mo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo dbyung
363b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'dra skad ces smras so// rigs kyi byed
363b4(brgyad stong): gleng bdag nyid la 'di 'khru'i na tshadag byed/ khrag dang rus pa dang rkang 'dis ci zhig bya/ rtag tu dus de la smras pa/ bu me bram ze'i khye'u 'di la lus bcings te/ shes rab kyi ro

363b7(brgyad stong): khyod la yon tan gyi rigs sam ya tan gyi khyad par ci zhig 'grub par 'gyu pa des bu mongs 'i sad ces byam rigs kyi bu de ri gang sangs 'aslas pa bya'i shes dang kye ba rog tu rnying ba dang / thabs gangs 'a
363b8(brgyad stong): 'ona'ang 'gyur te/ de langs bslabs na phran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur/ lus gse
364a1(brgyad stong): kha dog lta zla yang thob par 'gyur/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad babang po brgyad du dang 'di 'dom gang ba dang / 'od gcer
364a2(brgyad stong): mtha' yas pa dang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po deng dga' ba chen po dang btang snyoms chen po dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi rab tu thob par 'gyur/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
364a3(brgyad stong): rab tu thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga bas mgyis mi khyab pa dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa
364a4(brgyad stong): bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pa

364b5(brgyad stong): byan nas snyams// denas ldanams kyi dbyung sa ba byed kyis theg pa'i bya sa bya 'i sna bral khyod nyid kyis sus byung chub sems dang sems pa
364b6(brgyad stong): ga tu ngu'amadun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu khyod de lta bu'i yi dam la brtan pa dang / de lta bu'i chos don du gnyer ba 'di ni legs so legs so// sngon gyi de bzhin
364b7(brgyad stong): shegs padun 'acom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyad par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs gangs pa yang
364b8(brgyad stong): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rigs kyi 'u ngal snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang
365a1(brgyad stong): rkang gis bya ba med kyi nga khyod sad pa'i phyir 'dir 'os kyis rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mchog slongs shig/ rigs kyu bu khyod la mchog ci lta bu zhig sbyin par bya
365a2(brgyad stong): sbas so// des de la smras pa/ brgya byin sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med padag bdag 'asum cig/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yul 'di la ni nga'i nus pa yod pa ma
365a3(brgyad stong): pad yul 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul du gyur pa yin gyis/ mchog gzhan slongs shig/ rtag tu dus smras pa/ bdag gis lus yongs su rdzogs
365a4(brgyad stong): ba'i gnas 'di la ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin khyod brtson pa chung bar gyis shig/ lha rnams kyi dbang po nga'i lus 'di la bdag nyid kyis bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs bya
365a5(brgyad stong): rnams kyi dbang po bden pa gang gis bdag bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
365a6(brgyad stong): 'isangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan cing bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa g.yo med pa mkhyen na bden pa de dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi lus sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du
365a7(brgyad stong): cig ces byas pa dang / de nas skad cig thar cig yud tsam de la sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
365a8(brgyad stong): rtartag tu ngu'i lus sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa dang nad med pa dang gnod pa med par gyur to// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / bdud sdig can yang spobs
365b1(brgyad stong): par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dra lA len klan par spobs byam skyes nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems
365b2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog/ bdag gi khyim gang na yod pa der 'dod do// bdag gis pha ma'i drung nas nor blangs te/ 
365b3(brgyad stong): 'di ltar chos 'dod pa'i phyir gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa de yang mchod par bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la yang
365b4(brgyad stong): bkur stir bya ba khyod la sbyin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu ma de dang 'grogs nas de'i rang gi khyim gang na yod pa der dong ste/ phyin
365b5(brgyad stong): sa sgo drung du bsdad do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de rang gi khyim du phyin nas pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so// yab yum gsar dang dngul dang rin po che dang nor bu dang / gos dang mi
365b6(brgyad stong): tog dang 'dug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang blag pa dang bye ma dang chos gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dang rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs dag bdag la stsol cig
365b7(brgyad stong): da kyis stsal ba'i g.yog mo bu mo lnga brgya 'di dag dang lhan cig dgyer gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang bdag cag 'grogs te/ 
365b8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de yang bdag cag la chos ston par 'gyur zhing des bdag gis kyang
366a1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi mos rnams rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nas du mad thams 'khyod la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo byang chub ma sa dpa' sems dpa
366a2(brgyad stong): napo rtag tu du zhes bya 'dres mig de lhag pan 'dugs des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ded stan sgrol gyi sgo dang ma mchis te/ rigs kyid dri ni lhag pa'i bsam pas thun
366a3(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang dag par zhugs pa 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu ma
366a4(brgyad stong): mchis pa las bar bar bgyi bar 'tshal bas pos 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag nyid btsangs la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bgyi bar 'tshal/ 'phagasapa
366a5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bgyi bar 'tshal na/ de'i lus nyo ba 'ga' yang ma rnyed cing ma rnyed pas sdug bsngal zhing yid ming
366a6(brgyad stong): pras mi dgra' bar sems shing mchi ma byung nas mchis pa dang / des nga'i lus 'tshong bar 'dod na lus nyo ba ma rnyed do zhes bgyis pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byi
366a7(brgyad stong): de'i khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur bas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde bas ma dga' bar sems shing mchi ma byung nas gnas bci nyes/ des de las
366a8(brgyad stong): bdag nyid 'tshong bar 'dod ni bdag gi de nyo ba yang ma rnyed do bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs kyi brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 
366b1(brgyad stong): bdang / rtag tu dus smras pa/ shes rab kyi ma tu myed pa la mtshang bar dbya dang / 'bugs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dzin pa cos 'phags de la yang bkur sti bya'o// 
366b2(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyichos rnams ni de lta ga las pasu ng+ges / chos 'dod pa'i phyir tshe nas bzlas pa dang tha ma ma khye'u'i klu zugs kyi ma byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyis myed ni
366b3(brgyad stong): /  sa byang de brag dang sa ny-i da ga sa gyis 'di kyi 'du nga la 'dug dang sbyinarnan
366b4(brgyad stong): sa nas/ de mtshan rnon po thogs te bdag gi lag pa phug nas khrag gzugs brla sha med par gtogs te/ rus pa gcog tu sdig pa'i drung du yong nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug skye
366b5(brgyad stong): dang trang sbyin no snyam nas rigs kyi bu de khrag gzags pa bdag khang pa'i yang thog na mchis pas mthong ste/ de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid do// ri 'di ci'i slad du 'di lta bur bdag nyid
366b6(brgyad stong): drag nyid ni tshe dag bgyid snyam ste/ de'i thad du bdag mchis nus 'di skad du bgyis so// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid kyi lus kyi khrag gzags pa 'dis
366b7(brgyad stong): zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad ces ma rdzi ste/ za mo bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang snying dang rus pa dang rkang sbyin no// de ci'i phyir nan/ dra ni dpral te nga la nor gzhan
366b8(brgyad stong): zhes mchi'o bdag gis khyod la nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad du 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu rgya
367a1(brgyad stong): 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngas 'a dgas la yang bkur stir bya'o nas mchi nas/ bdag gis de la 'di skad ces 'gyi
367a2(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu des khyod la yon tan gyi ris sam yon tan gyi khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ des bdagra la 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod pa
367a3(brgyad stong): dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho sa gzhal du med pa rnams rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'akur ro zhes pa dag la mchi ste/ sangs
367a4(brgyad stong): sa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos nas bdag kyang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba dang mgu ba chen po skyes nas 'di snyam du bgyid de/ rigs kyi bu 'dri shin du chos
367a5(brgyad stong): 'dod pa'i phyir 'di lta bur gang rang gi lus kyi bar du yang mi gnas par spro ba ni dka' ba bgyid pa ste ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang yongs
367a6(brgyad stong): gtong na/ bdag na ga la longs spyod gang dag mang zhing rgya che ba dag yod na/ ci'i phyir bdag cag chos la mchod pa mi bgyid/ 'di lta bu'i gnas dag la smon lam n+da'i phyir gyi
367a7(brgyad stong): dab snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so// rigs kyi bu khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i srog 'phrog pa'i tshul gyi na cha dag ma byed cig
367a8(brgyad stong): de gang gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba'i nor mang po dag bdag gis pham las blangs te bang
367b1(brgyad stong): kyang khyod dang 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga sa ba der mchi'o// bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de la marjod par bgyi'o// gang khyod kyi
367b2(brgyad stong): yongs su brjod pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa de lta bu'i chos dag bdag gis kyang rdzogs par bgyi'o zhes bgyis na/ yab yum gyis dkor gyi phung po chen po
367b3(brgyad stong): / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/ de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs
367b4(brgyad stong): kyi bu der dka' ba'i gnas dag khyod kyis bstan pa las mchos de dag ni gcig tu nges par bsus kyis mi khyab pa'ajig rten thams cad lus kyang bar du'abags pa dri mas
367b5(brgyad stong): thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa'i bar ni ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi gang dag de dag gi phyir de lta bu dka' bri'i gnas dag la spro bar byed na khyod ded kyis gnang gis/ 
367b6(brgyad stong): nged kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa
367b7(brgyad stong): skabs bye zhig/ de nas tshang dpon kyi bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod par bya ba dang / bkur stir dbye ba'i phyir chas te/ rang gi pha ma
368a1(brgyad stong): khA byas nas 'di zad ces/ ya lung ci skad gsungs byed bzhin du mdzod cig dang bdag ni dge ba'i phyogs gang gi yang bar chud mi bgyid do// 
368a2(brgyad stong): nes smras nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa dang bkur ster bya ba'i phyir chas par gyur to// de nas tshong da
368a3(brgyad stong): bu ma des shing rta lnga brgya yang rgyan gyis brgyan/ bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang rgyan gyis brgyan to// rgyan gyis brgyan nas me tog tha dadag 'a dog sna tshogs pa dag dang gos
368a4(brgyad stong): 'dog sna tshogs thogs te bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang bye ma dang chos gos dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dag thogs/ rin po che sna tsho
368a5(brgyad stong): ma pa tha dad pa dag dang rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i rang bzhin gyi me tog dag kyang thogs/ bza' ba dang bca' ba dang myang ba mang po pa mas kyang thogs nas byed

368b1(brgyad stong): babs bdun yod pa/ 'obs rim pa bdun dang shing tA lang sreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba / chung dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod ga 'byor/

368b6(brgyad stong): mtho ba nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te bdag shing rta'i nang du zhugs bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du 'gro ba ni bdag gis mchi'o

371b5(brgyad stong): gas ma dris so snyam ste dris bdag yid mi bde zhing shin tu gdung bar gyur nas/ sa phyogs de nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te de ltar shin tu gdung bas zas la sems pa ni ma byung gi

371b8(brgyad stong): ldan zhes bya ba der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te de nas bdag sa
372a1(brgyad stong): ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag dka' bdang rab tu dga' 'a rgya chen po de nyid kyis khyab par gyur nas sa phyogs de nas ma bskyod par

375a1(brgyad stong): gshegs pa de dag gi sku yongs su grub pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang mapyod phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du yang ma bzhud do// sangs/
