378a2(brgyad stong): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de ltar na chos smra ba dag la mchod pa bya nas she ba rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas panyan nus te rigs kyi bu sngon gyi
378a3(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dra pa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'di lta bu'i tshul dang 'di lta bu'i gtong
378a4(brgyad stong): la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bslabs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa yongs su dris so// dri nas byang
378a5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis tshong dpon gyi bum lnga sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po dadag dang shing rta lnga brgya po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
378a6(brgyad stong): na po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs te blangs nas rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngul slar phyin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
378a7(brgyad stong): chos 'phags stan las langs te bdag gis khyim du zhugs pa dang nyi ma nub par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sem
378a8(brgyad stong): 'gyur te 'di ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la 'dug pa 'am nyal bar byed pa ni bdag gi mi cha la 'di ni ma legs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpachen
378b1(brgyad stong): chos 'phags bdag gzung ba'i phyir 'di lta ste chos sngon du phyir ma thung gi bar du bdag 'greng ba dang 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar bya'o zhes sems par
378b2(brgyad stong): sbyar to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rjen po chos 'phags la bdun gyi bar du ting nge 'dzin gcig la stobs bu thugs par gyur cing byang chub sems dpa'i ting rje dzin
378b3(brgyad stong): ngo phrag gzhal du med grangs med bdag dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
378b4(brgyad stong): ga tu ngu yang lo 'dun gyi bar du gnyid dang rmugs pa bde par spyod lam rnam pa gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar byed de lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung gnod sems kyi
378b5(brgyad stong): rnyog pa ma byung rnang bar 'tshe ba'i rtog pa babyung / rol brnam pa mo yin sems kyi rnam par rtog pa ma byung ste/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpar sems dpa' chen po chos 'pha
378b6(brgyad stong): nge 'dzin las nam ldang bar 'gyur bdag cag gis kyang khri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'a
378b7(brgyad stong): chos kyi khri bshams nas bdag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag ma btab kyis sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'bakrus shes rab kyi pharo// 
378b8(brgyad stong): byin pa dang thabs mkhas pa rab tu ston par 'gyur ba der legs par byug par bya ma tog sna tshogs mngon par dgram mo snyam mo chang dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu po lnga brgya
379a1(brgyad stong): de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob cing spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar byed de bya ba thams cad kyang
379a2(brgyad stong): de'i rjes su 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i sgra dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de ste zhag
379a3(brgyad stong): bdun na ting nge 'dzin 'di las ldang ste ldangs nas grong khyer gyi dbus su 'dug ste chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rta
379a4(brgyad stong): tu dus lha'i sgra de thos pa dang dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu dga' mgu zhing bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu sa phyogs de
379a5(brgyad stong): phyags nas chos kyi khri rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin bshams so// de nas bu mo de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos lus las phud de tha gos lnga brgya po de dag stan gang la byang chub se
379a6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba der bting ngo // de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan
379a7(brgyad stong): bshams pa la bu mo de dag thams cad dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
379a8(brgyad stong): dus phyogs der chag chag gdab par 'dod na ci nas kyang bdud sdig can gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de chu ma rnyed nas sems mi dga' zhing sdug
379b1(brgyad stong): bsngal te/ yid mi bde bar gyur cing sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang gang gis de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang mchod pa de yang mi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir gang gis sa phyogs de
379b2(brgyad stong): chag chag 'debs pa'i chu de dag rnams cad kyang mi snang ba nyid du byas pas kun tu chu btsal na sum rnyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'chen po rtag tu ngu 'di skab
379b3(brgyad stong): ma la bdag gi lus phug la khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab po// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'di ni rdul tshe ste/ sa phyogs 'di nas rdul gyi khams byung bas byang chub sem
379b4(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung gis bdag gi lus gdon mi za bar 'jig pa'i chos can 'dis ci zhig bya ba dag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig
379b5(brgyad stong): desla'i nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i gzhis yang dang yang du 'khor bar 'khor zhing bdag gi lus stong phrag mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni 'di lta bu'i gan
379b6(brgyad stong): sam chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ni ma yin te 'dod pa de lta bu'i chos can lnga zhig pa yin no snyam du bsams so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus
379b7(brgyad stong): sbyar bsams nas mtshon rnon po blangs te bdag gi lus kun tu drug nas rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de thams cad du chag chag btab bo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
379b8(brgyad stong): po rtog tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis kyang mtshon non po blangs te rang rang gi lus phug nas rang rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs
380a1(brgyad stong): de dag thams cad du chag chag btab ste/ gang de dag la bdud sdig can des dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad bya ba'i glags gang du rnyed par 'gyur ba byang chub sem
380a2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang du mo de dag thams cad sems gzhan du thar pa med do// de nas sgra rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te// byang chub sems
380a3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di tsam du chos 'dod pa dang ci tsam du yi dam mA brtan pa dang ci tsam du go cha chen po bgos pa dang / lus dang srog dang longs spyod rnam
380a4(brgyad stong): lami lta ba dang / bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/ bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogasngo par
380a5(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yongs su dpag tu med pa las sems can thams cad thar bar bya'o snyam du skrag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa ni ngom
380a6(brgyad stong): snyam mo// de nas lnga rnams kyi dbang po brgya b+hi gyis khrag de dag thams cad lha'i tsan dan gyis d+hur byin gyis brlabs te/ lha'i tsan dan gyi chu de'i dring ma pa rgya che ba bsam
380a7(brgyad stong): gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa de'i dris sa phyogs de khor khor yug tu dpag tshad lnga brgya tshang bar dris yongs su khyab po// de nas lnga rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub
380a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu legs so lags so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis brtson 'grus bsam gyis me khyab pa logs so
380b1(brgyad stong): legs so// khyod kyis chos 'dod pa dang chos yongs su tshol ba yang legs te/ rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
380b2(brgyad stong): dedag gis kyang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs so
380b3(brgyad stong): sa smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
380b4(brgyad stong): chos kyi stan ni bting / sa phyogs 'di phyag dar ni legs par byas chag chag ni legs par btab na bdag gis me tog gang dag gis sa phyogs 'dir legs par gtor bar bya
380b5(brgyad stong): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos 'chad cing chos kyi stan la 'dug pa la gtor bar bya ba'i me tog de dag gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam mo// 
380b6(brgyad stong): denas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu lha'i me tog mnu dAng ba 'di dag long la khyod kyis
380b7(brgyad stong): phyogs 'di dag tu me tog bkram par bgyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags chos ston cing chos kyi khri la 'dug pa la yang gtor cig ce
380b8(brgyad stong): sa nas des de la lha'i me tog man dA ra ba lha'i khal stong byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus me tog de dag blangs te me tog kha cig gi
381a1(brgyad stong): nis phyogs der me tog bkram par byas so// me tog kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor to// de nas bya
381a2(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'das pa dang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te chos kyi stan gang na yod pa der 'ongs nas stan bting ba la 'du
381a3(brgyad stong): 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// de nas byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
381a4(brgyad stong): ga tu dus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags mthong ma thag tu 'di lta ste dper na bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtseka
381a5(brgyad stong): yid la byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob bo// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ni 'di yin te/ 'di
381a6(brgyad stong): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad dper ba nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid
381a7(brgyad stong): sathabs cad g.yo ba med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad rlom sems med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
381a8(brgyad stong): mas med pa nyid do// chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas shes
381b1(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do// chos sems cad mu byed pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha roladu phyi drab bu med pa nyid do// chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas shes ra
381b2(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do// nam mkha' mu med pa nyid pas shes rab
381b3(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna chog
381b4(brgyad stong): pa nyid do// nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do// gzugs bu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bu med pa nyid do// 
381b5(brgyad stong): bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byud rnams dang rnam par shes pa mu meng pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su med pa nyid do// sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes
381b6(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rang gi khams ma med pa nyid bas shes rab sde pha rol tu phyin pa ma med pa nyid do// cham mkha'i khams
381b7(brgyad stong): mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bu med pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i khams su med pa nyed ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir ba mu med pa nyid de/ rdorje lta bu'i chos
381b8(brgyad stong): mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nying ngo // chos thams cang ma 'dres pa nyed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do// chos sems cad
382a1(brgyad stong): su med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dmigs su med nyid do// chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
382a2(brgyad stong): ba rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa
382a3(brgyad stong): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar 'dug pa
382a4(brgyad stong): du de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po skyes par gyur to// chos thams cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ga
382a5(brgyad stong): da pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rlom sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang chos thams
382a6(brgyad stong): da do gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyas thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
382a7(brgyad stong): 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang rgya mtsho bu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab sna tshogs pa zhes
382b1(brgyad stong): mas dang rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sA'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin du tu'i khams dang sde'i khams dang rlung gi khams
382b2(brgyad stong): kyi dren pa/ rnam mkhal khams su med pa shes ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams su med pa sa bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo zhes
382b3(brgyad stong): 'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam pa
382b4(brgyad stong): pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ byang
382b5(brgyad stong): bsems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tA dras de lta bu la sogs pa'i ting nge'i'adzin gyi sgo ba tu stong phrag drug cu rab tu thob par gyur to// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha
382b6(brgyad stong): pabargyad spong pa las/ chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dras ting
382b7(brgyad stong): rgya stong phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu shar phyogs dang lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs dang phyogs dra'i 'jig rten stongags
382b8(brgyad stong): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgar/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor
383a1(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas te tshul 'di lta bu nyid dang ming 'di nyid dang yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chang ba ma
383a2(brgyad stong): ngo// 'di lta ste dper na da sbyar nga stong ga sum gyi snod chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir chos ston pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpa
383a3(brgyad stong): tshogs kyis mdun du byas te/ tshul 'di nyid dang ming 'di nyid dang yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa bzhin no// de mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi
383a4(brgyad stong): khyab pa dang thos pa rgya mtsho dang ldan par 'gyur te/ gar skyes pa thams cad du yang nam yang sangs rgyas dang bral bar ma gyur to// skye ba thams cad du yang gang dang gung dus
383a5(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du 'gyur ba de dang de dag tu skyes te/ than rmi lam na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur rnyongs mi khom pa
383a6(brgyad stong): thams cad ni sbreng sa dul ba phun sum tshogs pa ni bskabs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dge' bos bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rnam grangs 'di
383a7(brgyad stong): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub pa yin par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo
383a8(brgyad stong): bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o// shes rab
383b1(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya gzung bar bya bcang bar bya klag par bya kun chub par bya rab tu bdon par bya/ bstan par bya nye bar bstan par bya lung 'bogs par bya kha ton
383b2(brgyad stong): bri bar bya/ de bzhir gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba legs par bris te/ me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng bar
383b3(brgyad stong): b+hag pa dang phye ma dang rol mo dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dad ba dan dang kho ra yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir bya
383b4(brgyad stong): ra bya rjed par bya mchod par byer mor bya bsnyen bkur bya ste/ kun dga' bo 'di ni nga'i rjes su bstun pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las thams cad
383b5(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin nam kun dga' bos gsol ba/ ba
383b6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa legs so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kud dga' grol
383b7(brgyad stong): skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa la kun dga' bo khyod kyis lus kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag gi las byams pa yid du
383b8(brgyad stong): bdang / yid kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas rim gror byas te de lta bas na kun dga' bo// da ltar nga bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes pa'i sku 'di la ci ltar khyod kyis dga' ba dang dad pa
384a1(brgyad stong): yang rgyas bu da shAng gyung ba 'das nas shes rab kyi 'do tu phyid ba 'di la yang byos shig/ kun dga' can sa shes rab kyi ba
384a2(brgyad stong): phyid pa 'di nub pa 'i 'gyur zhing ni nas khyod stes dzu ga mar mi 'akur bang kun dga' bo khyed la lan gnyis ldanag/ sum du yongs su gtad do// rjes sa yangs
384a3(brgyad stong): da du de bzhin gshegs pachos ston par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nya nu ba dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun
384a4(brgyad stong): par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang me tog dang / bdug pa dang dra dang / phreng bar
384a5(brgyad stong): pa dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / bad dag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis
